# Expanding Digital Connectivity Across Frontiers

PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi Tbk berkomitmen untuk terus menyediakan infrastruktur telekomunikasi yang terintegrasi dalam rangka mendukung terciptanya konektivitas digital ke seluruh wilayah Indonesia, termasuk area terpencil, guna mendukung pemerataan akses telekomunikasi dan transformasi digital nasional. Dengan membranung ini infrastruktur telekomunikasi yang lebih luas dan andal, Mitratel turut berperan aktif sebagai penggerak utama dalam mengurangi kesenjanganan digital, memungkikan lebihanyak masyarakat dan pelaku bisnis untuk terhubung dengan layanan komunikasi berkualitas. Upaya ini tidakanyak mendorong inklusi digital, tetapi juga memerkuat ekosistem ekonomi digital yang terus berkembang.

![](https://cdn-mineru.openxlab.org.cn/result/2025-10-20/7b47834f-578f-4c20-9349-926bb925d718/711ee618245c3318d2435716f515e98402d70b74debd612d456ec1cfd0806b2b.jpg)

Dalam mencalankan strategi ekspansi, Mitratel menerapkan dual-pronged strategy, yakni melalui ekspansi organik dan inorganik, guna mengembangkan ekosistem menara telekomunikasi yang terintegrasi sesuai dengan kebutuhan operatoren telekomunikasi. Ekspansi organik dilakukan melalui pembangunan menaraantu lokasi strategis, kolokasi, penguatan jaringan fiber optik, serta layanan Power as a Service (PaaS) untuk mendukung industri seluler yang lebih efisien dan berkelanjutan. Sementara itu, ekspansi inorganik dilakukan melalui akuisisi serta kolaborasi strategis dengan berbagai pihak guna mempercepapat pertumbuhan infrastruktur. Pendekatan ini tidakanyak memperluan cakupan layanan Mitratel, tetapi juga menghadirkan solusi terintegrasi yang mendukung implementasi tekologi mutakhir, termasuk 5G, untuk membranung ekosistem digital yang lebih kuat, inovatif, dan berkelanjutan.

PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi Tbk is committed to continuously providing integrated telecommunications infrastructure in the framework of supporting the creation of digital connectivity to all across Indonesia, including remote areas, to support equitable access to telecommunications and national digital transformation. By building broader and more reliable telecommunications infrastructure, Mitratel plays an active role as a key driver in reducing the digital gap, enabling more communities and businesses to connect with quality communication services. This effort not only promotes digital inclusion but also strengthens the ever-growing digital economy ecosystem.

In executing its expansion strategy, Mitratel implements a dual-pronged strategy through both organic and inorganic expansion to develop an integrated telecommunications tower ecosystem tailored to the needs of telecom operators. Organic expansion is carried out through the construction of new towers in strategic locations, colocation, strengthening the fiber optic network, and Power as a Service (PaaS) solutions to support more efficient and sustainable cellular industry. Meanwhile, inorganic expansion is carried out through acquisitions and strategic collaborations with various parties to accelerate infrastructure growth. This approach not only expands Mitratel's service coverage but also provides integrated solutions that support the implementation of cutting-edge technologies, including 5G, to build a stronger, more innovative, and sustainable digital ecosystem.

# Pertumbuhan Operational yang Kuat

# Strong Operational Growth

- Mitratel mencatat pertumbuhanjidarnara dan tenantteringgi di Indonesia, didukung oleh kombiniasi strategi organik (penambahan menara-Baru) dan strategi inorganik (akuisisi menara dari operator lainseperti Telkomsel dan Indosat Ooredoo Hutchison).  
- Lebih dari  $50\%$  kolokasi berada di luar Jawa, menunjukkan keberhasilan penetrasi ke wilayah dengan potensi pertumbuhan tinggi.  
- Mitratel recorded the highest growth in tower and tenant numbers in Indonesia, supported by a combination of organic strategies (new tower additions) and inorganic strategies (tower acquisitions from operators such as Telkomsel and Indosat Ooredoo Hutchison).  
- More than  $50\%$  of colocations are outside Java, demonstrating successful penetration into high-growth potential regions.

# Bisnis Menara dan Fiber Optik yang Tumbuh Pesat

# Rapid Growth in Tower and Fiber Optic Business

Selain memiliki dan mengelola lebih dari 39.404 menara, Mitratel melengkapi dengan konektivitas antar menara berbasis fiber optik (fiber to the tower) untuk mencatkan kualitas dan kapasitas jaringan telekomunikasi. Penawaran layanan tambahan, speerti infrastruktur digital dan solusi proyek memberikan nilai tambah bagi para mobile network operator (MNO).

In addition to owning and managing more than 39,404 towers, Mitratel equips them with fiber optic-based inter-tower connectivity (fiber to the tower) to enhance quality and capacity of the telecommunications network. Additional service offerings, such as digital infrastructure and project solutions, provide added value for mobile network operators (MNOs).

![](https://cdn-mineru.openxlab.org.cn/result/2025-10-20/7b47834f-578f-4c20-9349-926bb925d718/7741bcadf71fa4e3ccc1059c72d06682a79fa98f2198e5f27d8644844b9f8c48.jpg)

# Komitmen pada Lingkungan, Sosial, dan Tata Kelola

# Commitment to Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG)

Mitratel berfokus pada keberlanjutan dengan mengadopsiti tata kelola berstandar tinggi, berinovasi dalam penggunaan material yang ramah lingkungan,{serta memperlugasinisiatif tanggung jawab sosial. Upaya ini dilakukan untuk memastikan Mitratel mampu bertumbuh secara berkelanjutan dalam jangka panjang. Dalam rangka mengurangi emisi karbon, Mitratel juga makukanan peremajaan panel surya, modifikasi pada genset,{serta mengadopsipenggunaan baterai lithium.Selainitu, Mitratel turut memberikan solusi kepada MNO melalui layanan platform as a service (PaaS) yang mendukung efisiensi energia dan pengurangan jejak karbon.

Mitratel is focused on sustainability by adopting high-standard governance practices, innovating with environmentally friendly materials, and expanding its social responsibility initiatives. These efforts are aimed at ensuring long-term sustainable growth. As part of its carbon emission reduction strategy, Mitratel is also rejuvenating solar panels, modifying generators, and adopting lithium battery usage. Additionally, Mitratel provides solutions to MNOs through its platform as a service (PaaS) offerings that support energy efficiency and carbon footprint reduction.

![](https://cdn-mineru.openxlab.org.cn/result/2025-10-20/7b47834f-578f-4c20-9349-926bb925d718/29b5e738b2ecea7dd361f62117f129a71aecc4f79f4aaeb8255b23b2336c617e.jpg)

# Kinerja Keuangan dan Operational yang Solid

# Solid Financial and Operational Performance

- Mitratel memiliki arus kas yang kuat dan menghasilan pendapatan berulang dari penyewaan menara jangka panjang, didukung oleh pelanggan berkualitas,seperti Telkomsel, Indosat Oredoo Hutchison, XL Axiata, dan Smartfren.  
- Struktur modal dan tingkat profitabilitas yang seh memungkinkan Mitratel untuk terus gerekspansi baik secara organik maupun inorganik.

- Mitratel maintains strong cash flow and generates recurring income from long-term tower leasing, supported by high-quality customers, such as Telkomsel, Indosat Oredoo Hutchison, XL Axiata, and Smartfren.  
- A healthy capital structure and profitability levels enables Mitratel to continuously expand both organically and inorganically.

# Corporate Action

# Pelaksanaan Program MESOP

Pada tanggal 1 November 2024 sampai dengan tanggal 12 Desember 2024, Perseroan melaksanan program Management and Employee Stock Ownership Plan (MESOP) Tahap Iunjumlah nihil saham dengan tidak Rp720,00 per lembar saham, Tahap Ilunjumlah 35.500 saham dengan tidak Rp636,00 per lembar saham, dan Tahap IIIunjumlah 6.881.300 saham dengan tidak Rp582,00 per lembar saham. Aksi korpasi tersebut berdampak pada struktur permodalan Perseroan yang ditunjukkan sebagai berikut.

# Implementation of MESOP Program

From November 1, 2024, to December 12, 2024, the Company executed the Management and Employee Stock Ownership Plan (MESOP) Phase I with nil shares at a price of Rp720.00 per share, Phase II with 35,500 shares at a price of Rp636.00 per share, and Phase III with 6,881,300 shares at a price of Rp582.00 per share. This corporate action impacted the Company's capital structure as shown below.

# 1 Februar / February 2024

Bursa Efek Indonesiapiritumkan Bahwa Perseroan resmi menjadi konstituendeks LQ45 per 1 Februar 2024. Indeks LQ45 dikenal bergengsi karena merupakan merepresentasikan 45 saham emiten terbaik di Bursa Efek Indonesia, yang dipilih berdasarkan likuiditas tinggi, kapitalisasiasar terbesar,serta memenuhi segumlah kriteria lainnya.

Indonesia Stock Exchange (IDX) announced that the Company officially became a constituent of LQ45 index as of February 1, 2024. LQ45 index is prestigious as it represents the 45 best-listed companies on IDX, selected based on high liquidity, largest market capitalization, and other key criteria.

# 29 Februari/February 2024

PerseroanmereihpenghargaandiBAZNASAward2024sebagai PerusahaanPembayarZakatTerbaikdariBadanAmilZakat Nasional. Penghargaanini diberikankopadaMitratelataskontribusibesdaralam pembayaran zakat,infak,sedekah yangmerata di seluruh Indonesia.

The Company received an award at BAZNAS Award 2024 as the Best Zakat Paying Company from National Amil Zakat Agency (BAZNAS). This award was given to Mitratel for its significant contributions in zakat, infaq, and sadaqah payments, which are distributed evenly across Indonesia.

# 29 Februari / February 2024

Perseroan meraih penghargaan di Asian Telecom Awards 2024-Sebagai Wholesale Company Initiative of The Year dari Asian Telecom. Penghargaan ini diberikan kepada Mitratel atasinisiatif-inisiatif inovatif yang signifikan dalam memenuhi kebutuhan layanan wholesale, termasuk IPO terbesar dalam sejarah BUMN, menjadi pemimpin penyedia menara di Asia Tenggara, dan transformasi traditional towerco menjadi infraco.

The Company won the Wholesale Company Initiative of The Year award at Asian Telecom Awards 2024, presented by Asian Telecom. This award recognizes Mitratel's innovative initiatives in meeting wholesale service needs, including the largest IPO in SOE history, becoming the leading tower provider in Southeast Asia, and transforming from a traditional tower company (towerco) into an infrastructure company (intraco).

# Para Pemegang Saham dan Pemangku Kepentingan yang Terhormat,

Dear Esteemed Shareholders and Stakeholders,

Puji dan syukur kami panjatkan ke hadirat Tuhan Yang Maha Esa atas segala rahmat dan karunia-Nya, Seeingga PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi Tbk ("Mitratel") dapat melalui tahun 2024 dengan pencapaian yang membanggakan. Sepanjang tahun, kami melihat Mitratel terus menuunjukkan ketahanan yang solid dalam menghadapi dinamika ekonomi dan industri, didukung oleh kinerja keuangan dan pertumbuhan profitabilitas yang positif,{serta posisi keuangan yang semakin kuat, yang mencerminkan efektivitas strategi bisnis yang diterapkan. Selain itu, keunggulan operational serta inovasi yang dilakukan telah memberikan nilai tambah seeingga memperkuat fundamental dan daya saing Mitratel di tengah dinamika industri.

Sepanjang tahun, kami terus melakukan pengawasan dan pemberian nasihat kepada Direksi untuk memastikan kebujakan yang diambil selaras dengan visi jangka panjang dan prinsip Tata Kelola Perusahaan yang Baik (Good Corporate Governance/GCG). Adapun telah pengawasan Dewan Komisaris terhadap operasional Mitratel di sepanjang tahun 2024 dapat kami sampaikan sebagai berikut.

# Situasi Ekonomi dan Industri

Perekonomian tahun 2024 menghadapi tersebut dans lepas terdapat yang dipengaruhi oleh ketidak pastian politik global, inflasi yang telah tinggi di menjadi negara, ada kebjikan moneter yang ketat dianyak wilayah. Meskipun demikian, ekonomi domestik menunjukkan ketahanan yang baik dengan tambuh 5,03%, didorong oleh konsumsi masyarakat yang kuat, stabilitas sektor keuangan, ada-serifakan pemerintah yang mendukung pertumbuhan investasi dan industri.

Dalam perkembangan industri, tren digitalisasi dan peningkatan adopsiologi terus menjadi pendorong utama pertumbuhan. Mitratel melihat peluang yang@cukup希望大家 mendukung peningkatan kebutuhan, dan layanan digital seiring dengan perubahan perilaku konsumen dan aktelerasi transformasi digital di berbagai sektor. Namun, tantangan tetap ada, termasuk persaingan yang semakin ketat yang didorong perubahan lanskap industri seluler dan strategi para operator Seluler (mobile network operator/MNO) yang mengharuskan Mitratel untuk tetap adaptif dan inovatif.

Kami menilai telah Mitratel mampu menavigasi tantangan ini dengan baik melalui strategi yang terarah, peningkatan efisiensi operasional, seda inovasi yang berkelanjutan. Dengan pendekatan yang proaktif dalam mengantisipasi

We would like to extend our highest praise and gratitude to God Almighty for His blessings and grace, enabling PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi Tbk ("Mitratel") to navigate the year 2024 with remarkable achievements. Throughout the year, we witnessed Mitratel demonstrating solid resilience in facing economic and industry dynamics, supported by positive financial performance, profitability growth, and a strengthened financial position, reflecting effectiveness of the business strategies implemented. Additionally, operational excellence and continuous innovation have added significant value, further reinforcing Mitratel's fundamentals and competitiveness amid industry dynamics.

Throughout the year, we continuously provided oversight and advisory support to the Board of Directors to ensure that the decisions made align with the Company's long-term vision and the principles of Good Corporate Governance (GCG). The results of the Board of Commissioners' oversight of Mitratel's operations throughout 2024 are as follows.

# Economic and Industry Situation

The economy in 2024 faced various challenges influenced by global geopolitical uncertainties, persistently high inflation in several countries, and tight monetary policies in many regions. Despite these external pressures, the domestic economy demonstrated strong resilience, growing by  $5.03\%$ , driven by robust consumer spending, financial sector stability, and government policies that supported investment growth and industrial development.

In terms of industry trends, digitalization and the increasing adoption of technology have remained key drivers of growth. Mitratel sees significant opportunities in supporting the rising demand for digital services, fueled by shifting consumer behavior and the acceleration of digital transformation across various sectors. However, challenges persist, including intensifying competition driven by changes in the mobile industry landscape and the evolving strategies of mobile network operators (MNOs), requiring Mitratel to remain adaptive and innovative.

We believe that Mitratel has successfully navigated these challenges through well-directed strategies, operational efficiency improvements, and continuous innovation. With a proactive approach in anticipating market changes and

perubahan pasar dan memperkuat daya saing, kami optimis Mitratel dapat terus tambuh dan memberikan nilai tambah bagi Pemegang Saham<serta seluruh pemangku kepentingan.

# Pengawasan dan Penilaian atas Kinerja Direksi

Di tengah dinamika makroekonomi{serta industri yang Berkembang, kami menilai bahwa Direksi telah menujukkan kinerja yang solid sepanjang tahun 2024 segalan dengan strategi bisnis dan target pertumbuhan yang telah ditetapkan. Pencapaian ini semakin kuat dengan adanya ekspansi tenant bara baik melalui Built to Suit (B2S) maupun co-location. Kami memandang Mitratel mampu mencyeimbangkan penambahan tower bara melalui B2S dengan co-location sesuai kebutuhan para MNO dalam menjalankan strategi bisnisnya. Pendekatan ini memberikan sudah yang positif bagi pertumbuhan bisnis, dan kami melihat bahwa strategi ini berada dalam jalur yang dapat dan mendukung pertumbuhan jangka panjang.

Kami terus mendorong peningkatan efisiensi operasional, terutama dalam hal operation dan maintenance menjadi{serta pengelolaan sewalahan yang merupakan komponen biaya terbesar. Upaya yang dilakukan telah menuunjukkan sudah positif,logguk mengakuangbagi efisiensi yang berkelanjutan dalam/beberapa tahun mendatang.

Selain dari bisnis organik, kami mendorong Direksi untuk terus mengidentifikasi peluang-peluang inorganik yang sesuai dengan strategi Mitratel dan berpotensi memberikan kontribusi positif bagi pertumbuhan Mitratel, baik dalam jangka pendek, menengah, tingga panjang. Langkah ini merupakan bagian dari strategi untuk memerkitau fundamental bisnis serta mencatkan kepermimpinan dan daya saing Mitratel diASA mendatang. Dengan berbagai upaya yang telah dilakukan, kami memberikan presiasi atas kinerja Direksi dan mendorong kelanjutan strategi yang proaktif serta inovatif untuk mendukung pertumbuhan berkelanjutan Mitratel.

# Frekuensi dan Cara Pemberian Nasihat kepada Direksi

Kami secara aktif menjalankan fungsi pengawasan dan pemberian nasihat kepada Direksi melalui berbagai mekanisme komunikasi dan koordinasi yang terstruktur. Interaksi antara Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi dilakukan secara Berkala melaluiRAPAT Dewan Komisaris,rapat gabungan dengan Direksi,erta komunikasi informal untuk memastikan keselarasan dalam pengambilan keputusan strategis dan operasional.

strengthening competitiveness, we are confident that Mitratel will continue to grow and deliver added value to Shareholders and all stakeholders.

# Supervision and Assessment of the Board of Directors' Performance

In the midst of evolving macroeconomic and industry dynamics, we assess that the Board of Directors demonstrated solid performance throughout 2024, in line with the established business strategy and growth targets. This achievement has been further strengthened by the expansion of new tenants through both Built to Suit (B2S) and co-location. We believe that Mitratel has successfully balanced the addition of new towers via B2S with co-location to align with the business strategies of MNOs. This approach has yielded positive results for business growth, and we see that this strategy is on the right track, supporting long-term expansion.

We continue to encourage improvements in operational efficiency, particularly in tower operation and maintenance, as well as land lease management, which represent the largest cost components. The initiatives undertaken have already delivered positive results, opening opportunities for sustainable efficiency in the coming years.

In addition to organic business growth, we encourage the Board of Directors to continuously identify inorganic opportunities that align with Mitratel's strategy and have the potential to contribute positively to its growth in the short, medium, and long term. This initiative is part of the broader strategy to strengthen the Company's business fundamentals while enhancing its leadership and competitiveness in the future. With the various efforts that have been undertaken, we express our appreciation for the Board of Directors' performance and support the continuation of a proactive and innovative strategy to drive Mitratel's sustainable growth.

# Frequency and Method of Providing Advice to the Board of Directors

We actively carry out the supervisory and advisory functions to the Board of Directors through various structured communication and coordination mechanisms. The interaction between the Board of Commissioners and the Board of Directors is conducted regularly through Board of Commissioners meetings, joint meetings with the Board of Directors, as well as informal communication to ensure alignment in strategic and operational decision-making.

Setiap anggota Direksi dinilai telah menjalankan perannya dengan efektif di bidang masing-masing. Direktur Utama secara keseluruhan kami pandang telah@cukup efektif dalam mengendalan Mitratel dengan semangat dan determinasi yang tinggi untuk mendorong pertumbuhan bisnis. Direktur Bisnis memiliki peran kunci dalam memastikan ekspansi bisnis melalui pertumbuhan tenant dan pengembangan lini bisnis fiber yang prospektif. Direktur Operasi dan Pembangunan kami nilai telah berhasil dalam menjaga operational excellence dan mengoptimalkan efisiensi biaya termasuk dalam mengelola biaya sewalahan.

Di sisi pengelolaan keuangan dan risiko, Direktur Keuangan dan Manajemen Risiko berhasil menjaga stabilitas keuangan dan mendemonstrasikan pengelolaan risiko yang baik. Sementara itu, Direktur Investasi telah berperan penting dalam membruka peluang pertumbuhan jangka panjang melalui kegiatan inorganik, pengelolaan pendanaan dan membrgangun engagement dengan investor seesingga Mitratel mendapatkan persepsi positif.

Kami memberikan arahan strategis yang disesuaikan dengan kondisi industri dan dinamika bisnis yang dihadapi Mitratel. Dengan pendekatan kolaboratif, kami memastikan bahwa seluruhinisiatif dan strategi yang difalankan Direksi tidakanya mendukung pertumbuhan jangka pendek, tetapijuga memerkitau fundamental bisnis untuk mencapai keberlanjutan jangka panjang.

# View on the Implementation of Good Corporate Governance

We assess that the implementation of GCG in Mitratel has been consistently carried out, based on the principles of ethical behavior, accountability, transparency, and sustainability. A strong GCG implementation serves as the fundamental basis for ensuring effective management, decision-making aligned with the interests of Shareholders, and the protection of the rights of all stakeholders. To support this, we observe that Mitratel continuously strengthens its supervisory and internal control systems, enhances transparency in financial reporting, and ensures compliance with applicable regulations. Additionally, proactive measures in risk management continue to be developed to anticipate various business challenges, whether in operations, finance, or compliance with the evolving industry policies.

We also emphasize that good governance should not only focus on compliance but also create long-term value for all Mitratel stakeholders. Therefore, we encourage Mitratel to continue integrating ESG aspects into its business strategy and ensure that business growth aligns with

strategi bisnisinya, dan memastikan bahwa pertumbuhan usaha selaras dengan tanggung jawab sosial dan keberlanjutan lingkungan. Dengan menerapkan prinsipprinsip tata kelola yang kokoh dan berorientasi pada masa depan, Mitratel diharapkan dapat terus menc Gatkan daya saing, mendertahankan kepercayaan investor, serta memberikan kontribusi positif bagi ekosistem bisnis dan masyarakat secara luas.

# Views on Business Prospects

We assess that Mitratel's business prospects in 2025 have a strong foundation, supported by market leadership with recurring revenue that ensures long-term financial stability. The strategic plan has been well-communicated, and there are concrete efforts to achieve growth targets through both organic and inorganic business initiatives. With a solid foundation and the largest market share, there is an expectation for growth that not only follows the market but also exceeds industry growth and generates higher added value. Therefore, innovation efforts and breakthrough initiatives must continue to be proactively developed to remain relevant and maintain competitiveness in the industry.

Furthermore, Mitratel is expected to effectively address the challenges of capital expenditure efficiency strategies implemented by MNOs, through an infrastructure-sharing strategy, such as co-location tower schemes, fiber-optic sharing, and power as a service, to optimize asset utilization while enhancing profitability level.

Mitratel's prospects are also driven by the potential increase in tenancy ratio and billable fiber-optic length, as well as the strengthening of new business portfolios such as power as a service. By expanding contributions from new business segments, Mitratel can create more diversified revenue streams and unlock broader expansion opportunities. With a comprehensive and adaptive strategy, Mitratel is expected to sustain solid growth, enhance industry competitiveness, and deliver optimal long-term value for Shareholders and all stakeholders.

# Para Pemegang Saham, Dewan Komisaris, dan Para Pemangku Kepentingan yang Terhormat, Distinguished Shareholders, Board of Commissioners, and Stakeholders,

Puji dan syukur kami panjatkan ke hadirat Tuhan Yang Maha Esa atas pencapaian yang telah diraih PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi Tbk ("Mitratel") sepanjang tahun 2024. Tahun ini menjadiperiode yang penuh tantangan sekalis gus peluang bagi Mitratel dalam menjaga pertumbuhan dan daya saing di tengah dinamika ekonomi global maupun domestik. Namun, dengan strategi yang terarah dan komitmen terhadap inovasi, Mitratel terus memerkitut fundamental bisnis untuk mencapai pertumbuhan yang berkelanjutan.

Sejalan dengan tema "Expanding Digital Connectivity Across Frontiers", MitratelBERkomitmen untuk memperlugas akses dan jangkauan infrastruktur dalam mendukung konektivitas digital guna mendorong transformasi industri, mendukung pertumbuhan ekonomi, ada mencapatkan inklusi digital bagi masyarakat luas. Dengan memercepat pembangunan infrastruktur dan optimalisasi technologi, Mitratel tidakanyak memerkituat posisi sebagai pemimpin di industri, tetapi juga berkontribusi dalam membranung ekosistem digital yang lebih inklusif dan efisien. Mitratel percaya telah dengan konektivitas yang lebih luas dan andal, peluang ekonomi dapat tumbuh lebih cepat, mendukung inovasi di berbagai sektor, seda menciptakan dampak ekonomi dan sosial yang lebihistarui seluruh wilayah operasi. Perjalanan Mitratel dalam mewujudkan komitmen tersebut secara ringkas kami sampikan sebagai berikut.

# Economic and Industry Situation

The year 2024 was a challenging period for both the global and national economies. Various external factors affected global economic stability, including rising energy prices due to geopolitical conflicts and a surge in post-pandemic demand, which led to inflationary pressures in many countries. Financial market volatility and tighter monetary policies in several nations further slowed investment flows and impacted consumer purchasing power. These conditions influenced global capital flows, exchange rates, and the stability of industrial sectors across different countries, including Indonesia.

Despite these challenges, the Indonesian economy continues to show good resilience by growing  $5.03\%$ , driven by robust domestic consumption and supported by the stability of the financial sector as well as adaptive fiscal and monetary policies. On the other hand, the digital and telecommunications industry continued to expand as communication methods evolved through various social media platforms and the increasing adoption of internet-

Oleh karena itu, strategi yang adaptif dan inovatif sarat diperlukan untuk memastikan keberlanjutan bisnis. Penguatan keunggulan kompetitif melalui inovasi tekologi sesuai kebutuhan pelanggan, efisiensi operasional, serta pengelolaan risiko yang optimalunjadi faktor utama bagi Mitratel dalam menjaga daya saing dan pertumbuhan yang berkelanjutan.

# Mitratel's Challenges and Strategies in 2024

Amid the evolving macroeconomic and industry dynamics, Mitratel faces an increasingly challenging landscape, including a high-interest rate environment, MNOs becoming more efficient in capital expenditures, and intensifying industry competition. These dynamics drive Mitratel to continuously innovate in delivering superior services tailored to MNO needs, supported by efficient financial instruments while simultaneously enhancing efficiency across all operational lines. Mitratel also recognizes the ongoing trend of MNOs divesting non-core assets, which presents potential opportunities for the company. Additionally, the possibility of MNO consolidation remains open, requiring Mitratel to stay adaptive and responsive to industry dynamic.

Mitratel is also actively engaged in the latest technological advancements, including in the Non-Terrestrial Network (NTN) domain, which has the potential to drive the transformation of the telecommunications industry, particularly in rural areas. As the digital ecosystem continues to evolve, the demand for more advanced and efficient telecommunications infrastructure is increasing. Therefore, Mitratel must ensure that its services remain relevant to the needs of telecom operators and customers.

To address these challenges, Mitratel implements a dual-pronged strategy through both organic and inorganic expansion to develop an integrated telecommunications tower ecosystem tailored to the needs of telecom operators. The Board of Directors plays a central role in formulating and implementing business strategies that align with Mitratel's vision and mission to ensure sustainable growth. Every strategic decision is based on in-depth analysis of industry conditions, market dynamics, and global and domestic economic trends. The Board also proactively identifies new growth opportunities and anticipates potential risks that could impact Mitratel's operational and financial performance. By leveraging a data-driven approach and strategic decision-making, the Board ensures that the implemented strategies enhance competitiveness and create added value for Shareholders and all stakeholders.

As part of its responsibilities, the Board of Directors implements a strict control system over financial functions to ensure that every aspect of financial planning, execution, and evaluation operates optimally. # Performance Achievement and Targets in 2024

Throughout 2024, Mitratel achieved solid growth across various key performance indicators. With a focused and adaptive strategy, Mitratel successfully enhanced operational efficiency by optimizing assets, digitalizing business processes, and implementing more effective cost management policies, leading to improved profitability. Additionally, Mitratel demonstrated strong operational performance through regional expansion and enhanced service capabilities, ensuring a stronger competitive edge in the industry and maximizing long-term growth opportunities.

Mitratel's revenue grew by  $7.2\%$  to Rp9,307.8 billion, achieving  $101.9\%$  of the target, while Earnings Before Interest, Taxes, Depreciation, and Amortization (EBITDA) increased by  $10.2\%$  to Rp7,695.6 billion, which is equivalent to achieving  $105.7\%$  of the target set. Net profit also grew  $4.8\%$  to Rp2,107.7 billion, exceeding the target at  $110.1\%$ . Furthermore, Mitratel improved profitability, with an EBITDA margin increasing to  $82.7\%$  and a net profit margin of  $22.6\%$ , compared to  $80.4\%$  and  $23.2\%$  in the previous year, respectively. This achievement of EBITDA margin also exceeded the target set for the previous year. These achievements reflect the effectiveness of the implemented strategy and the strong synergy across the organization.

Compared to the targets set, Mitratel's overall performance has shown positive achievements in terms of profitability, revenue growth, and operational performance. Mitratel has solidified its position as the largest tower provider in Southeast Asia, by increasing its tower ownership by  $3.7\%$  to 39,404 towers, with an estimated market share of  $37\%$ . # Penerapan Tata Kelola Perusahaan

Mitratel terus bergommen untuk menciptakan prinsipprinsip GCG guna menciptakan transparansi, akuntabilitas, serta keberlanjutan bisnis yang berorientasi padakepentangan jangka panjang Pemegang Saham dan pemangku kepentangan lainnya. Implementasi Pedoman Umum Governansi Korporat Indonesia (PUGKI)unjadi langkah strategis dalam mencatingkatan integritas, akuntabilitas, serta efektivitas pengelolaan perusahaan. Dengan mengadopsi pedoman ini, Mitratel memastikan pengambilan keputusan yang transparan, perlakuan adil terhadap pemangku kepentangan, serta pengembangan bisnis yang selaras dengan standar industri. Selain itu, kebijakan tata kelola yang diterapkan juga mencerminkan komitmen Mitratel dalam membranungsystem bisnis yang lebih kuat, adaptif, dan bertanggung jawab terhadap risiko operasional maupun aspek keberlanjutan.

Sepanjang tahun 2024, Mitratel terus memperkuat tata kelola melalui peran aktif komite di bawah Dewan Komisaris, termasuk Komite Audit, Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi, seda Komite Evaluasi dan Monitoring Perencanaan dan Risiko, guna memastikan efektivitas pengawasan dan kepadauhan terhadap regulasi. Mitratel juga mempertahankan berbagai tertifikasi internasional,seperti ISO 9001:2015 ingin Sistem Manajemen Mutu, ISO 45001:2018 Sistem Manajemen Kesehatan dan Keselamatan Kerja (K3), ISO 31000:2018 ingin Sistem Manajemen Risiko, ISO/IEC 27001:2013 ingin Sistem Manajemen Keamanan Informasi, ISO 37001:2016 ingin Sistem Manajemen Anti Penyuapan, seda ISO 14001:2015 ingin Sistem Manajemen Lingkungan menjadi pentuk komitmenteringadap tata kelola yang profesional dan berstandar global. Langkah ini bertujuan untuk memperkuat integritas bisnisanya memitigasi risiko operasional dan finansial yang dapat mempengaruhi kinerja jangka panjang Mitratel.

In facing the increasingly competitive industrial dynamics, Mitratel will continue to drive innovation and enhance operational efficiency through the adoption of new technologies, business process automation, and the utilization of data analytics for more accurate decision-making. Proactive risk management and increased operational flexibility will also be key strategies to ensure business resilience against market and regulatory changes. With a comprehensive strategy, an adaptive approach, and a strong commitment to digital transformation and sustainability, Mitratel is well-prepared to tackle challenges, seize greater opportunities, sustain solid growth, and create optimal value for all stakeholders.

# Implementation of Corporate Governance

Mitratel remains committed to implementing GCG principles to foster transparency, accountability, and business sustainability that aligns with the long-term interests of Shareholders and other stakeholders. The implementation of the Indonesian Corporate Governance Guidelines (PUGKI) serves as a strategic step to enhance integrity, accountability, and the effectiveness of corporate management. By adopting these guidelines, Mitratel ensures transparent decision-making, fair treatment of stakeholders, and business development that aligns with industry standards. Additionally, the governance policies in place reflect Mitratel's commitment to building a stronger, more adaptive, and responsible business system that addresses operational risks and sustainability aspects.

Throughout 2024, Mitratel continued to strengthen its governance through the active role of committees under the Board of Commissioners, including the Audit Committee, the Nomination and Remuneration Committee, as well as Committee for Planning and Risk Evaluation and Monitoring, to ensure effective oversight and regulatory compliance. Mitratel also maintained various international certifications, such as ISO 9001:2015 for Quality Management System, ISO 45001:2018 for Occupational Health and Safety (OHS) Management System, ISO 31000:2018 for Risk Management System, ISO/IEC 27001:2013 for Information Security Management System, ISO 37001:2016 for Anti-Bribery Management System, and ISO14001:2015forEnvironmental Management Systems, as a commitment to professional and globally recognized governance standards. This initiative aims to strengthen business integrity and mitigate operational and financial risks that could impact Mitratel's long-term performance.

Mitratelunga terus mengembangkaninisiatif penting guna meningkatkan efektivitas tata kelola, melalui pengerapan Whistleblowing System (WBS) yang memastikan adanya mekanisme pelaporan yang aman dan transparan terhadap potensipelanggaranetikaataukepatuhan. Selainitu, Mitratel secara aktif makukan penandatangan pakta integritas oleh seluruh kanyakan serta mengadakan program edukasi terkait etika bisnis, anti-korupsi, dan perlindungan data sebagai bagian dari budaya pada kelola yang bertanggung jawab. Digitalisasi dalam system pada kelola juga terus dioptimalkan guna mencakatkan efisiensi dan efektivitas pengelolaan Mitratel. Dengan strategi yang komprehensif ini, Mitratel optimis dapat terus menjaga kepercayaan pemangku kepada, mencakatkan daya saing, ada memastikan pertumbuhan bisnis yang berkelanjutan di tengah dinamika industri yang terus berkembang.

# Apresiasi

Melalui kesempatan ini, Direksi mencapaikan presiasi settinggi-tingginya kepada seluruh kanyakan atas dedikasi, kerja keras,{serta komitmen yang telah menjadi fondasi utama dalam mendorong pertumbuhan dan keberlanjutan usaha Mitratel. Selain itu, kami juga mencapaikan presiasi kepada segenap jajaran Dewan Komisaris atas arahan dan pandangan yang diberikan sepanjang tahun. Penghargaan dan terima kasih yang sebesar-besarnya jugaki sampaikan kepada Pemegang Saham,mitra bisnis, regulator,{serta seluruh pemangku kepentingan lainnya atas kepercayaan,dukungan,dan kolaborasi yang telahdiberikan sepanjang tahun 2024.Keberhasilan Mitratel dalam menghadapi tantangan{serta meraih berbagai pencapaian strategis tidak terlepas dari kontribusi aktif dan sinergi yang terjalin dengan baik di seluruh lini bisnis.

Kami berkomitmen untuk terus beradaptasi dengan perkembangan industri, memperkuat daya saing melalui inovasi, ada memastikan keberlanjutan bisnis yang selaras dengan kebutuhanasar dan tantangan global. Kami percaya telah dengan dukungan dan kerja sama yang erat dari semua pihak, Mitratel dapat terus tambuh secara berkelanjutananya memberikan kontribusi yang lebih tersebut bagi pemerataan akses digital ke seluruh wilayah Indonesia.

Mitratel also continues to develop key initiatives to enhance governance effectiveness, through the implementation of a Whistleblowing System (WBS), ensuring a secure and transparent reporting mechanism for potential ethical or compliance violations. Additionally, Mitratel actively enforces the signing of an integrity pact by all employees and conducts educational programs on business ethics, anti-corruption, and data protection as part of a responsible governance culture. The digitalization of governance systems is also continuously optimized to improve Mitratel's management efficiency and effectiveness. With this comprehensive strategy, Mitratel remains optimistic about maintaining stakeholder trust, enhancing competitiveness, and ensuring sustainable business growth amid the ever-evolving industry dynamics.

# Appreciation

Through this opportunity, the Board of Directors expresses its highest appreciation to all employees for their dedication, hard work, and commitment, which have been the main foundation in driving Mitratel's growth and business sustainability. In addition, we also extend our gratitude to the Board of Commissioners for the guidance and insights throughout the year. Our deepest appreciation and thanks also go to the Shareholders, business partners, regulators, and all other stakeholders for their trust, support, and collaboration throughout 2024. Mitratel's success in overcoming challenges and achieving various strategic milestones would not have been possible without the active contributions and strong synergy established across all business lines.

We are committed to continuously adapting to industry developments, strengthening competitiveness through innovation, and ensuring business sustainability in alignment with market needs and global challenges. We believe that with the support and close collaboration of all stakeholders, Mitratel can continue to grow sustainably and make a greater contribution to the equitable expansion of digital access across Indonesia.

# - Jejak Langkah

# Milestones

# 1995

Didirikan pada tanggal 18 Oktober 1995 denganNama PT Dayamitra Malindo dengan Akta Notaris HM Afdal Gazali, SH No. 50 tanggal 18 Oktober 1995.

Founded on October 18, 1995, under the name PT Dayamitra Malindo under Notarial Deed made before Notary HM Afdal Gazali, SH. No. 50 dated October 18, 1995.

# 1997

Mengubahnama menjadi PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi dengan Akta Notaris Hendra Karyadi, SH No. 53 tanggal 28 Agustus 1997.

Renamed into PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi under Notarial Deed made before Notary Hendra Karyadi, SH. No. 53 dated August 28, 1997.

# 2008

- Mendapatkan persetujuan dari Entitas Induk untuk menjadikan bisnis menara telekomunikasi sebagai aktivitas bisnis utama Perseroan, yang diferingati sebagai hari-lahir PTDayamitra Telekomunikasi(Mitratel) seksual dengan Keputusan Direksi.  
- Menandatangani perjanjian kerja sama dengan skema sewa (non-revenue sharing) untuk pertama kalinya dengan PT Telkom Indonesia (Persero) Tbk melalui Perjanjian Pengadaan Pekerjaan Jasa Penyediaan (Sewa) Sarana Pendukung SITAC/CME Nasional 2008, ada dengan PT Excelcomindo Pratama Tbk melalui Perjanjian Sewa Menewa Infrastruktur.  
- Received approval from the Parent Entity to establish the telecommunication tower business as the Company's main business activity, commemorated as the founding day of PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi (Mitratel) in accordance with the Board of Directors' Decision.  
- Signed the first lease agreement (non-revenue sharing scheme) with PT Telkom Indonesia (Persero) Tbk through the 2008 National SITAC/CMESupport Services (Lease) Procurement Agreement, as well as with PT Excelcomindo Pratama Tbk through the Infrastructure Lease Agreement.

# 2009

- Mitratel menandatangani perjanjian sewa说我wewafinfrasstrukturtelekomunikasi:denganPTNatrindoTeleponSeluler dan PT Hutchison CP Telecommunication.  
- Mitratel menerima penghargaan dari PT Excelcomindo Pratama Tbk berupa Good Achievement Partner atas keberHASILAN pencapaian yang telah diraih.  
- Mitratel signed a telecommunications infrastructure lease agreement with PT Natrindo Telepon Seluler and PT Hutchison CP Telecommunication.  
- Mitratel received an award from PT Excelcomindo Pratama Tbk as a Good Achievement Partner for its outstanding achievements.

# 2011

- Mitratel menerima Shareholder Loan (SHL) dari PT Telkom Indonesia (Persero) Tbk, sebesar Rp655 miliar pada takap pertama dan Rp550 miliar pada takap kedua, serta fasilitas kredit jangka panjang dari PT Bank Rakyat Indonesia (Persero) Tbk sebesar Rp1triliun.  
- Mitratel menandatangani kontrak penyewaan menara dengan Indosat dan Smartfren, sama makukan pengalihan pengelolaan 1.401 site Tower Divisi Infratel dan DTF milik TelkomGroup.  
- Mitratel memulai pembangunan In-Building Solution (IBS) di 9 lokasi gedung perkantoran dan bisnis.  
- Melakukan akuisisi 913 titik IBS dan menjadi reseller dari 1.300 site IBS milik PT Telekomunikasi Selular yang dipindahkan ke operator telekomunikasi lain.  
- Mitratel received a Shareholder Loan (SHL) from PT Telkom Indonesia (Persero) Tbk, amounting to Rp655 billion in the first phase and Rp550 billion in the second phase, as well as a long-term credit facility from PT Bank Rakyat Indonesia (Persero) Tbk amounting to Rp1 trillion.  
- Mitratel signed tower lease contracts with Indosat and Smartfren and took over the management of 1,401 tower sites from TelkomGroup's Infratel and DTF divisions.  
- Mitratel began the development of In-Building Solutions (IBS) in 9 office and commercial buildings.  
- Acquired 913 IBS points and became a reseller of 1,300 IBS sites owned by PT Telekomunikasi Selular, which were transferred to other telecommunications operators.

# 2010

- Mitratel mendirikan 10 kantor regional di seluruh Indonesia untuk memperlugas jaringan usaha{serta area aktivitas bisnis perusahaan.  
- Mitratel seksual dan perjanjian kerja sama dengan PT Telekomunikasi Selular terkait sewa menyewa infrastruktur telekomunikasi berupa pesanan built-tosuit dan colocation. Selain uti, Mitratel juga menjalin perjanjian kerja sama dengan PT Telkom Indonesia (Persero) Tbk, PT Telekomunikasi Selular, dan PT XL Axiata Tbk sebagai reseller atas aset menara yangmereka miliki, serta seksualan kerja sama tower sharing dengan PT Indosat Tbk.  
- Mitratel established 10 regional offices across Indonesia to expand its business network and operational areas.  
- Mitratel entered into a cooperation agreement with PT Telekomunikasi Selular for leasing telecommunications infrastructure through built-to-suit and colocation orders. Additionally, Mitratel established cooperation agreements with PT Telkom Indonesia (Persero) Tbk, PT Telekomunikasi Selular, and PT XL Axiata Tbk as resellers of their tower assets, as well as a tower-sharing collaboration with PT Indosat Tbk.

# 2011

- Mitratel berpartisipasi dalam tender proyek Universal Service Obligation (USO) untuk pembangunan Base Transceiver Station (BTS) di kawasan perbatasan dan Wi-Fi untuk kabupaten bersama PT Telekomunikasi Selular dan PT Telkom Indonesia (Persero) Tbk.  
- Mitratel juga membrangun BTS Hotel di Sentul City sebagai projek percontohan untuk bisnisantu.  
- Mitratel berkolaborasi dengan TelkomGroup untuk mempersiapkan pembangunan Wi-Fi di seluruh kota Indonesia, yang dikenal dengan name "Indonesia Wifi".  
- Mitratel participated in the Universal Service Obligation (USO) project tender for the construction of Base Transceiver Stations (BTS) in border areas and Wi-Fi networks for districts, in collaboration with PT Telekomunikasi Selular and PT Telkom Indonesia (Persero)Tbk.

# Riwayat Singkat

# Brief History

PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi Tbk, yang dikenal dengan name Mitratel, adalah sudah kepada perusahaan penyedia infrastruktur menara telekomunikasi terbesar di Indonesia. Mitratel merupakan oleh usaha dari PT Telkom Indonesia (Persero) Tbk, yang bergerak di bidang bisnis menara telekomunikasi beserta ekosistemnya, termasuk jasa penunjangan digital untuk mobile infrastructure, serta optimalisi pemanaatan sumber daya yang dimiliki oleh Perseroan. Kegiatan usaha utama Perseroan telah instalasi telekomunikasi, konstruksi sentral telekomunikasi, aktivitas telekomunikasi dengan kabel dan aktivitas telekomunikasi tanpa kabel.

Mitratel didirikan pada tahun 1995 dan telah mengalami pertumbuhanpesat, baik darisisi jumlah menarayang dimiliki maupun kapabilitas layanan. Pada tahun 2021, Mitratel mencatatkan sejarah penting dengan melantai di Bursa Efek Indonesia melalui penawaran umum saham perdana dengan kode saham MTEL. Langkah ini menjadikan Mitratel sebagai dapat perusahaan publik terbesar di sektor infrastruktur telekomunikasi di Indonesia.

Mitratel tidak dapat dengan menyediakan layanan penyewaan menara tetapi juga menawarkan solusi inovatif,seperti layanan fiberisasi, Micro DC, energia terBARUAN melalui system panel surya (solar panel system), dan tekologi berbasis High Altitude Platform Station (HAPS) atau Flying Tower System (FTS). Perseroan juga mendukung transformasi digital dan pengembangan Industri 4.0 dengan memerkenalkan tekologi berbasis Internet of Things(IoT).

Hingga tahun 2024, Mitratel terus memperlugas portfolio dengan menjadi konstituendi berbagai indeks saham utama di Bursa Efek Indonesia, yang mencerminkan likuiditas tinggi dan fundamental perusahaan yang kuat. Dengan lebih dari 39.000 menara telekomunikasi yang tersebut di seluruh Indonesia, Mitratel Berkomitmen untuk mendukung perkembangan jaringan telekomunikasi nasional dan transformasi digital yang berkelanjutan.

PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi Tbk, known as Mitratel, is one of the largest telecommunications tower infrastructure providers in Indonesia. Mitratel is a subsidiary of PT Telkom Indonesia (Persero) Tbk, which operates in the telecommunications tower business and their ecosystem, including digital support services for mobile infrastructure and optimizing the utilization of the Company's resources. The Company's main business activities include telecommunications installation, central telecommunications construction, wired telecommunications activities, and wireless telecommunications activities.

Mitratel was established in 1995 and has experienced rapid growth in both the number of towers owned and service capabilities. In 2021, Mitratel made a historic milestone by going public on Indonesia Stock Exchange through an initial public offering under the stock code MTEL. This step positioned Mitratel as one of the largest publicly listed companies in the telecommunications infrastructure sector in Indonesia.

Mitratel not only provides tower leasing services but also offers innovative solutions, such as fiberization services, Micro DC, renewable energy through solar panel systems, and High-Altitude Platform Station (HAPS) or Flying Tower System (FTS) technology. The Company also supports digital transformation and the development of Industry 4.0 by introducing Internet of Things (IoT)-based technology.

As of 2024, Mitratel continues to expand its portfolio by becoming a constituent in various major stock indices on Indonesia Stock Exchange, reflecting high liquidity and strong company fundamentals. With more than 39,000 telecommunications towers spread across Indonesia, Mitratel is committed to supporting the development of the national telecommunications network and sustainable digital transformation.

# Nilai-Nilai Perusahaan

# Corporate Values

Nilai-nilai utama (core values) yang disebut AKHLAK menjadi pedoman yang dipegang oleh sumber daya manusia di Badan Usaha Milik Negara (BUMN). Setiap perusaha dan bawah naungan Kementerian BUMN diwajibkan untuk mengadopsi nilai-nilai ini dengan tujuan agar seluruh kanyakan BUMN dapat memahami, mencapkan, dan mempraktikkannya secara sungguh-sungguh, konsisten, dan bertanggung jawab.

Nilai-nilai AKHLAK diharapkan tercermin dalam perilaku sehari-hari karyawan, menjadi landasan budaya kerja, dan sejalan dengan prinsip-prinsip tata Kelola BUMN. AKHLAK mencakup 6 nilai utama, yaitu Amanah, Kompeten, Harmonis, Loyal, Adaptif, dan Kolaboratif.

Di lingkungan Mitratel, implementasi nilai-nilai AKHLAK diwujudkan melalui implementasi Nilai Budaya yang ditetapkan secara resmi dalam kebjikan Perusahaan. Hal ini tertuang dalam Peraturan Direktur Keuangan No. PR.21/HC2/JDMT-10000000/XL/2020tentang Pedoman Penerapan Nilai Inti AKHLAK PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi. Kebijakan ini menjadi acuan utama dalam membranbupudaya kerja yang selaras dengan visi dan misi perusahaan,{serta mendukung tujuan strategis Mitratel sebagai bagian dari BUMN.

The core values known as AKHLAK serve as guiding principles for human resources within State-Owned Enterprises (BUMN). Every company under the Ministry of State-Owned Enterprises is required to adopt these values to ensure that all BUMN employees understand, implement, and practice them earnestly, consistently, and responsibly.

The AKHLAK values are expected to be reflected in employees' daily behavior, forming the foundation of the corporate culture while aligning with BUMN's governance principles. AKHLAK consists of 6 core values: Trustworthy, Competent, Harmonious, Loyal, Adaptive, and Collaborative.

In Mitratel, the implementation of AKHLAK values is realized through the application of Cultural Values, which are officially established in the Company's policies. This is outlined in Finance Director Regulation No. PR.21/HC2/JDMT-10000000/XL/2020 regarding the Guidelines for Implementing AKHLAK Core Values at PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi. This policy serves as the primary reference for building a work culture aligned with the Company's vision and mission while supporting Mitratel's strategic objectives as part of BUMN.

# Company Logo Philosophy

Pemilihan logo Perseroan didasarkan pada pencapaian gemilang di masa lalu, sekalis untuk mencitmen untuk melangkah menuju masa depanyang segar dan penuh inovasi. Logo ini dirancang dengan tampilan yang bersih, elegan, dan modern, mencerminkan semangat inovasi seda pembaruan yang menjadi inti dari perjalanan Perseroan.

Lebihdarisekedaridentasvisual,logoinimerepresentasikan transformasi strategis arah bisnis Perseroan. dari awalnya berfokus sebagai perusahaan menara telekomunikasi, kini Perseroan Berkembang menjadi penyedia layanan yang menekankan dampak luas konektivitas terhadap kepada hidupan manusia dan berbagai tempat. Logo Perseroan terdiri dari 3 elemen, yaituymbol, wordmark, dan parent brand endorsement, PT Telkom Indonesia (Persero) Tbk.

The selection of the Company's logo is based on past outstanding achievements while also serving as a symbol of commitment to stepping into a fresh and innovation-driven future. The logo is designed with a clean, elegant, and modern look, reflecting the spirit of innovation and renewal, which are central to the Company's journey.

More than just a visual identity, this logo represents the strategic transformation of the Company's business direction. Initially focused as a telecommunications tower company, the Company has now evolved into a service provider emphasizing the broad impact of connectivity on human life and various environments. The Company's logo consists of 3 key elements, namely symbol, wordmark, and parent brand endorsement, PT Telkom Indonesia (Persero) Tbk.

Symbol

Simbol yang digunakan oleh Mitratel dirancang sederhana namun sarat makna, menggambarkan esensi merek Mitratel. Garis-garis yang saling terhubung dan memancar ke luarmerepresentasikan menara-menarayang dibangun oleh Mitratel, simbol konektivitas yang menjangkau tingga pelosok, menghubungkan orang-orang dan tempat-tempat di seluruh Indonesia.

Selain mencerminkan peran strategis Mitratel dalam membrangun jaringan komunikasi, simbol ini juga menciptakan tampilan visual yang khas dan mudah dikenali oleh berbagai pemangku kepentingan, termasuk pelanggan, pemerintah, komunitas, dan kanyakan. Hal ini semakin memerkitut nilai dan identitas merek Mitratel sebagai pelopor transformasi konektivitas di Indonesia.

The symbol used by Mitratel is designed to be simple yet deeply meaningful, encapsulating the essence of the Mitratel brand. The interconnected and outward-radiating lines represent the towers built by Mitratel, symbolizing connectivity that extends to the most remote areas, linking people and places across Indonesia.

Beyond reflecting Mitratel's strategic role in developing communication networks, this symbol also establishes a distinctive and recognizable visual identity for various stakeholders, including customers, the government, communities, and employees. This further reinforces Mitratel's brand value and identity as a pioneer in connectivity transformation in Indonesia.

# Produk dan Jasa

# Products and Services

Sebagai perusahaan terkemuka di bidang infrastruktur telekomunikasi, Mitratel Berkomitmen untuk menyediakan solusi yang inovatif dan berkelanjutan bagi pelanggan di seluruh Indonesia. Dengan pengalaman yang luas dan jaringan infrastruktur yang tersebut hingga kepelosok negeri, Mitratel mendukung kemujuan tekologi dan konektivitas untuk memenuhi kebutuhan masarakat yang semakin dinamis. Produk dan jasa yang ditawarkan Mitratel meliputi:

# Tower Leasing

# Built to Suit

Mitratel menawarkan layanan Built to Suit dalam 2 skema, yaitu built to suit makro dan built to suit mikro, untuk memenuhikebutuhan spesifik pelanggandalampenyewaan menara telekomunikasi.

1. Built to Suit Makro

Layanan sewa menara dengan membrangun site makrobaru dengan ketinggian lebih kepada hari ini yang disesuaikan dengan lokasi dan spesifikasi yang ditentukan oleh pelangan sebagai penyewa pertama.

2. Built to Suit Mikro

Layanan penyewaan site mikrobaru dengan ketinggian kurang dari 30 meter untuk kebutuhan luar ruangan. Perseroan menawarkan layanan base transceiver station hotel (BTS Hotel) sebagai selusi untuk mencakkan cakupan dan kapasitas layanan seluler. BTS Hotel ini mencakup base transceiver station room, akses fiber optic (FO), danystem antenna yang terintegrasi pada pada micro pole. Alternatif solusi lain yang lebih sederhana, Perseroan menyiapkan layanan infrastruktur micro cell pole (MCP) sama tanpa BTS room dan akses fiber optic yang lebih efisien.

Untuk solusi dalam ruangan, Perseroan mencyediakan in-building system (IBS) dalam pentuk distribuited antenna system (DAS) yang dirancang untuk mencakatan cakupan jaringan di dalam ruangan dengan memberikan layanan IBS DAS untukagarapa operator selular secara bersama.

# Colocation

Colocation adalah layanan penyewaan menara yang disediakan oleh Mitratel, di mana Perseroan menawarkan menara mikro dan makro yang dimiliki untuk disewa oleh pelanggan. Layanan ini memungkikan pelanggan menc gunakan menara yang disewa untuk kebutuhan sendiri atas menuyawakanya kembali kepada pihak lain.

As a leading company in the telecommunications infrastructure sector, Mitratel is committed to providing innovative and sustainable solutions for customers across Indonesia. With extensive experience and a widespread infrastructure network reaching even remote areas, Mitratel supports technological advancement and connectivity to meet the increasingly dynamic needs of society. The products and services offered by Mitratel include:

# Tower Leasing

# Built to Suit

Mitratel offers Built to Suit services in 2 schemes, namely macro built to suit and micro built to suit, to meet the specific needs of customers in telecom tower leasing.

1. Built to Suit Macro

A tower leasing service by constructing a new macro site with a height of more than or above 30 meters, tailored to the location and specifications determined by the first tenant.

2. Built to Suit Micro

New micro site rental service with a height of less than 30 meters for outdoor needs. The Company offers a base transceiver station hotel (BTS Hotel) service as a solution to enhance mobile service coverage and capacity. This BTS Hotel includes a base transceiver station room, fiber optic (FO) access, and an antenna system integrated onto a micro pole. As a simpler alternative solution, the Company provides a micro cell pole (MCP) infrastructure service only, without a BTS room and fiber optic access, which is more efficient.

For indoor solutions, the Company provides an in-building system (IBS) in the form of a distributed antenna system (DAS) designed to enhance network coverage indoors by providing IBS DAS services for multiple cellular operators jointly.

# Colocation

Colocation is a tower leasing service provided by Mitratel, where the Company offers its owned micro and macro towers for lease to customers. This service allows customers to use the leased towers for their own needs or sublease them to other parties.

# Reseller

Reseller adalah layanan penyewaan menara yang memungkikan pelanggan untuk memanfaatkan menara milik pihak ketiga. Menara ini dapat digunakan secara langsung oleh pelanggan atau disewakan kembali kepada pihak lain sesuai kebutuhan.

# Tower Fiberization

Tower fiberization adalah layanan yang menyediakan infrastruktur konektivitas dengan menghubungkan menara telekomunikasi ke jaringan serat optik. Layanan ini bertujuan untuk menc Gatkan kualitas dan kapasitas jaringan telekomunikasi melalui konektivitas berbasis serat optik yang andal.

# Power as a Service

Sebagai bagian dari komitmen dalam menghadirkan solusi infrastruktur digital yang andal dan berkelanjutan, Mitratel menyediakan layanan power as a service sebagai solusi daya menceluruh (end-to-end) bagi lokasi menara telekomunikasi. Layanan ini dirancang dalam pentuksystem terintegrasi yang mencakup modul panel surya (photovoltaic/PV), pengontrol muatan surya, baterai,SYSTEM pemantuaan, seda konfigurasi systemdiri maupun hibrida.

Solusi ini dapat diterapkan secara fleksibel untuk berbagai kondisi jaringan listrik, baik pada lokasi off-grid, semi off-grid, maupun on-grid, Seeingga mendukung operasional menara secara efisien dan berkelanjutan di seluruh wilayah layanan Mitratel.

# Micro DC

Layanan yang menyediakan solusi infrastruktur Micro Data Center (Micro DC) di lokasi menjadi untuk mendukung layanan konektivitas berkecepatan tinggid dan latensi rendah bagi tenant mobile network operator (MNO). Infrastruktur yang disiapkan oleh Mitratel meliputi base transceiver station room, space rack untuk mini data center, metro-e connectivity, pasokan listrik dari perusahaan listrik negara (PLN), battery backup, cooling system, dan security.

# Project Solution

Layanan penyediaan menara yang ditawarkan oleh Mitratel sebagai one-stop solution services. Layanan ini mencakup berbagai solusi untuk memenuhi kebutuhan pelanggan, termasuk fiber optic solution, service solution, mobile solution, mechanical electrical solution, dan jasa pengurusan izin mendirikan bangunan.

# Reseller

Reseller is a tower leasing service that enables customers to utilize towers owned by third parties. These towers can be used directly by the customers or subleased to other parties as needed.

# Tower Fiberization

Tower fiberization is a service that provides connectivity infrastructure by linking telecommunication towers to fiber optic networks. This service aims to enhance the quality and capacity of telecommunication networks through reliable fiber optic-based connectivity.

# Power as a Service

As part of its commitment to providing reliable and sustainable digital infrastructure solutions, Mitratel offers power as a service as an end-to-end power solution for telecommunications tower locations. This service is designed in the form of an integrated system that includes photovoltaic (PV) solar panel modules, solar charge controllers, batteries, monitoring systems, as well as standalone or hybrid system configurations.

This solution can be flexibly applied to various electrical grid conditions, whether at off-grid, semi off-grid, or on-grid locations, thereby supporting the efficient and sustainable operation of towers across Mitratel's service areas.

# Micro DC

A service that provides Micro Data Center (Micro DC) infrastructure solutions at tower locations to support high-speed connectivity and low-latency services for mobile network operator (MNO) tenants. The infrastructure prepared by Mitratel includes a base transceiver station room, rack space for a mini data center, metro-e connectivity, power supply from the national electricity company (PLN), battery backup, cooling system, and security.

# Project Solution

A tower provisioning service offered by Mitratel as a one-stop solution service. This service includes various solutions to meet customer needs, such as fiber optic solutions, service solutions, mobile solutions, mechanical electrical solutions, and assistance in obtaining building permits.

# Managed Service

Layanan pengelolaan rutin infrastruktur telekomunikasi aktif dan pasif disediakan dengan berbasis SLA/SLG, didukung oleh tenaga kerja serta manajemen material yang tersebut di seluruh Indonesia. Lyanan ini mencakup fiber optic solution, radio internet protocol, dan lainnya. Sebagai bagian dari komitmen Mitratel dalam mendukung program pemerintah untuk pemerataan infrastruktur telekomunikasi, khususnya di daerah tinggalal, Mitratel memastikan pelayanan optimal (availability) melalui pemeliharaan preventif dan Korektif terhadap infrastruktur telekomunikasi. Dengan demikian, layanan internet dapat terselenggara secara konsisten dan dapat digunakan oleh seluruh masyarakat Indonesia.

# Managed Service

Routine management services for active and passive telecommunication infrastructure are provided based on SLA/SLG, supported by a workforce and material management spread across Indonesia. This service includes fiber optic solutions, radio internet protocol, and more. As part of Mitratel's commitment to supporting the government's program for equitable telecommunication infrastructure, particularly in underdeveloped areas, Mitratel ensures optimal service (availability) through preventive and corrective maintenance of telecommunication infrastructure. Thus, internet services can be provided consistently and can be used by all Indonesian people.

# - Indeks Saham Perusahaan

# Company Stock Index

Indeks saham merupakan ukuran statistik yang mencerminkan keseluruhan(pergerakan tidak ada sekumpulan saham yang dipilih berdasarkan kriteria dan metodologi tertentu{serta dievaluasi secara Berkala.Pada tahun 2024, saham Perseroan dengan kode MTEL menjadi konstitu diapa indeks yang ada di Bursa Efek Indonesia,yaitu LQ45,ISSI,ESG Quality 45 IDX KEHATI, ESG Sector Leaders IDX KEHATI,JII70,IDX80,KOMPAS100, MNC36,SMinfra18,IDXBUMN20,IDXMESBUMN17,dan IDXLQ45LCL.Indeks-indeks tersebut untukjukkan Bahwa Mitratel tetah mengertahkan posisi kepada menjadi konstituantu baru di berbagai indeks saham utama, yang mencerminkan likuiditas dan fundamental yang positif.

A stock index is a statistical measure that reflects the overall movement of stock prices selected based on specific criteria and methodologies, which are periodically evaluated. In 2024, the Company's stock, with the ticker code MTEL, became a constituent of several indices on Indonesia Stock Exchange, including LQ45, ISSI, ESG Quality 45 IDX KEHATI, ESG Sector Leaders IDX KEHATI, JII70, IDX80, KOMPAS100, MNC36, SMinfra18, IDXBUMN20, IDXMESBUMN17, and IDXLQ45LCL. These indices indicate that Mitratel has maintained its position or become a new constituent in various major stock indices, reflecting strong liquidity and positive fundamentals.

Berdasarkan peraturan tersebut, Perseroan telah memuat dan memperbarui secara Berkala 4 informasi utama pada situs web, yaitu informasi umum perusahaan, informasi bagi pemodal ata investor, tata kelola perusahaan, dan tanggung jawab sosial perusahaan. # ANALISIS DAN PEMBAHASAN MANAJEMEN

Management Discussion and Analysis

# - Tinjauan Ekonomi

# Economic Overview

Disepanjang tahun 2024, situasi geopolitik global masih diwarnai oleh berlanjutnya konflik antara Rusia dan Ukraina serta konflik di wilayah Timur Tengah, antara Israel ke Palestine yang pada gilirannya memengaruhi kondisi perekonomian global, terutama karena mencatingkatnya hora energia. Sementara di Amerika Serikat, terpilihnya kembali Presiden Donald Trump memberi nuansa tersendiri akibat kebjikan America First yang dapat membawa pengaruh tersebut terhadap lanskap perekonomian global.

Dinamika geopolitik yang cepat telah berdampak pada perkembangan ekonomi dan pola pertumbuhan antarnegara, seiring dengan menc Gatnya fragmentasi ekonomi dan perdagangan dunia. Ekonomi Amerika Serikat pada tahun 2024 tumbuh  $2,8\%$  sedikit lebih rendah dari tahun sebelumnya  $2,9\%$  dan di saat yang sama menghadapi risiko menc Gatnya inflasi apabila kebikan tarif import darhadap negara mitra dagangnya diberlakukan. Sementara itu, pertumbuhan ekonomi Tiongkok tercatat sebesar  $5,0\%$  pada tahun 2024, yang didorong oleh ekspor yang kuat dan didukung oleh berbagai stimulus pemerintah, sedangan kawasan Uni Eropa mengalami pertumbuhan ekonomi yang cenderung melambat, yaitu sebesar  $1,0\%$  pada tahun 2024 terutama akibat melemahnya ekspor dan turunnya permintaan domestik.

Secara keseluruhan, pertumbuhan ekonomi global pada tahun 2024 diproyeksikan berada pada kisaran  $2,6\%$  tingga  $3,2\%$ , berdasarkan projyeksi lembaga internasional, di mana Bank Dunia memperkirakan pertumbuhan ekonomi dunia tumbuh sebesar  $2,6\%$ , sedangkan IMF memproyeksikan sebesar  $3,2\%$ .

Di tengah situasi tersebut, ekonomi Indonesia tambuh@cukup baik sebesar  $5.03\%$  , pada tahun 2024, dengan tingkat inflasi yang terkendali sebesar  $1,57\%$  , yang didukung oleh konsumsi domestik yang tetap kuat.

In 2024, the global geopolitical landscape remained influenced by the ongoing conflict between Russia and Ukraine, as well as the tensions in the Middle East between Israel and Palestine, which continued to impact global economic conditions, particularly due to the rising energy prices. Additionally, the re-election of President Donald Trump in the United States introduced new dynamics with the "America First" policy; thus, potentially exerting major impact on the global economic landscape.

The rapidly evolving geopolitical dynamics significantly affected economic development and growth patterns across nations, causing increased fragmentation of the global economy and trade. In 2024, the United States economy grew by  $2.8\%$ , slightly below the previous year's  $2.9\%$ , while also facing the risk of increasing inflation should import tariff policies targeting its trade partners be implemented. In contrast, China's economy grew by  $5.0\%$  in 2024, driven by strong exports and supported by various government stimulus measures. Meanwhile, the European Union experienced a slowdown in economic growth, at a rate of  $1.0\%$  in 2024, primarily due to weakening exports and falling domestic demand.

Overall, global economic growth in 2024 was projected to be in the range of  $2.6\%$  to  $3.2\%$ , based on projections from international institutions, where the World Bank estimated world economic growth to grow by  $2.6\%$ , while the IMF projected the growth at  $3.2\%$ .

Amid this situation, the Indonesian economy grew quite well by  $5.03\%$  in 2024, with a controlled inflation rate of  $1.57\%$ , supported by domestic consumption that remained strong.

# - Tinjauan Industri

# Industry Overview

Pada tahun 2024, industri infrastruktur telekomunikasi Indonesia makeshift dipengaruhi oleh dampak dari konsolidasi di industri seluler. Namun demikian, tren operator Seluler (mobile network operator/MNO) untuk semakin efsiend dalam membelanjakan modalnya juga turut memengaruhi mencatnya permintaan terhadap infrastruktur pendukung telekomunikasi. Sepanjang tahun 2024, industri menara mampu mencatat pertumbuhan yang;cukup baik sieiring bertumbuhnya industri seluler. Seiring permintaan layanan mobile data yang terus mencapat, berdasar data Busat Pusat Statistik (BPS), industri telekomunikasi di Indonesia tercatat mengalami pertumbuhan sebesar  $7,57\%$  dibanding tahun sebelumnya.

Pertumbuhan industri telekomunikasi ini didukung oleh jumlah pengguna internet di Indonesia yang diperkirakan mencapai 221,5 juta pada tahun 2024, dengan tingkat penetrasi sebesar  $79.5\%$  dari total populasi. Meskipun demikian, pemerataan akses internet masih menjadi tantangan utama. Wilayahseperti Maluku dan Papua memiliki tingkat penetrasi internet di bawah rata-rata sebesar  $69.9\%$  ,lebih rendah dibandingkan dengan Jawa yang mencapai  $83.6\%$  .Perbedaanini menunjukkan perlunya upaya lebih lanjut dalam mengatasi kesenjanganan digital, terutama di wilayah-wilayah pedesaan.

Selain itu, tantangan industritidaknya sebatas pemerataan akses, tetapi juga peningkatan kualitas dan pengembangan infrastruktur yang terintegrasi, Seeinggam mendorong terciptanya efisiensi industri yang pada gilirannya akan menciptakan layanan telekomunikasi yang luas,murah,danberkualitas.

- Katadata - Penetrasi Internet di Indonesia Capai  $79\%$  pada 2024.

In 2024, Indonesia's telecommunications infrastructure industry was still affected by the impact of consolidation in the cellular industry. However, mobile network operators (MNOs) trend to spend capital more efficiently contributed to the growing demand for telecommunications supporting infrastructure. Throughout 2024, the tower industry recorded relatively good growth, along with the cellular industry growth. Driven by the increasing demand for mobile data services, the telecommunications industry in Indonesia recorded a growth of  $7.57\%$  compared to that of the previous year, based on data from Statistics Indonesia (BPS).

Indonesia's telecommunications industry growth was supported by a projected 221.5 million internet users in 2024, at a penetration rate of  $79.5\%$  of the total population. However, equalizing internet access was still a major challenge. Internet penetration rates at regions such as Maluku and Papua were below the average of  $69.9\%$ , lower than in Java which reached  $83.6\%$ . This disparity highlights the necessity for further efforts to overcome the digital divide, particularly in rural areas.

Furthermore, the industry challenges are not only about providing equal access, but also about improving the quality and developing integrated infrastructure; thus, encouraging the creation of industrial efficiency which in turn will create widespread, cost-effective, and high-quality telecommunications services.
