# - Tinjauan Operational

# Operational Overview

Perseroan membres kegiatan usaha ke dalam 2 segmen utama, yaitu segmen sewa menara telekomunikasi dan segmen lainnya. Informasi mengenai masing-masing segmen usaha diuraikan sebagai berikut.

# Segmen Sewa Menara Telekomunikasi

Segmen sewa menjadi telekomunikasi tersebut segmen usaha utama Mitratel, yang menawarkan berbagai layanan sesuai dengan kebutuhan pelanggan. Layanan utama dalam segmen ini meliputi built-to-suit, colocation, reseller, dan tower fiberization.

# 1. Built-to-Suit

Built-to-suit (B2S) adalah layanan pengembangan menara telekomunikasi yang dirancang dan dibangun sesuai spesifikasi khusus berdasarkan permintaan pelanggan. Perseroan menawarkan 2 skema utama B2S, yaitu B2S mikro dan B2S makro.

a. B2SMikro

Layanan B2S mikro mencakup pembangunan menara mikro ata antenna Barang dengan ketinggian kurang dari 30 meter, baik untuk solusi dalam ruangan (indoor) maupun luar ruangan (outdoor). Untuk solusi dalam ruangan, Mitratel menyediakan in-building system (IBS) dalam pentuk distributd antenna system (DAS) guna mencakupkan kualitas jaringan dalam gedung. Untuk solusi luar ruangan, Mitratel menawarkan BTS Hotel, yang mencakup BTS room, akses fiber optic (FO), sertaSYSTEM antenna pada site micro pole, guna mendukung cakupan dan kapasitas jaringan seluler.

b. B2SMakro

Layanan penyewaan menara dengan pembangunan menara makroEARUdngkian leihdari 30 meter, sesuai dengan lokasi dan spesifikasi yang dipilih oleh pelanggan sebagai tenant pertama. Keunggulan layanan B2S makro Mitratel sebagai berikut.

- Pemilihan lokasi yang fleksibel, dengan opsi 3 usulan lokasi yang dapat disesuaikan dengan kebutuhan pelanggan.  
- Fleksibilitas dalam pemilihan ketinggian menara, memberikan kebebasan bagi pelanggan dalam menentukan spesifikasi terbaik.  
- Layanan tambahan temporary solution, dengan BTS mobile Combat (Compact Mobile Base Station) untuk perepatan deployment dan validasi pasar menara.  
Tower rental B2S-Sebagai solusi total dalam kebutuhan infrastruktur menara telekomunikasi di seluruh wilayah Indonesia.

The Company divides its business activities into 2 main segments: the telecommunications tower leasing segment and other segments. Information regarding each business segment is outlined as follows.

# Telecommunications Tower Lease Segment

The telecommunications tower leasing segment is Mitratel's primary business segment, offering various services tailored to customer needs. The main services in this segment include built-to-suit, colocation, reseller, and tower fiberization.

# 1. Built-to-Suit

Built-to-suit (B2S) is a telecommunications tower development service designed and constructed according to specific customer requirements. The Company offers 2 main B2S schemes: micro B2S and macro B2S.

a. Micro B2S

The micro B2S service includes the construction of micro towers or new antennas with a height of less than 30 meters, designed for both indoor and outdoor solutions. For indoor solutions, Mitratel provides an in-building system (IBS) in the form of a distributed antenna system (DAS) to enhance network quality inside buildings. For outdoor solutions, Mitratel offers BTS Hotel, which includes a BTS room, fiber optic (FO) access, and an antenna system on a micro pole site, supporting cellular network coverage and capacity.

b. Macro B2S

Tower leasing service with the construction of a new macro tower with a height of more than 30 meters, according to the location and specifications chosen by the customer as the first tenant. The advantages of Mitratel's macro B2S service are as follows.

- Flexible site selection, with 3 proposed location options that can be adjusted to meet customer needs.  
- Flexibility in tower height selection, allowing customers the freedom to determine the best specifications.  
Additional temporary solution services with BTS mobile Combat (Compact Mobile Base Station) for accelerated deployment and tower market validation.  
- B2S tower rental as a total solution for telecommunication tower infrastructure needs across Indonesia.

- Komitmen dalam pembangunan di wilayah terdepan, terluar, dan tertinggal (3T) dengan peran Mitratel sebagai agent development untuk mendukung akses telekomunikasi di daerah prioritas.

# 2. Colocation

Colocation adalah layanan penyewaan menara telekomunikasi, di mana Mitratel menawarkan menara yang telah dimilikinya untuk disewakan kepada pelanggan sebagai tenant tambahan (2ndtenant, 3rd tenant, dan saterusnya).Keunggulanlayanan Colocation Mitratel sebagai berikut.

a. Akses cepat ke pasar dengan entry to market yang lebih singkat bagi pelanggan,{serta biaya penyewaan yang kompetitif.  
b. Terbuka untuk semua pelanangan, baik dari mobile network operator (MNO) maupun non-MNO.  
c. Fleksibilitas dalam pemilihan ketinggian menara, yang dapat disesuaikan dengan kebutuhan pelanggan.  
d. Beragam pilihan layanan infrastruktur, mencakup infrastruktur makro, mikro, dan IBS.  
e. Lokasi menara yang strategis dan tersebut di seluruh Indonesia, memastikan cakupan yang luas dan optimal bagi pelanggan.

# 3. Reseller

Reseller adalah layanan penyewaan menaratelekomunikasi, di mana Mitratel menawarkan menarapihak ketiga untuk digunakan langsung oleh pelangganatau disewakan kembali. Layanan ini memungkinkanpelanggan untuk memperluas jangkauan jaringantanpa harus memiliki ata membruangmenara sendiri.Keunggulan layanan Reseller Mitratel sebagai berikut.

a. Akses cepat ke pasar (entry to market) bagi pelanggan yang lokasinya belum memiliki infrastruktur Perseroan.  
b. Fleksibilitas dalam pemilihan lokasi, tipe infrastruktur, dan ketinggian menara, yang dapat disesuaikan dengan kebutuhan pelanggan.

# 4. Tower Fiberization

Tower Fiberization adalah layanan penyediaan infrastruktur konektivitas yang menghubungkan menara telekomunikasi dengan jalur serat optik untuk menc Gatkan kualitas jaringan dan kapasitas transmis i data. Mitratel menawarkan 2 jeris layanan fiberisasi yang diuraikan sebagai berikut.

a. Fiber to the Tower (FTTT) adahal layanan penyewaan jaringan serat optik dalam pentuk dark fiber, di mana做大 penyewaan didasarkan pada jumlah core yang terpakai dan panjang (span) jaringan dalam satuan kilometer. Layanan ini menghubungkan site-site milik Mitratel maupun point of interest lain milik tenant MNO, memberikan keandalan konektivitas tinggi serta mendukung pengembangan jaringan 5G.

- Commitment to development in frontier, outermost, and underdeveloped (3T) areas, with Mitratel acting as a development agent to support telecommunication access in priority regions.

# 2. Colocation

Colocation is a telecommunication tower rental service where Mitratel offers its existing towers for lease to customers as additional tenants (2ndtenant, 3rdtenant, and so on). The advantages of Mitratel's Colocation service are as follows.

a. Fast market access with a shorter entry-to-market period for customers and competitive rental costs.  
b. Open to all customers, including both mobile network operators (MNOs) and non-MNOs.  
c. Flexibility in tower height selection, which can be adjusted to meet customer needs.  
d. A wide range of infrastructure service options, including macro, micro, and IBS infrastructure.  
e. Strategically located towers spread across Indonesia, ensuring wide and optimal coverage for customers.

# 3. Reseller

Reseller is a telecommunication tower rental service where Mitratel offers third-party towers for direct use by customers or for subleasing. This service allows customers to expand their network coverage without the need to own or build their own towers. The advantages of Mitratel's Reseller service are as follows.

a. Fast market access (entry to market) for customers in locations that do not yet have the Company's infrastructure.  
b. Flexibility in selecting locations, infrastructure types, and tower heights, which can be adjusted to meet customer needs.

# 4. Tower Fiberization

Tower Fiberization is a connectivity infrastructure service that connects telecommunication towers with fiber optic networks to enhance network quality and data transmission capacity. Mitratel offers 2 types of fiberization services, as outlined below.

a. Fiber to the Tower (FTTT) is a dark fiber rental service, where the rental price is based on the number of cores used and the network length (span) in kilometers. This service connects Mitratel-owned sites as well as other points of interest owned by MNO tenants, ensuring high connectivity reliability and supporting the development of 5G networks.

b. Fiber to the Mobile (FTTM) adahal layanan capacity bandwidth yang menghubungkan radio network controller (RNC) milik other licensed operator (OLO) dengan site-site milik tenant Mitratel dalam;bentuk bundling dengan menara. Kapasitas layanan FTTM tersedia mulai dari200 Mbps hingga1 Gbps, dengan fleksilitas bagi pelanggan untuk menambah kapasitas layanan sebesar 100 Mbps sesuai kebutuhan.

b. Fiber to the Mobile (FTTM) is a capacity bandwidth service that connects the radio network controller (RNC) of other licensed operators (OLO) to Mitratel tenant sites in a bundled package with towers. FTTM service capacity ranges from 200 Mbps to 1 Gbps, with the flexibility for customers to increase service capacity in increments of 100 Mbps as needed.

# Segmen Lainnya

Segmen usaha lainnya mencakup layanan di luar sewa menara telekomunikasi, namun tetap berkaitan dengan ekosistem menara telekomunikasi (tower-related businesses). Layanan ini bertujuan untuk mendukung pertumbuhan bisnis inti Perseroan dengan menawarkan

In 2024, the Company's telecommunications tower leasing segment demonstrated solid growth, with the number of towers increasing by  $3.7\%$ , or 1,390 towers, bringing the total number of towers operated to 39,404 units, up from 38,014 units in the previous year. This growth was primarily driven by high demand for new tower construction in potential areas and the addition of towers resulting from mobile network operator expansion.

Along with the increase in the number of towers, the number of tenants also grew by  $4.3\%$ , from 57,409 units in 2023 to 59,868 units in 2024. This contributed to a tenancy ratio of approximately  $1.52\times$ , reinforcing the Company's position as one of the leading telecommunications infrastructure providers.

# Other Segments

The other business segment includes services beyond telecommunications tower leasing but remains related to the telecommunications tower ecosystem (tower-related businesses). These services aim to support the growth of the Company's core business by offering broader solutions

solusi yang lebih luas bagi pelanggan. Beberapa layanan utama yang ditawarkan dalam segmen ini meliputi project solution, managed services, power as a service, dan non-terrestrial network.

# 1. Project Solution

Project Solution adalah layanan one stop solution yang ditawarkan oleh Mitratel dalam mendukung pengelolaan menara telekomuniasi. Layanan ini mencakup berbagai aspek speerti fiber optic solution, tower-related solution, mechanical and electrical solution服务于 service solution.

Mitratel menyediakan fiber optic solution yang mencakup deployment jaringan serat optik,{sera tower-related solution yang meliputi pembangunan dan pemulihan menara (deployment and recovery), relokasi peralatan,{serta penguatan struktur menara (tower strengthening). # 2. Managed Service

Managed Service adalah layanan alih kelola (outsourcing) yang mencakup pengelolaan aset atau proses pemeliharaan aset pelanggan secara menyeluruh. Layanan ini melibatkan berbagai aspek,seperti sumber daya manusia, alat Produksi, mobilisasi, dan system monitoring.

Mitratel menyediakan Managed Service dalam bereits unit kerja utama, yaitu Fiber Optic Backbone Managed Service bertanggung jawab atas ketersediaan infrastruktur transportasi fiber optic, backbone,{serta remote metro junction Telkom.

for customers. Some of the key services offered in this segment include project solutions, managed services, power as a service, and non-terrestrial network.

# 1. Project Solution

Project Solution is a one-stop solution service offered by Mitratel to support the management of telecommunications towers. This service covers various aspects, including fiber optic solutions, tower-related solutions, mechanical and electrical solutions, and service solutions.

Mitratel provides fiber optic solutions that include fiber optic network deployment, as well as tower-related solutions covering tower deployment and recovery, equipment relocation, and tower strengthening. Additionally, Mitratel offers mechanical and electrical solutions, including the provision of generators, solar panels, and mechanical and electrical services. To support licensing and operations, Mitratel provides service solutions such as site acquisition processing, building permit arrangements, as well as IBS and other related services.

The advantages of Mitratel's Project Solution services are as follows.

a. One-stop, end-to-end solution, covering everything from planning, fiber optic network deployment, tower construction and reinforcement, to power supply provision, both on-grid and off-grid, along with civil, mechanical, and electrical services to support the tower-related business portfolio.  
b. Telecommunication tower legal document processing, including building approval permits for all tenants across Indonesia.  
c. Fast deployment process with competitive costs, ensuring efficiency for customers in managing telecommunications infrastructure.  
d. Extensive service coverage, spanning across Indonesia to provide optimal support for customers in various strategic locations.

# 3. Power as a Service

Power as a Service (PaaS) adalah layanan penyediaan pasokan energia listrik untuk menjara telekomunikasi dengan berbagai solusi hemat biaya dan ramah lingkungan. Layanan ini dirancang untuk memastikan ketersediaan daya yang andal guna mendukung operasional menjara, baik di area yang terhubung ke jaringan listrik (on-grid) maupun di lokasi yang memiliki keterbatasan akses listrik (semi on-grid dan off-grid).

fiber optic route patrols, supervision, security against third-party disruptions, preventive maintenance, and troubleshooting issues (corrective maintenance).

Fiber Optic Transport Managed Service focuses on the availability of fiber optic transport (outside plant/OSP) and the management of spare parts for Telkomsel's internet service provider (ISP) equipment. This service includes patrolling, supervision, and fiber optic maintenance, as well as spare parts support with a 4-hour response time from the request. Additionally, service request support management is available 24/7 to ensure optimal service performance.

Radio IP and IP Long Haul is a Managed Service that supports the availability of radio-IP transport for Telkomsel's node-B network owned by Telkom. This service includes technician deployment, work equipment provision, corrective maintenance, service request support management, and additional services based on customer requests.

CME Managed Service focuses on power supply, mechanical, and electrical (CME) maintenance. This service includes operational monitoring, preventive maintenance of CME equipment, and equipment room cleanliness to ensure optimal operations.

Fiber Optic Last Mile Managed Service functions as 24/7 surveillance and patrolling of fiber optic cable routes, especially in backbone areas and fiber optic access networks. The main goal is to prevent disruptions caused by natural factors or third parties that could impact network connectivity.

The advantages of Mitratel's Managed Service are as follows.

a. Management of operator assets, including fiber optic backbone networks, IP radio/microwave devices, and CME to support the tower-related businesses portfolio.  
b. Service coverage across all regions of Indonesia, ensuring optimal maintenance and asset management services in various operational areas.

# 3. Power as a Service

Power as a Service (PaaS) is a service that provides electrical power supply for telecommunications towers with various cost-efficient and environmentally friendly solutions. This service is designed to ensure reliable power availability to support tower operations, whether in areas connected to the power grid (on-grid) or in locations with limited access to electricity (semi on-grid and off-grid).

Mitratel menawarkan berbagai solusi energia dalam layanan PaaS, termasuk solar panel system, direct current power seksutan rectifier dan bateri lithium, serta pemanfaatan energiabaru dan terbarukan lainnya. Dengan pengerapan tekologi ini, Mitratel tidak ada meningkatkan efisiensi operasional, tetapi juga berkontribusi terhadap reduksi emisi carbon serta mendukunginisiatif energia berkelanjutan di sektor telekomunikasi.

# 4. Micro DC

Micro DCadaloshusinovatifyangmeningkatkan efisiensioperasionaldankeberlanjutan,termasukdalam industri sport stadium.Dengan menghadirkan server microDCdilokasioperasional,solusi ini memungkinkan pemrosesan data secara lokal,mengurangi ketergantungan pada pusat data,danmemiminalkan latensi.

Dalam sport stadium, solusi ini memiliki 2 ftur utama:

a. Al crowd monitoring, yaitu firearmungakan kecerdasan buatan untuk menghitung jumlah pengunjung secara real-time melalui system pemantauan berbasis video.  
b. Al face recognition yang memungkinkan identifikasi otomatis wajah individu yang telah terdaftar, menc Gatkan keamanan dan efisiensi dalam proses akses masuk.

Pemrosesan data yang lebih cepat dan efisien di lokasi tidak hanya mencakatkan keamanan dan kinerjaSYSTEM, tetapi juga membantu mengurangi konsumsi energia dan jejak karbon, sejalan dengan prinsip keberlanjutan dalam infrastruktur digital.

# 5. Non-Terrestrial Network

Non-Terrestrial Network adalah layanan systemd konektivitas yang beroperasi di atas permukaanbumi (hingga ketinggian  $550~\mathrm{km}$ ) dengan systemd berbasis high-altitude-platform station (HAPS) dan satelit. Layanan ini berfungsi sebagai jaringan penghubung (backhaul) yang menghubungkan BTS dengan pusat kontrol operator telekomunikasi, khususnya di daerah pelosok yang tidak memiliki akses oleh jaringan terrestrial,seperti serat optik maupun radio microwave (MW).

Mitratel offers various energy solutions within the PaaS service, including solar panel systems, direct current power using rectifiers and lithium batteries, as well as the utilization of other renewable energy sources. Through the implementation of this technology, Mitratel not only enhances operational efficiency but also contributes to carbon emission reduction and supports sustainable energy initiatives in the telecommunications sector.

# 4. Micro DC

Micro DC is an innovative solution that enhances operational efficiency and sustainability, including in the sports stadium industry. By deploying micro DC servers at operational sites, this solution enables local data processing, reduces dependence on data centers, and minimizes latency.

In sports stadiums, this solution has 2 main features:

a. AI Crowd Monitoring, which utilizes artificial intelligence to count the number of visitors in real-time through a video-based monitoring system.  
b. AI Face Recognition, enabling automatic identification of registered individuals, enhancing security and efficiency in the access control process.

Faster and more efficient on-site data processing not only enhances security and system performance but also helps reduce energy consumption and carbon footprint, aligning with sustainability principles in digital infrastructure.

# 5. Non-Terrestrial Network

Non-Terrestrial Network is a connectivity system service that operates above the Earth's surface (up to an altitude of  $550\mathrm{km}$ ) with a system based on high-altitude platform stations (HAPS) and satellites. This service functions as a backhaul network, connecting BTS to the telecom operator's control center, particularly in remote areas without access to terrestrial networks such as fiber optics or microwave radio (MW).

# Marketing Aspects

# Strategi Pemasaran

Mitratel terus memperkuat posisi menjadi pemimpin di industri infrastruktur telekomunikasi melalui strategi pemasaran yang terfokus dan inovatif. Perseroan mengadopsi pendekatan proactive consultative selling, yang memungkankan Mitratel memberikan solusi yang lebih seksuai dengan kebutuhan pelanggan, ada menawarkan lokasi menara yang strategis dengan potensiasar tinggi.

Untuk mendukung operator telekomunikasi dalam mengoptimalkan jaringan mereka, Mitratel menghadirkan skema bisinis yang menarik dan terintegrasi, mencakup tower leasing, fiber connectivity, power as a service,{serta layanan等领域 lainnya. Dengan model layanan 1 paket ini, operator dapat mencatkan efisiensi operasional tanpa perlu berinvestasi dalam insfrasruktur tambahan.

Dalam 名ingkatkan efektivitas pemasaran, Mitratel mengimplementasikan marketing analytics tools yang memungkankan identifikasi lokasi potensial secara lebih akurat. Strategi ini diperkuat dengan kemitraan strategis bersama pemiliklahan, yang memastikan keberlanjutan bisnis jangka panjang bagi operator seluler. Melalui pendekatan ini, Mitratel tidakanya berperan sebagai penyedia menara telekomunikasi, tetapi juga sebagai mitra strategis yang memberikan nilai tambah bagi pertumbuhan bisnis pelanggan, mendukung ekspansi jaringan, seda menghadirkan infrastruktur yang lebih efsiendan berkelanjutan.

# Rencana Bisnis Tahun 2025

Memasuki tahun 2025, Mitratel berkomitmen untuk memperkuat posisi sebagai pemimpin di industri infrastruktur telekomunikasi Indonesia. Permintaan terhadap infrastruktur telekomunikasi yang andal diperkirakan akan mencapat, seiring dengan perluasan jaringan operator seluler ke wilayah-wilayahantu, terutama di luar Pulau Jawa, serta percepatan adopsi tekologi 5G dan konektivitas berbasis kecerdasan buatan AI.

Keunggulan Mitratel terletak pada portofolio menara yang tersebut luas, dengan  $59\%$  berada di luar Jawa, memungkikan operator untuk memperluan jaringannya secara efisien. Selain itu, Mitratel juga memerkitut layanan berbasis digital, termasuk serat optik, power as a service, serta solusi infrastruktur terintegrasi berupa tekologi berbasis HAPS atau Flying Tower System (FTS) dan Micro DC. Dengan kombiniasi ini, Mitratel siap mencap peluang pertumbuhan yang semakin pesat diera transformasi digital.

# Marketing Strategy

Mitratel continues to strengthen its position as a leader in the telecommunications infrastructure industry through a focused and innovative marketing strategy. The Company adopts a proactive consultative selling approach, enabling Mitratel to provide solutions that better align with customer needs while offering strategically located towers with high market potential.

To support telecommunications operators in optimizing their networks, Mitratel introduces attractive and integrated business schemes, including tower leasing, fiber connectivity, power as a service, and other related services. With this all-in-one service model, operators can enhance operational efficiency without the need to invest in additional infrastructure.

To enhance marketing effectiveness, Mitratel implements marketing analytics tools that enable more accurate identification of potential locations. This strategy is further strengthened through strategic partnerships with landowners, ensuring long-term business sustainability for mobile operators. Through this approach, Mitratel not only acts as a telecommunications tower provider but also as a strategic partner that adds value to customer business growth, supports network expansion, and delivers more efficient and sustainable infrastructure.

# 2025 Business Plans

Entering 2025, Mitratel is committed to strengthening its position as a leader in Indonesia's telecommunications infrastructure industry. The demand for reliable telecommunications infrastructure is expected to rise, driven by the expansion of mobile operators into new regions, particularly outside Java, as well as the accelerated adoption of 5G technology and AI-based connectivity.

Mitratel's advantage lies in its extensive tower portfolio, with  $59\%$  located outside Java, enabling operators to expand their networks efficiently. Additionally, Mitratel is enhancing its digital-based services, including fiber optics, power as a service, and integrated infrastructure solutions such as HAPS-based technology or the Flying Tower System (FTS) and Micro DC. With this combination, Mitratel is well-positioned to seize the growing opportunities in the digital transformation era.

Untuk mendukung ekspansi ini, Mitratel mengalokasikan belanja modal sebesar Rp3,3 triliun pada tahun 2025, yang akan difokuskan pada penambahan jumlah menara dan perluasan jaringan serat optik. Strategi ini sejalan dengan projeksi pertumbuhan pendapatan sebesar  $9\%$  pada tahun 2024, didorong oleh peningkatan permintaan layanan menara dan serat optik. Selain pertumbuhan organik, Mitratel juga terbuka terhadap peluang ekspansi anorganik melaluiakuisisiaset menaradanserat optik dari operatior lain. Langkah ini bertujuan untuk memperluajangkauan layanan dan memerkitu ekosistem bisnis menara Perseroan.

Dengan strategi ini, Mitratel tidak dapat oleh memerkitau posisinya sebagai penyedia infrastruktur telekomunikasi terdepan, tetapi juga berkontribusi pada pemerahan ekonomi digital dan keberlanjutan lingkungan di seluruh Indonesia.

# Pangsa Pasar

Mitratel terus memperluaas pangsaasar dengan strategi ekspansi yang agresif dan inovatif, menjadikan Mitratel pemimpin dalam industri infrastruktur telekomunikasi di Indonesia. Pada tahun 2024, Perseroan berhasil mencakatkan jumlah menara telekomunikasi menjadi 39.404 unit, didorong oleh akuisisi dan pembangunan bara. Selain itu, Mitratel juga mencatat pertumbuhan signifikan dalam jaringan serat optik, mencapai  $59.486~\mathrm{km}$ , sebagai bagian dari upaya memperkuat konektivitas digital.

Transformasi Mitratel menuju perusahaan infrastruktur digital semakin nyata dengan pengembangan layanan fiberisasi melalui strategi fiber to the Tower (FTTT). Langkah ini tidakanyak mencakatkan nilai tambah bagi operator telekomunikasi, tetapi juga memperlugas peluang pertumbuhan bisnis di era digital. Dukungan sinergi dengan Telkom Group semakin mempercepat ekspansi dan mencakatkan kualitas layanan operasional.

Meskipun menjadi akumutan ekonomi global, Mitratel berhasil mencatat pertumbuhan pendapatan sebesar  $7.2\%$  menjadi Rp9.308 miliar, dengan EBITDA mengkat  $10.2\%$  mencapai Rp7.696 miliar. KeberHASIL ini mencerminkan daya saing Mitratel dalam industri serta kemampuan untuk terus Berkembang di tengah dinamika pasar.

Dengan fondasi keuangan yang solid dan strategi pertumbuhan yang adaptif, Mitratel optimis dapat terus memperlugas pangsaasar. Permintaan terhadap layanan serat optik dan infrastruktur telekomunikasi yang terus mencapat, terutama dengan perkembangan tekologi 5G, memberikan peluang tersebut bagi Mitratel untuk memerkitau posisi sebagai penyEDIA solusi infrastruktur digital terdepan di Indonesia.

To support this expansion, Mitratel has allocated a capital expenditure of Rp3.3 trillion in 2025, focusing on increasing the number of towers and expanding the fiber optic network. This strategy aligns with the projected  $9\%$  revenue growth in 2024, driven by the rising demand for tower and fiber optic services. In addition to organic growth, Mitratel remains open to inorganic expansion opportunities through the acquisition of tower and fiber optic assets from other operators. This initiative aims to broaden service coverage and strengthen the Company's tower business ecosystem.

Through this strategy, Mitratel not only reinforces its position as a leading telecommunications infrastructure provider but also contributes to digital economic equity and environmental sustainability across Indonesia.

# Market Share

Mitratel continues to expand its market share with an aggressive and innovative expansion strategy, establishing itself as the leader in Indonesia's telecommunications infrastructure industry. In 2024, the Company successfully increased the number of telecommunications towers to 39,404 units, driven by acquisitions and new developments. Additionally, Mitratel recorded significant growth in its fiber optic network, reaching 59,486 km, as part of its efforts to strengthen digital connectivity.

Mitratel's transformation into a digital infrastructure company is becoming increasingly evident through the development of fiberization services with the Fiber to the Tower (FTTT) strategy. This initiative not only enhances value for telecommunications operators but also expands business growth opportunities in the digital era. The synergy with Telkom Group further accelerates expansion and improves operational service quality.

Despite facing global economic challenges, Mitratel successfully recorded a  $7.2\%$  revenue growth, reaching Rp9,308 billion, with EBITDA increasing by  $10.2\%$  to Rp7,696 billion. This achievement reflects Mitratel's competitiveness in the industry and its ability to continue growing amid market dynamics.

With a solid financial foundation and an adaptive growth strategy, Mitratel remains optimistic about expanding its market share. The rising demand for fiber optic services and telecommunications infrastructure, especially with the advancement of 5G technology, presents a significant opportunity for Mitratel to strengthen its position as Indonesia's leading provider of digital infrastructure solutions.

# Pendapatan

Pada tahun 2024, Perseroan mencatatkan pendapatan sebesar Rp9.308 miliar, menc Gat sebesar  $7,2\%$  dibandingkan tahun sebelumnya sebesar Rp8.684 miliar. Peningkatan ini disebabkan oleh mencatnya pendapatan pada sewa menara telekomunikasi sebesar  $7,3\%$  fiber optic sebesar  $64,3\%$  dan segmen lainnya sebesar  $5,9\%$ .

Segmen penyewaan menara telekomunikasi makeshift tetap menjadi pendorong utama pertumbuhan pendapatan Perseroan. Dengan strategi ekspansi yang berkelanjutan, segmen penyewaan menara berhasil mencatatkan pendapatan sebesar Rp8.674 miliar, tambuh sebesar  $7,3\%$  dibandingkan tahun sebelumnya. Pertumbuhan ini didorong oleh oleh pengGTKan jujiah menara yang dikelola, penambahan tenantantu, serta optimalisasi tenancy ratio yang memberikan kontribusi terhadap pendapatan berulang Perseroan.

# Revenue

In 2024, the Company recorded revenue of Rp9,308 billion, an increase of  $7.2\%$  compared to the previous year's Rp8,684 billion. This increase was driven by higher revenue from telecommunications tower leasing by  $7.3\%$ , fiber optics by  $64.3\%$ , and other segments by  $5.9\%$ .

The telecommunications tower leasing segment remained the primary driver of the Company's revenue growth. With a continuous expansion strategy, the tower leasing segment recorded revenue of Rp8,674 billion, growing by  $7.3\%$  compared to the previous year. This growth was driven by an increase in the number of managed towers, the addition of new tenants, and the optimization of the tenancy ratio, all of which contributed to the Company's recurring revenue.

# Beban Pokok Pendidapatan

Pada tahun 2024, Mitratel mencatatkan menjadi pokok pendapatan sebesar Rp4.507 miliar, mencapat sebesar  $2.2\%$  dibandingkan tahun sebelumnya sebesar Rp4.409 miliar. Peningkatan ini terutama didorong oleh penyusutan yang mencapat sebesar  $8.8\%$ .

# Beban Usaha

Baban usaha Perseroan di tahun 2024 tercatat sebesar Rp622 miliar, menc Gat sebesar  $4.1\%$  dibandingkan tahun sebelumunnya sebesar Rp598 miliar. Peningkatan ini terutama disebabkan olehbeen umum dan administrasi yang meningkat sebesar  $8.1\%$ .

# Laba Sebelumum Beban Pajak Final dan Pajak Penghasilan

Laba sebelum menjadi pajak final dan pajak penghasilan yang didapatkan Perseroan di tahun 2024 tercatat sebesar Rp2.954 miliar, menc Gat sebesar  $7,2\%$  dibandingkantahun sebelumnya sebesar Rp2.754 miliar. Hal ini terjadi karena meningkatnya laba yang dipereleh Perseroan di tahun 2024.

# EBITDA

Per 31 Desember 2024, EBITDA Mitratel sebesar Rp7.697 miliar, munchkat  $10.2\%$  dari 31 Desember 2023 sebesar Rp6.922 miliar. Peningkatan EBITDA ini menunjukkan kinerja operasional yang solid serta efisiensi biaya yang terus terjaga, sejalan dengan strategi optimalisasi aset.

# Laba Tahun Berjalan

Pada tahun 2024, Perseroan mencatatkan laba tahun berjalan sebesar Rp2.108 miliar, menc Gat sebesar  $4.8\%$  dibandingkan tahun 2023 sebesar Rp2.010 miliar. Peningkatan ini terutama disebabkan karena meningkatnya kinerja keuangan Perseroan selama tahun 2024.

# Cost of Revenue

In 2024, Mitratel recorded a cost of revenue of Rp4,507 billion, an increase of  $2.2\%$  compared to the previous year's Rp4,409 billion. This increase was primarily driven by an  $8.8\%$  rise in depreciation.

# Operating Expenses

The Company's operating expenses in 2024 amounted to Rp622 billion, increasing by  $4.1\%$  compared to the previous year's Rp598 billion. This increase was mainly due to a rise in general and administrative expenses by  $8.1\%$ .

# Income Before Final Tax Expense and Income Tax Expense

The Company's income before final tax expense and income tax expense in 2024 was recorded at Rp2,954 billion, reflecting a  $7.2\%$  increase compared to Rp2,754 billion in the previous year. This growth was driven by the increase in the Company's income in 2024.

# EBITDA

As of December 31, 2024, Mitratel's EBITDA amounted to Rp7,697 billion, increasing by  $10.2\%$  from Rp6,922 billion as of December 31, 2023. This increase in EBITDA indicates solid operational performance and sustained cost efficiency, in line with the asset optimization strategy.

# Income for the Year

In 2024, the Company recorded an income for the year of Rp2,108 billion, an increase of  $4.8\%$  compared to Rp2,010 billion in 2023. This increase was primarily driven by the Company's improved financial performance throughout 2024.

# Penghasilan Komprehensif Lain – Setelah Pajak

Penghasilan komprehensif lain - setelah pajak Perseroan di tahun 2024 tercatah sebesar Rp523 juta, menurun sebesar  $70.4\%$  dibandingkan tahun sebelumnya yang mencatatkan penghasilan sebesar Rp2 miliar. Penurunan ini khususnya disebabkan oleh menurunjya keuntungan aktuarial atas liabilititas imbalan kerja karyawan sebesar  $70.7\%$ .

# Total Penghasilan Komprehensif Tahun Berjalan

Pada tahun 2024, Mitratel melaporkan total penghasilan komprehensif tahun berjalan sebesar Rp2.108 miliar, menc Gat dibandingkan dengan tahun sebelumnya yang sebesar Rp2.012 miliar. Hal ini disebabkan oleh menc Gatnya labayang dipereleh Perseroan di tahun 2024.

# Laba per Saham Dasar

Laba per saham dasar Mitratel pada akhir tahun 2024 sebesar Rp26, menujukkan pertumbuhan sebesar  $8.3\%$  dibandingkan dengan tahun sebelumnya sebesar Rp24. Hal ini sejalan dengan menckatnya kinerja keuangan Perseroanditahun 2024.

# Other Comprehensive Income – Net of Tax

The Company's other comprehensive income - net of tax in 2024 was recorded at Rp523 million, a decrease of  $70.4\%$  compared to the previous year's income of Rp2 billion. This decline was primarily due to a  $70.7\%$  decrease in actuarial gains on employee benefit liabilities.

# Total Comprehensive Income for the Year

In 2024, Mitratel reported a total comprehensive income for the year of Rp2,108 billion, an increase compared to Rp2,012 billion in the previous year. This was driven by the Company's higher profit in 2024.

# Basic Earnings per Share

Mitratel's basic earnings per share at the end of 2024 stood at Rp26, reflecting an  $8.3\%$  growth compared to Rp24 in the previous year. This is in line with the Company's improved financial performance in 2024.

# Kemampuan Membayar Utang

Kemampuan Perseroan dalam memenuhi kewajiban finansial tercermin dari kesehatan solvabilitas, profitabilitas, dan efektivitas dalam mengelola piutang. Kinerja keuangan Mitratel menunjukkan struktur modal yang solid, dengan rasio utang terhadap ekuitas yang stabil dalam  $0,5 \times$  selama 2 tahun terakhir. Peningkatan rasio ini terutama disebabkan oleh penambahan utang berbunga dalam rangka pembiayaan ekspansi strategis dan akuisisi aset yang mendukung pertumbuhan jangka panjang Perseroan.

# Debt Service Ability

The Company's ability to meet its financial obligations is reflected in its solvency, profitability, and effectiveness in managing receivables. Mitratel's financial performance demonstrates a solid capital structure, with a debt-to-equity ratio remaining stable around  $0.5 \times$  over the past 2 years. The increase in this ratio was primarily due to the addition of interest-bearing debt as part of financing strategic expansion and asset acquisitions that support the Company's long-term growth.

Selain itu, rasio utang terhadap EBITDA yang berada di kisaran  $2,3\times$  mencerminkan posisi keuangan yang sehat, memungkankan Perseroan untuk tetap fleksibel dalam ekspansi bisnis. Selama 2 tahun terakhir, Mitratel semakin mengoptimalkan profitabilitas dengan memerkitau bisnis penyewaan menara seda menerapkan strategi efisiensi operasional melalui kemitraan inovatif. Langkah-langkah ini semakin memerkitau daya saing Perseroan di industri infrastruktur telekomunikasi.

# Kolektibilitas Piutang

Hingga akhir tahun 2024, Mitratel mencatatkan piutang usaha - neto sebesar Rp2.004 miliar. Mayoritas dari piutang tersebut berada dalam kategori lancar, dengan usia kurang dari 3 bulan, mencerminkan efektivitas Perseroan dalam manajemen kredit dan penagihan. Sementara itu, piutang dengan usia lebih dari 6 bulan tetap terjaga pada angka yang relatif kecil, yaitu Rp3.254 juta. Kinerja ini menunjukkan bahwa Mitratel mampu mempertahankan arus kas yang sehat dan mengelola risiko kredit dengan baik, Seeinggam mendukung stabilitas keuangan perusahaan secara keseluruhan.

# Struktur Modal dan Kebijakan Struktur Modal

# Kebijakan Manajemen atas Struktur Permodalan

Manajemen menentukan struktur permodalan yang optimal berdasarkan rasio pengungkit atau leverage yang dispersyaratkan pihak kreditur sebagai debt covenantseperti debt to equity ratio  $<  5,00$  ,debt to EBITDA  $<  5,00$  net debt to EBITDA  $<  5,00$  , dan Debt Coverage Service Ratio (DSCR)>1,00.

# Dasar Pemilihan Kebijakan Manajemen atas Struktur Modal

Manajemen nutzen struktur modal berdasarkan rasio pembatasan utang atop debt covenant dengan pihak kreditur sebagai kontrol terhadap pemenuhan syarat kepada pihak kreditur.

Furthermore, the debt-to-EBITDA ratio, which was around  $2.3\times$ , reflects a sound financial position, allowing the Company to remain flexible in its business expansion. Over the past 2 years, Mitratel has increasingly optimized profitability by strengthening its tower leasing business and implementing operational efficiency strategies through innovative partnerships. These initiatives further enhance the Company's competitiveness in the telecommunications infrastructure industry.

# Receivables Collectibility

By the end of 2024, Mitratel recorded net trade receivables of Rp2,004 billion. The majority of these receivables fall into the current category, with an aging of less than 3 months, reflecting the Company's effectiveness in credit management and collection. Meanwhile, receivables aged more than 6 months remained relatively low at Rp3,254 million. This performance indicates that Mitratel can maintain healthy cash flow and effectively manage credit risk, thereby supporting the Company's overall financial stability.

# Capital Structure and Policy on the Capital Structure

# Management Policy on the Capital Structure

Management determines the optimal capital structure based on the leverage ratio required by creditors as debt covenants, such as a debt-to-equity ratio of  $< 5.00$ , debt-to-EBITDA of  $< 5.00$ , net debt-to-EBITDA of  $< 5.00$ , and a Debt Service Coverage Ratio (DSCR) of  $>1.00$ .

# Basis for Choosing the Management Policy on the Capital Structure

Management maintains the capital structure based on debt covenant ratios with creditors as a control measure to ensure compliance with creditor requirements.

# Prospek Usaha

Proyeksi pertumbuhan ekonomi global dan nasional untuk tahun 2025 menunjukkan dinamika yang perlu dicermati oleh tersebut ekonomi dan pembuat kebujakan. Dana Moneter Internasional (IMF) dalam laporanya memprediksi bahwa pertumbuhan ekonomi global akan stagnan di angka  $3,2\%$  pada tahun 2025, sedikit menc Gatkat dari projeksi sebelumnya sebesar  $3,2\%$ . Revisi ini didorong oleh menjadi pertumbuhan projeksi pertumbuhan ekonomi Amerika Serika, meskupun risiko geopolitik dan proteksionisme perdagangan tetap kepada tantangan yang dapat menghambat laju pertumbuhan ekonomi dunia.

Di tengah tantangan global tersebut, pemerintah Indonesia optimis telah perekonomian nasional akan tambuh positif. Dalam Rancangan Anggaran Pendidapatan dan Belanja Negara (RAPBN) 2025, pemerintah menargetkan pertumbuhan ekonomi sebesar  $5,2\%$ . Target ini sejalan dengan proyeksi Bank Indonesia yang memperkirakan pertumbuhan ekonomi nasional berada dalam rentang  $5,1\%$  tingga  $5,5\%$  pada tahun 2025. Optimisme pemerintah didasarkan pada upaya menjadi stabilitas ekonomi dan mendorong permintaan domestik melalui strategiseperti pengendalian inflasi, penciptaan lapangan kerja, sama penyaluran bantuan sosial dan subsidi untuk menjaga daya belimasyarakatat.

Dari sisi kinerja industri infrastruktur telekomunikasi Indonesia, prospek usaha pada tahun 2025 diproyeksikan cerah. Analisis memprediksi sektor telekomunikasi Indonesia akan tumbuh sebesar  $6\% -8\%$  year-on-year pada tahun 2025, mencapai nilai Rp320 triliun. Pertumbuhan ini didorong oleh percepatan digitalisasi dan kebutuhan akan infrastruktur telekomunikasi yang andal. Selain itu, Penetrasi 5G di Indonesia diproyeksikan menjentakan signifikan, dengan Telkomsel menargetkan perluasan layanan 5G ke76 kota/kabupaten pada tahun 2025.

Peningkatan ini membruka peluang bagi Mitratel untuk menyediakan infrastruktur pendukung,seperti menara telekomunikasi dan jaringan serat optik yang diperlukan untuk implementasi 5G. Kemudian, konsolidasi di industri telekomunikasi,seperti merger antara XL Axiata dan Smartfren pada Desember 2024 dengan nilai transaksi mencapat Rp104 triliun, menciptakan entitasbaru yang berpotensi mencatkan permintaan akan infrastruktur telekomunikasi.Mitratel dapat memanfaatkan peluang ini dengan menawarkansolusiinfrastrukturyangkomprehensif.

# Business Prospect

The projected global and national economic growth for 2025 presents dynamics that need to be closely monitored by economic players and policymakers. In its report, the International Monetary Fund (IMF) predicts that global economic growth will stagnate at  $3.2\%$  in 2025, slightly increasing from the previous projection of  $3.2\%$ . This revision is driven by an improved growth outlook for the United States, although geopolitical risks and trade protectionism remain challenges that could hinder global economic growth.

Amid these global challenges, the Indonesian government remains optimistic about positive national economic growth. In the 2025 Draft State Budget (RAPBN), the government targets economic growth of  $5.2\%$ . This target aligns with Bank Indonesia's projection, which estimates national economic growth in the range of  $5.1\%$  to  $5.5\%$  in 2025. The government's optimism is based on efforts to maintain economic stability and boost domestic demand through strategies such as inflation control, job creation, and the distribution of social assistance and subsidies to support people's purchasing power.

In terms of the performance of Indonesia's telecommunications infrastructure industry, the business prospect for 2025 is projected to be promising. Analysis predicts that Indonesia's telecommunications sector will grow by  $6\% -8\%$  year-on-year in 2025, reaching a value of Rp320 trillion. This growth is driven by the acceleration of digitalization and the increasing demand for reliable telecommunications infrastructure. Additionally, 5G penetration in Indonesia is expected to rise significantly, with Telkomsel targeting the expansion of 5G services to 76 cities/regencies by 2025.

This development presents an opportunity for Mitratel to provide essential supporting infrastructure, such as telecommunications towers and fiber optic networks required for 5G implementation. Then, consolidation in the telecommunications industry, such as the merger between XLXiata and Smartfren in December 2024 with a transaction value reaching Rp104 trillion, created a new entity that has the potential to increase demand for telecommunications infrastructure. Mitratel can seize this opportunity by offering comprehensive infrastructure solutions.

Meskipun prospek pertumbuhan positif, Mitratel tetap mempertimbangkan tantangan ekonomi global,seperti fluktuasi nilai tukar, inflasi, dan ketidakpastian geopolitik yang dapat memengaruhi biaya operasional dan investasi. Namun, dengan strategi ekspansi yang terukur dan diversifikasi portofolio, Mitratel berada pada posisi yang baik untuk mengatasi tantangan ini dan memanjaatkan peluang pertumbuhan diasar domestik dan internasional.

# Proyeksi Tahun 2025

Pada tahun 2025, industri menara telekomunikasi diproyeksikan makeshift tambuh positif seiring dengan peningkatan kebutuhan infrastruktur pendukung bagi operatior telekomunikasi seluler. Namun demikian, pertumbuhan industri menara telekomunikasi diperkirakan akan mengalami perlambatan yang disebabkan oleh konsolidasi di industri telekomunikasi seluler. Seiring dengan pertumbuhan industri, Perseroan memroyeksikan pertumbuhan pendapatan di kasaran  $1,8\%$  pada tahun 2025.

# Projections for 2025

In 2025, the telecommunications tower industry is projected to continue its positive growth in line with the increasing demand for supporting infrastructure from mobile network operators. However, the growth rate of the tower industry is expected to slow down due to consolidation within the mobile telecommunications sector. In line with industry growth, the Company projects revenue growth in the range of  $1.8\%$  in 2025.

# Kebijakan dan Pembagian Dividen

# Kebijakan Dividen

Pembagian dividend Perseroan ditetapkan melalui Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham (RUPS) Tahunan berdasarkan rekomendasi Direksi, sesuai dengan Undang-Undang Perseroan dan Anggaran Dasar. Dividen dapat dibagikan jika Perseroan memiliki saldo laba positif, dengan mempertimbangkan kinerja keuangan, arus kas, dan prospek usaha.

Selain itu, dividem interim dapat dibagikan sebelum tahun buku berakhir dengan persetujuan Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris, asalkan tidak menyebabkan kekayaan bersih Perseroan turun di bawah modal yang disetor. Jika setelah tahun buku berakhir Perseroan mengalami kerugian, dividem interim yang telah dibayarkan harus dikembaliakan oleh Pemegang Saham.

Sesuai dengan Prospektus Penawaran Umum Perdana Saham, Perseroan berencana membagikan dividen tunai dengan rasio maksimal  $70\%$  dari LABa bersih setelah cadangan, sesuai keputusan RUPS. Dividen akan dibayarkan dalam Rupiah, dengan pemotongan pajak sesuai peraturan yang berlaku, termasuk tariff  $20\%$  bagi Pemegang Saham asing, tergantung pada perjanjian pajak yang berlaku.

# Dividend Policy and Distribution

# Dividend Policy

The Company's dividend distribution is determined through the Annual General Meeting of Shareholders (AGMS) based on the recommendation of the Board of Directors, in accordance with the Law on Limited Liability Company and the Articles of Association. Dividends can be distributed if the Company has a positive retained earnings balance, by considering financial performance, cash flows, and business prospects.

Furthermore, interim dividends may be distributed before the fiscal year ends with the approval of the Board of Directors and the Board of Commissioners, provided that it does not cause the Company's net assets to fall below the paid-in capital. If the Company incurs losses after the fiscal year ends, any interim dividends paid must be returned by the Shareholders.

In accordance with the Initial Public Offering Prospectus, the Company plans to distribute cash dividends with a maximum payout ratio of  $70\%$  of net profit after reserves, as determined by the GMS resolution. Dividends will be paid in Rupiah, subject to tax deductions as per applicable regulations, including a  $20\%$  rate for foreign Shareholders, depending on the relevant tax treaty.

In 2021, the Company conducted an initial public offering (IPO) on Indonesia Stock Exchange for 22,920,512,000 common shares, representing  $27.6\%$  of the Company's issued and paid-up capital after the IPO, with a nominal value of Rp228.00 per share and an offering price of Rp800.00 per share.

Setelah dikurangi biaya-biaya, total dapat bersih yang diterima Perseroan dari penawaran umum perdana saham adalah sebesar Rp18.463.293.445.139,00. # Sumber Daya Manusia

# Human Resources

Mitratel ermögkan manajemen sumber daya manusia (SDM) yang komprehensif, mencakup seluruh proses mulai dari perencanaan kebutuhan tenaga kerja hingga persiapanASA pensiun karyawan. Pendekatan ini didukung oleh tata kelola yang efektif, efsien, dan adaptif Seeinggam memastikan pengelolaan SDM berjalan secara optimal. Dengan fokus pada pengembangan kompetensi dan kesejahteraan karyawan, Mitratel berupaya menciptakan tenaga kerja yang andal dan berdaya saing tinggi.

Melalui strategi SDM yang terintegrasi, Mitratel tidak hatanya memprioritaskan pemenuhan kebutuhan operasional saat ini, tetapi juga membrangun fondasi untuk mendukung pertumbuhan jangka panjang perusahaan. SDM yang kompeten dan berdedikasi menjadi pilar penting dalam mendukung inovasi, efisiensi,serta keberlanjutan bisnis.

Hal ini semakin diperkuat melalui program utama Mitratel 2024, "The Winner", di mana Divisi Human Capital Management diharapkan untuk menciplementasikan inisiatif strategis pertama, yaitu "Transform to Digital Culture and Digital Talent Capability Align with Business Strategy".

Langkah-langkah utama dalaminisiatif ini meliputi:

1. Perencanaan talenta berbasis budaya digital untuk mencatkan daya tarik dan proposisi nilai bagi kanyakan (high employee proposition based on digital culture).  
2. Penguatan roadmap kapabilitasagar selaras dengan strategi bisnis Perseroan (enhance capability roadmap align with business strategy).  
3. Penyusunan struktur organisi yang adaptif, termasuk bagi Entitas Anak (create adaptive organization structure including subsidiary management).

Upaya tersebut(CC)lepada khusial dan memastikan Mitratel tidakanyak mencapai posisi terdepan dalam industri, tetapi juga menciptakan lingkungan kerja yang mendorong inovasi dan kreativitas. Dengan demikian, Mitratel dapat membuka jalan bagi pertumbuhan yang berkelanjutan diASA depan.

# Strategi Pengembangan SDM Tahun 2024

Strategi pengembangan SDM tahun 2024 dibagi menjadi 3 aspek utama, yaitu organization, people, dan technology. Pada masing-masing aspek, terdapat tema tersebut yang menjadi dasar dalam pengembangan program:

Mitratel implements comprehensive human resource (HR) management, covering the entire process from workforce planning to employee retirement preparation. This approach is supported by effective, efficient, and adaptive governance to ensure optimal HR management. With a focus on competency development and employee well-being, Mitratel strives to create a reliable and highly competitive workforce.

Through an integrated HR strategy, Mitratel not only prioritizes meeting current operational needs but also builds a foundation to support the Company's long-term growth. Competent and dedicated human resources serve as a crucial pillar in driving innovation, efficiency, and business sustainability.

This commitment is further reinforced through Mitratel's 2024 flagship program, "The Winner", where the Human Capital Management Division is expected to implement the first strategic initiative, "Transform to Digital Culture and Digital Talent Capability Align with Business Strategy".

The key steps in this initiative include:

1. Talent planning based on digital culture to enhance attractiveness and employee value proposition (high employee proposition based on digital culture).  
2. Strengthening the capability roadmap to align with the Company's business strategy (enhance capability roadmap align with business strategy).  
3. Developing an adaptive organizational structure, including for subsidiary management (create adaptive organization structure including subsidiary management).

These efforts are crucial in ensuring that Mitratel not only secures a leading position in the industry but also fosters a work environment that encourages innovation and creativity. Thus, Mitratel can pave the way for sustainable growth in the future.

# HR Development Strategy for 2024

The HR development strategy for 2024 was divided into 3 main aspects: organization, people, and technology. Each aspect has a key theme that serves as the foundation for program development:

1. Aspek People: Improve People Competencies Thru Capability Roadmap and Corporate Strategy
Tema ini bertujuan memastikan bahwa karyawan dapat menc Gatkan kompetensi karyawan yang diperlukan untuk beradaptasi dengan perubahan strategi bisnis melalui program pengembangan yang efektif. Program utama yang diimplementasikan:

a. Program pembelajaran dan pengembangan yang komprehensif berdasarkan capability roadmap; dan  
b. Desain dan implementasi program orientasi bagi karyawanbaru, termasuk lulusanbaru.

2. Aspek Organization: Strengthening Organization and Human Capital Policies by Re-aligning Business Focus Tema ini berfokus pada penyesuuan desain organisasiagar selaras dengan strategi bisnis Perseroan. Langkah utama yang dilakukan adalah penguatan desain organisasi untuk mendukung pencapaian tujuan bisnis, penyusunan rencana strategis pengelolaan SDM sebagai bagian dari strategi keberlanjutan, dan mempersiakan proses suksesi yang solid untuk memastikan kesinambungan bisnis di atas depan.

3. Aspek Technology: Enhancement Human Capital Platform Through Digital Technology

Tema ini bertujuan untuk mencatkan efisiensi, efektivitas, dan kualitas pengelolaan SDM melalui pemanfaatan tekologi digital. Fokus utama dalam implementasi telah integrasi database SDM untuk menciptakan systemd manajemen SDM yang lebih terhubung dan pemanfaatan data SDM dalam pengambilan keputusan berbasis analitik.

1. People Aspect: Improve People Competencies Through Capability Roadmap and Corporate Strategy

This theme aims to ensure that employees enhance the competencies needed to adapt to changing business strategies through effective development programs.

The key programs implemented include:

a. A comprehensive learning and development program based on the capability roadmap; and  
b. Design and implementation of an orientation program for new employees, including fresh graduates.

2. Organization Aspect: Strengthening Organization and Human Capital Policies by Re-aligning Business Focus This theme focuses on adjusting the organizational design to align with the Company's business strategy. The key steps taken include strengthening organizational design to support business objectives, developing a strategic HR management plan as part of the sustainability strategy, and preparing a solid succession process to ensure business continuity in the future.  
3. Technology Aspect: Enhancement of Human Capital Platform Through Digital Technology

This theme aims to improve the efficiency, effectiveness, and quality of HR management through the utilization of digital technology. The main focus of implementation includes integrating the HR database to create a more connected HR management system and leveraging HR data for analytics-based decision-making.

# - Teknologi Informasi

# Information Technology

Tata kelola tekologi informasi (TI) berperan penting dalam mendukung keberlanjutan kegiatan operasional Mitratel Group dan merupakan sarana dalam menjalankan kegiatan usaha. Untuk mencapai efektivitas dan efisiensi dalam hal pengambilan keputusan, analisis data,{serta pelaporan dalam skala korporat yang dilakukan dalam Perseroan maupun Entitas Anak,make pengelolaan TI Mitratel Group dilakukan secara terintegrasi yang mencakup seluruh aspek bisnis, termasuk aspek tata kelolanya.

Pengelolaan TI Perseroan lijalankan oleh Unit Information Technology yang bertanggung jawab langsung kepada Senior Vice President Corporate Strategy and Digital Transformation. Melalui rangkaian inovasi yang menjadi bagian dari proses transformasi digital, Perseroan berhasil melakukan otomatisasi seluruh proses bisnis secara bertahap.

Information technology (IT) governance plays a crucial role in supporting the sustainability of Mitratel Group's operational activities and serves as a means of conducting business operations. To achieve effectiveness and efficiency in decision-making, data analysis, and corporate-scale reporting carried out within the Company and its Subsidiaries, Mitratel Group's IT management is conducted in an integrated manner, covering all business aspects, including governance aspects.

The Company's IT management is carried out by the Information Technology Unit, which reports directly to the Senior Vice President of Corporate Strategy and Digital Transformation. Through a series of innovations as part of the digital transformation process, the Company has successfully automated all business processes gradually.

# Pelaksanaan Program dan Kebijakan TI Tahun 2024

Untuk mewujudkan strategi dan kebikan pengelolaan TI, makasepanjang tahun 2024, Perseroan telah melaksananakan berbagai kebikan dan program strategistis yang menjadi bagian dari rencana jangka panjang Perseroan secara keseluruhan yang meliputi:

1. Peningkatan manajemen Application Programming Interface (API) untuk systemd Customer Relationship Management (CRM) dan Transport Management System (TMS);  
2. Implementasi Secure Software Development Life Cycle untuk menc Gatkan keamanan dalam pengembangan perangkat lunak;  
3. Integrasi systemd perbankan Host-to-Host[dengan Systems, Applications, and Products (SAP) guna meningkatkan efisiensi transaksi keuangan;  
4. Pengembangan Robotic Process Automation (RPA) untuk mengotomatiskan proses bisnis guna menc Gatkan efisiensi operasional; dan  
5. Kajian hukum terhadap Surat Perintah Mulai Kerja (SPMK) menjadi bagian dari penguatan tata kelola dan kepadahan regulasi.

# Implementation of IT Programs and Policies in 2024

To realize the Company's IT management strategy and policies, throughout 2024, the Company implemented various strategic policies and programs that form part of its overall long-term plan, including:

1. Enhancement of Application Programming Interface (API) management for the Customer Relationship Management (CRM) and Transport Management System (TMS);  
2. Implementation of Secure Software Development Life Cycle to improve security in software development;  
3. Integration of Host-to-Host banking systems with Systems, Applications, and Products (SAP) to enhance financial transaction efficiency;

# IT Governance Process

Mitratel recognizes the importance of strong IT governance in sustaining its business in the telecommunications sector. As a company engaged in telecommunications installation, central construction, as well as cable and wireless telecommunications activities, Mitratel manages IT infrastructure with a focus on risk mitigation and system enhancement. The IT governance process is carried out through the implementation of structured policies, regular system performance monitoring, and technological innovation development to improve operational efficiency.

IT risk management at Mitratel involves identifying and evaluating potential system disruptions and cybersecurity threats that could impact services. Security strategies include implementing advanced firewall systems, data encryption, and enhancing real-time cyber threat monitoring capabilities. Additionally, IT staff training is conducted to improve awareness and competence in addressing digital security challenges. These measures ensure the protection of customer data, smooth operations, and the trust of business partners.

# - Komitmen Penerapan GCG

Commitment to GCG Implementation

Perseroan bergomitmen secara摄入 untuk mencapkan prinsip-prinsip tata kelola perusahaan yang baik (good corporate governance/GCG) secara konsisten dan komprehensif di setup kegiatan usaha sehari-hari dan di seluruh aspek bisnis sebagai langkah untuk mencakatkan kinerja dan nilai Perseroanagar mampu tambuh dengan berkesinambungan. Sejalan dengan itu, Perseroan juga bergomitmen摄入 untuk mencapkan 4 prinsip GCG sebagai landasan atas pengelolaan usaha yang akuntabel, dan memastikan bahwa Perseroantidakhanyakamenyediakan layanan pelanggan terbaik, tetapi juga mempertimbangkan serta menciptakan nilai tersebut yang berkelanjutan bagi kepada pengentingan para Pemegang Saham, masyarakat secara luas, dan pemangku kepada pengentingan lainnya.

Keempat pilar GCG tersebut pertama kali diperkenalkan dalam Pedoman Umum Governansi Corporat Indonesia (PUGKI) 2021 dan merupakan pengembangan sesuai dengan perkembangan terkini dari nilai dasar transparansi, akuntabilitas, responsibilitas, independensi, dan fairness (TARIF). Princip dasar GCG yang berlaku dan diterapkan oleh Perseroan meliputi 4 aspek. Penerapan keempat prinsip tersebut akan memberikan kontribusi positif dalam rangka mencaringkatkan praktik GCG Perseroan. Keempat pilar tersebut diuraikan sebagai berikut.

# 1. Perilaku Beretika

Perseroan@mengedepankan kejujuran, menghormati semua pihak, memenuhi komitmen, membrangun{serta menjaga menjaga nilai-nilai moral dan kepercayaan secara konsisten. Perseroanmemperhatikan kepentangan Pemegang Saham dan pemangku kepentangan lainnya diferoperhatikan berdasarkan asas kewajaran dan kesetaraan, dengan pengelolaan independen yang mencegah dominasi antar organ perusahaan dan intervensi pihak luar.

# 2. Akuntabilitas

Perseroan dapat mempertanggungjawabkan kinerja secara transparan dan wajar. Untuk itu, pengelolaan Perseroan dilakukan benar, terukur, dan sesuai kepentingan Perseroan dengan tetap memperhitikan kepentingan Pemegang Saham dan pemangku kepentingan. Akuntabilitas merupakan prasyarat penting untuk mencapai kinerja yang berkelanjutan, di mana setuptifikan dan keputusan dapat dipertanggungjawabkan kepada semua pihak terkait.

# 3. Transparansi

Perseroan menyediakan informasi yang material dan relevant dengan cara yang mudah diakses dan dipahami oleh pemangku kepentingan. Selain memenuhi kewajiban pengungkapan tersebut peraturan, Perseroan juga mengungkapkan informasi penting untuk

The Company is fully committed to implementing the principles of good corporate governance (GCG) consistently and comprehensively in daily business activities and all aspects of its operations as a step to improve the Company's performance and value so that it can grow sustainably. In line with this, the Company is also fully committed to applying the 4 GCG principles as the foundation for accountable business management and ensuring that the Company not only provides the best customer service but also considers and creates sustainable added value for Shareholders, the wider community, and other stakeholders.

These four pillars of GCG were first introduced in the 2021 the Indonesian General Guidelines for Corporate Governance (PUGKI) and were developed in accordance with the latest advancements based on the core values of transparency, accountability, responsibility, independence, and fairness (TARIF). The fundamental GCG principles adopted and implemented by the Company encompass 4 aspects. The application of these 4 principles will contribute positively to enhancing the Company's GCG practices. The four pillars are outlined as follows.

# 1. Ethical Behavior

The Company upholds honesty, respects all parties, fulfills commitments, and consistently builds and maintains moral values and trust. The Company considers the interests of Shareholders and other stakeholders based on the principles of fairness and equality, with independent management that prevents dominance between corporate organs and external interference.

# 2. Accountability

The Company ensures transparent and fair accountability for its performance. Therefore, the Company's management is conducted properly, measurably, and in line with the Company's interests while still considering the interests of Shareholders and stakeholders. Accountability is a crucial prerequisite for achieving sustainable performance, where every action and decision can be justified to all relevant parties.

# 3. Transparency

The Company provides material and relevant information in an accessible and understandable manner for stakeholders. In addition to fulfilling disclosure obligations as per regulations, the Company also discloses essential information for decision-making

pengambilan keputusan Pemegang Saham, kreditur, dan pemangku kepentingan lainnya, memastikan semua pihak memilaki akses yang diperlukan.

4. Keberlanjutan

Perseroan mematuhi peraturan perundang-undangan dan melaksanakan tanggung jawab terhadap masyarakat dengan berkontribusi pada pembangunan berkelanjutan. Melalui kerja sama dengan semua pemangku kelentingan erkait, Perseroan berupaya menc Gatkan kehidupan dengan cara yang selaras dengan kelentingan bisnis dan agenda pembangunan berkelanjutan.

by Shareholders, creditors, and other stakeholders, ensuring that all parties have the necessary access.

4. Sustainability

The Company complies with laws and regulations and fulfills its responsibilities toward society and the environment by contributing to sustainable development. Through collaboration with all relevant stakeholders, the Company strives to improve lives in a manner aligned with business interests and the sustainable development agenda.

# Mekanisme GCG

GCG Mechanism

Struktur GCG Perseroan berjalan melalui mekanisme yang melibatkan seluruh organ dengan tanggung jawab yang terdefinisji jelas sehingga memastikan pengelolaan yang akuntabel. RUPS memiliki kewenangan tertinggi untuk mengambil keputusan strategis jangka panjang, yang kemudian dilimpahkan kepada Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi untuk pelaksanaannya. Setiap keputusan diimplementasikan oleh Direksi, dengan pengawasan serta arahan dari Dewan Komisaris sesuai ketentuan Anggaran Dasar Perseroan.

Dalam melaksanakan fungsinya, Dewan Komisaris dibantu oleh Komite Audit, Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi, ada Komite Evaluasi dan Monitoring Perencanaan dan Risiko. Sementara itu, Direksi, sebagai pelaksana pengelolaan Perseroan, didukung oleh Sekretaris Perusahaan dan Unit Audit Internal. Audit eksternal juga dilibatkan untuk memastikan laporan keuangandisajikan secara independen dan sesuai standar. Kombiniasi mekanisme ini mendukung tata kelola yang transparan dan bertanggung jawab demi mencapai tujuan Perseroan.

The Company's GCG structure operates through a mechanism that involves all organs with clearly defined responsibilities, ensuring accountable management. The GMS holds the highest authority in making long-term strategic decisions, which are then delegated to the Board of Commissioners and the Board of Directors for implementation. Each decision is executed by the Board of Directors, under the supervision and guidance of the Board of Commissioners, in accordance with the Company's Articles of Association.

In carrying out its functions, the Board of Commissioners is assisted by the Audit Committee, the Nomination and Remuneration Committee, and Committee for Planning and Risk Evaluation and Monitoring. Meanwhile, the Board of Directors, as the executive management of the Company, is supported by the Corporate Secretary and the Internal Audit Unit. External audits are also involved to ensure that financial statements are presented independently and in accordance with standards. This combination of mechanisms supports transparent and accountable governance to achieve the Company's objectives.

# Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham

General Meeting of Shareholders

Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham (RUPS) adalah organ tertinggi dalam struktur Perseroan yang mempunyai wewenang yang tidak diberikan kepada Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris dalamatas yang ditentukan dalam peraturan perdang-undangan dan Anggaran Dasar Perseroan. RUPS juga menjadi forum bagi Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi untuk melaporkan pertanggungjawaban mengenai pelaksanaanugas dalam menckatkan kinerja Perseroan untuk kepentingan Pemegang Saham. RUPS berfungsi sebagai wadah pengambilan keputusan penting yang menentukan arah bisnis perusahaan. Berdasarkan Anggaran Dasar Perseroan, RUPS terdiri dari RUPS Tahunan yang diadakan setahun sekali dan RUPS lainnya yang dilaksanan sesuai kebutuhan dan dianggap perlu oleh Direksi atas arahan Dewan Komisaris, Direksi, ata umintaan Pemegang Saham.

# Hak Pemegang Saham

Hak-hak Pemegang Saham harus dilindungi sesuai dengan Anggaran Dasar dan peraturan yang berlaku. Hak-hak tersebut antara lain:

1. Menghadiri RUPS dan memberikan suara pada RUPS;  
2. Memperoleh informasi yang bersifat material mengenai Perseroan, baik dari Dewan Komisaris maupun Direksi, mengenai keuanganan ata hal-hal lain yang menyangkut perusahaan secara lenghtkap, tepat waktu, dan teratur;  
3. Memperoleh pembagian dari laba Perseroan dalam pentuk dividen, sebanding dengan jumlah saham yang dimiliki;  
4. Terkait dengan RUPS, Pemegang Saham berhak memperoleh penjelasan lengkap berkenaan dengan penyelenggaraan di antaranya pemanggilan untuk RUPS, mata acara RUPS, usulan yang direncanakan oleh Direksi untuk diajukan dalam mata acara RUPS, keputusan RUPS yang diambil secara transparan dan adil, dan ringkasan risalah RUPS; dan  
5. Mendapat perilakukan yang setara, yaitu:

a. Setiap Pemegang Saham memiliki perilakuan yang sama atau setara (equal treatment);  
b. Setiap Pemegang Saham dengan hak suara yang sah berhak mengeluarkan hak suara sesuai dengan jumlah saham yang dimiliki; dan  
c. Setiap Pemegang Saham berhak memperoleh informasi yang lenghtkap dan akurat mengenai Perseroan.

The General Meeting of Shareholders (GMS) is the highest organ within the Company's structure, holding authority not granted to the Board of Directors and the Board of Commissioners, within the limits set by laws and the Company's Articles of Association. The GMS also serves as a forum for the Board of Commissioners and the Board of Directors to report on their accountability regarding the implementation of duties in improving the Company's performance for the benefit of Shareholders. The GMS functions as a resolution- adoption platform for key matters that determine the Company's business direction. According to the Company's Articles of Association, the GMS consists of the Annual GMS, held once a year, and other GMS meetings convened as needed and necessary at the discretion of the Board of Directors, based on the direction of the Board of Commissioners, the Board of Directors, or at the request of Shareholders.

# Shareholders' Rights

The Shareholders' rights must be protected in accordance with the Articles of Association and applicable regulations. These rights include:

1. Attending the GMS and voting at the GMS;  
2. Obtaining material information regarding the Company, both from the Board of Commissioners and the Board of Directors, regarding finances or other matters concerning the Company in a complete, timely, and orderly manner;  
3. Obtaining a distribution of the Company's profits in the form of dividends, in proportion to the number of shares owned;  
4. In relation to the GMS, Shareholders are entitled to obtain a complete explanation regarding the implementation, including notice for the GMS, the GMS agenda, proposals planned by the Board of Directors to be put on the agenda of the GMS, GMS resolutions adopted in a transparent and fair manner, and summary of minutes of the GMS; and

5. Receiving equal treatment, such as:

a. Shareholders who own shares with the same classification must be treated equally (equal treatment);  
b. Every Shareholder with valid voting rights has the right to issue voting rights in accordance with the classification and number of shares owned; and  
c. Every Shareholder has the right to obtain complete and accurate information about the Company.

# Wewenang RUPS

Dalam RUPS Tahunan dan RUPS lainnya, Pemegang Saham mempunyai kewenangan dalam hal:

1. Pengangkatan dan pemberhentian Dewan Komisaris dan/atau Direksi Perseroan;  
2. Penetapan jumlah remunerasi dan tunjangan Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi Perseroan;  
3. Persetujuan Laporan Tahunan dan pengesahan Laporan Keuangan;  
4. Penentuan dan persetujuan terhadap penggunaan laba;  
5. Penetapan auditor eksternal untuk makukan audit keuangan atas Laporan Keuangan;  
6. Aksi korporasi yang sifat ataupun nilainya membutuhkan persetujuan dari Pemegang Saham berdasarkan Anggaran Dasar dan peraturan perundang-undangan yang berlaku;  
7. Penetapan perubahan Anggaran Dasar; dan  
8. Persetujuan之作 transaksi yang mempunyai benturan kepentingan.

# Tata Cara Pelaksanaan RUPS

Tata cara pelaksanaan RUPS tersebut ketentuan yang diatur dalam dengan Undang-Undang No. 40 tahun 2007 ingin Perseroan Terbatas, Peraturan Otoritas Jasa Keuangan No. 15/POJK.04/2020 ingin Rencana Penyelenggaraan Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham Perusahaan Terbuka, Peraturan Otoritas Jasa Keuangan No. 16/POJK.04/2020 ingin Pelaksanaan Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham Perusahaan Terbuka Secara Elektronik,serta Anggaran Dasar Perseroan.

# Mekanisme Pengambilan Keputusan

Mekanisme pengambilan keputusan dalam RUPS dilakukan secara musyawarah untuk mufakat. Namun apabila musyawarah untuk mufakat tidak tercapai,.make pengambilan keputusan dilakukan dengan cara pemungutan suara (voting). Untuk mata acara yang sifatnya merupakan pelaporan, tidak dilakukan pengambilan keputusan.

# GMS Authority

In the Annual GMS and Other GMS, the Shareholders have authorities in terms of:

1. Appointment and dismissal of the Company's Board of Commissioners and/or Board of Directors;  
2. Determination of remuneration amount and allowances for the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors of the Company;  
3. Approval of the Annual Report and ratification of the Financial Statements;  
4. Appropriation and approval of the use of profit;  
5. Determination of an external auditor to conduct a financial audit of the Financial Statements;  
6. Corporate actions whose nature or value requires approval from the Shareholders based on the Articles of Association and the prevailing laws and regulations;  
7. Amendments to the Articles of Association; and  
8. Approval for transactions that have conflicts of interest.

# Procedures for Convening the GMS

The procedures for convening the GMS follow the provisions stipulated in Law No. 40 of 2007 on Limited Liability Companies, Financial Services Authority Regulation No. 15/POJK.04/2020 on the Planning and Convening the General Meeting of Shareholders of Public Companies, Financial Services Authority Regulation No. 16/POJK.04/2020 on the Implementation of Electronic General Meeting of Shareholders of Public Companies, as well as the Company's Articles of Association.

# Mechanism for Adopting Resolutions

The mechanism for adopting resolutions in the GMS is conducted through deliberation to reach a consensus. However, if consensus is not achieved, resolutions are adopted through voting. For agenda items that are of a reporting nature, no resolution-adoption mechanism is conducted.

# Dewan Komisaris

# Board of Commissioners

Dewan Komisaris berfungsi-Sebagai badan pengawasan dan supervisi Perseroan secara keseluruhan di mana anggotanya ditunjuk dan bertanggung jawab langsung kepada Pemegang Saham. Selain makukan fungsi pengawasan dan supervisi, Dewan Komisaris juga memberikan nasihat kepada Direksi.

# Pedoman Kerja Dewan Komisaris

Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi memiliki Panduan Tata Kerja Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi (Board Manual), yang mencjadi acuan bagi anggota Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi dalam melaksanakan tugas, tanggung jawab, dan kewenangannya. Board Manual Dewan Komisaris pertama kali disusun dan mulai berlaku pada tanggal 25 Agustus 2021, sebagai tertuang dalam Peraturan Bersama Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi Tbk No. 006/DEKOM-DMT/08/2021 danNo.DMT.1473/CSO/DMT-1000000/VII/2021.

The Board of Commissioners functions as the supervisory and oversight body of the Company, with its members appointed and directly accountable to the Shareholders. In addition to its supervisory and oversight functions, the Board of Commissioners also provides advice to the Board of Directors.

# Board of Commissioners' Charter

The Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors have the Guidelines for Work Procedure of the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors (Board Manual), which serves as a reference for members of the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors in carrying out their duties, responsibilities, and authorities. The Board of Commissioners' Board Manual was first drafted and became effective on August 25, 2021, as stated in the Joint Regulation of the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors of PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi Tbk No. 006/DEKOM-DMT/08/2021 and No. DMT.1473/CSO/ DMT-1000000/VII/2021.

Sejalan dengan perkembangan praktik terbaik GCG, peraturanasar modal,erta ketentuan dan peraturan perundang-undangan yang berlaku, Perseroan telah menyesuikan Board Manual, dengan revisi tersebut pada tahun 2024. Revisi ini didasarkan pada Peraturan Bersama Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi Tbk No. 060/DEKOM-DMT/10/2024 dan No. PD.0009/HK 200/DMT-11120000/2024 tersebut Panduan Tata Kerja dan Kode Etik Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi (Board Manual) PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi Tbk tanggal 30 Oktober 2024.

# Komposisi Dewan Komisaris

Berdasarkan Board Manual, komosisi Dewan Komisaris Perseroan minimal terdiri atas 2 orang anggota dan seorang di antaranya diangkat sebagai Komisaris Utama. Masa jabatan anggota Dewan Komisaris ditetapkan 5 tahun dan dapat diangkat kembali untuk 1 kali mata jabatan. Pada tahun 2024, komosisi Dewan Komisaris terdiri dari 5 orang, yaitu:

In line with the development of best GCG practices, capital market regulations, and applicable laws and regulations, the Company has adjusted the Board Manual with the latest revision in 2024. This revision was based on the Joint Regulation of the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors of PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi Tbk No. 060/DEKOM-DMT/10/2024 and No. PD.0009/HK 200/DMT-11120000/2024 on the Guidelines for Work Procedures and Code of Ethics of the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors of PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi Tbk, dated October 30, 2024.

# Board of Commissioners' Composition

Based on the Board Manual, the Board of Commissioners' composition must consist of at least 2 members, one of whom is appointed as the President Commissioner.
