# - Kebijakan Pemisahan Chairman of the Board dan Chief Executive Officer

Policy on the Separation of Chairman of the Board and Chief Executive Officer

Untuk memastikan pengerapan GCG dan mendukung keberlanjutan bisnis, Mitratel menerapkan kebikan pemisahan peran antara Chairman of the Board (Komisaris Utama) dan Chief Executive Officer (CEO) (Direktur Utama). Berdasarkan Peraturan Bersama Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi Tbk No. 060/DEKOM-DMT/10/2024 dan No. PD. 0009/HK 200/DMT-11120000/2024 tersebut Panduan Tata Kerja Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi (Board Manual) PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi Tbk tanggal 30 Oktober 2024, kebikan ini mengaskan perbedaan peran antara pengawasan dan pengelolaan operasional.

Yusuf Wibisono-Sebagai Chairman of the Board bertugas memimpin Dewan Komisaris untuk memastikan efektivitas pengawasan dan pemberian arahan strategis. Sementara itu, Theodorus Ardi Hartoko-Sebagai Chief Executive Officer berfokus pada pengelolaan operasional perusahaan, memastikan pencapaian target kinerja, dan eksekusi strategi bisnis.

To ensure the implementation of GCG and support business sustainability, Mitratel enforces a policy of separating the roles of Chairman of the Board (President Commissioner) and Chief Executive Officer (CEO) (President Director). Based on the Joint Regulation of the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors of PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi Tbk No. 060/DEKOM-DMT/10/2024 and No. PD. 0009/HK 200/DMT-11120000/2024 on the Board Manual of PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi Tbk dated October 30, 2024, this policy emphasizes the distinction between oversight and operational management roles.

Yusuf Wibisono, as Chairman of the Board, is responsible for leading the Board of Commissioners to ensure effective supervision and provide strategic direction. Meanwhile, Theodorus Ardi Hartoko, as Chief Executive Officer, focuses on corporate operational management, ensuring the achievement of performance targets, and executing business strategies.

# - Nominasi dan Remunerasi Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi

Nomination and Remuneration of the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors

Nominasi Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi

# Kebijakan{serta Prosedur Nominasi Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi

Pengangkatan dan pemberhentian anggota Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi merupakan kewenangan strategis Pemegang Saham yang dilaksanan melalui mekanisme RUPS. Proses nominasi calon anggota Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi dilakukan dengan menjadu pada kebutuhan strategis Perseroan, seda ketentuan dalam Anggaran Dasar No. 58 Tahun 2022, khususnya Pasal 11 ayat (3) dan Pasal 14 ayat (4). Hal ini memastikan kepada kandidat yang dipilih memenuhi kriteria yang relevant untuk mendukung visi dan misi perusahaan.

Nomination of the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors

# Nomination Policy and Procedure of the Board of Commissioners and the Board of Directors

The appointment and dismissal of members of the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors are strategic authorities of the Shareholders, executed through the GMS mechanism. The nomination process for candidates for the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors is carried out by referring to the Company's strategic needs and the provisions outlined in the Articles of Association No. 58 of 2022, specifically Article 11, Paragraph (3), and Article 14, Paragraph (4). This ensures that selected candidates meet the relevant criteria to support the company's vision and mission.

Sebagai bentuk komitmen terhadap GCG, Dewan Komisaris Perseroan membrantuk Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi. Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi dibentuk berdasarkan Keputusan Dewan Komisaris PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi Tbk No. 006/DEKOM-DMT/07/2022. Tugas Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi meliputi penyusunan kebijakan nominasi dan remunerasi serta evaluasi terhadap kinerja Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris, seesingga proses pengangkatan maupun pemberhentian anggota organ perusahaan dapat dilakukan secara transparan dan seksuai prinsip-prinsip GCG.

# Kebijakan Kriteria Khusus Pemilihan Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi

Mitratel membriliki kebijakan yang menetapkan kriteria khusus dalam proses pemilihan Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi guna memastikan GCG dan mendukung keberlanjutan bisnis. Pemilihan dilakukan berdasarkan integritas, kompetensi, dan kemampuan strategis yang sesuai dengan kebutuhan perusahaan.

Anggota Dewan Komisaris diharapkan memilikipengetahuan mendalam sentir regulasi, tata kelola, dan strategi bisnis untuk menjalankan fungsi pengawasan secara efektif. Sementara itu, Direksi dipilih berdasarkan keahlian di bidang operasional, manajemen risiko, keuangan, dan inovasi untuk memastikan pelaksanaan operasional yang optimal.

Pemilihan ulang anggota dilakukan dengan mempertimbangkan evaluasi kinerja tahun, kontribusi terhadap perusahaan, dan kesesuaian dengan kebutuhan bisnis yang Berkembang. Proses ini diawasi oleh Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi, yang memberikan rekomendasi kepada RUPS untuk persetujuan akhir.

# Remunerasi Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi

# Prosedur dan Dasar Penetapan Remunerasi Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi

Penetapan bescharen remunerasi bidi anggota Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi dilakukan melalui mekanisme RUPS. Dewan Komisaris menjalankan fungsi remunerasi antara lain dengan:

1. Memberikan rekomendasi mengenai struktur remunerasi, kebikan atas remunerasi, dan tersebut atas remunerasi; dan  
2. Melakukan penilaian kinerja dengan kesesuaian remunerasi yang diterima masing-masing anggota Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris.

As a commitment to GCG, the Company's Board of Commissioners has established a Nomination and Remuneration Committee. The committee was formed based on the Board of Commissioners' Decision of PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi Tbk No. 006/DEKOM-DMT/07/2022. The responsibilities of the Nomination and Remuneration Committee include formulating nomination and remuneration policies and evaluating the performance of the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners, ensuring that the appointment and dismissal of corporate organs are conducted transparently and in accordance with GCG principles.

# Policy on Specific Criteria for the Selection of the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors

Mitratel has a policy that establishes specific criteria for the selection process of the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors to ensure GCG and support business sustainability. The selection is based on integrity, competence, and strategic capabilities aligned with the company's needs.

Members of the Board of Commissioners are expected to have in-depth knowledge of regulations, corporate governance, and business strategy to effectively carry out their supervisory functions. Meanwhile, the Board of Directors is selected based on expertise in operations, risk management, finance, and innovation to ensure optimal operational execution.

The reappointment of members is conducted by considering annual performance evaluations, contributions to the Company, and alignment with evolving business needs. This process is overseen by the Nomination and Remuneration Committee, which provides recommendations to the GMS for final approval.

# Remuneration of the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors

# Procedure and Basis for Determining the Remuneration of the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors

The determination of amount of remuneration for members of the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors is conducted through the GMS mechanism. The Board of Commissioners performs its remuneration function by:

1. Providing recommendations on the remuneration structure, remuneration policies, and remuneration amounts; and  
2. Conducting performance assessments to ensure the remuneration received by each member of the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners aligns with their performance.

Besaran,jisien,dan tata Cara pemberian remunerasi bagi anggota Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi termasuk perubahanya mengikuti ketentuan dalam peraturan perdang-undangan,Anggaran Dasar,serta peraturan Perusahaan.

Dalam melakukan pembahasan,isaran remunerasi bagi Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi, Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi mempertimbangkan,) beberapa indicator, antara lain:

1. KPI atopu hasil penilaian kinerja masing-masing anggota Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi;  
2. Kinerja Perseroan;  
3. Ukuran bisnis; dan  
4. Hasil benchmarking remunerasi di pasar tenaga kerja.

# Struktur dan Besaran Remunerasi

Struktur remunerasi Dewan Komisaris terdiri dari:

1. Gaji/honorarium;  
2. Tunjangan yang terdiri atas Tunjangan Hari Raya (THR), tunjangan transportasi, dan asuransi purnajabatan;  
3. Fasilitas yang antara lain terdiri atas fasilitas kesehatan dan fasilitas bantuan hukum;  
4. Tantiem/insertif kinerja. Rincian, besaran, jeris, dan tata cara pemberian penghasilan Dewan Komisaris dan anggota Direksi termasuk perubahnya, mengikuti ketentuan dalam peraturan perdang-undangan, Anggaran Dasar, dan peraturan Perusahaan; dan  
5. Biaya operasional yang dapat dianggarkan.

Sementara struktur remunerasi Direksi terdiri dari:

1. Gaji/honorarium;  
2. Tunjangan yang terdiri atas THR, tunjangan perumahan, dan asuransi purnajabatan;  
3. Fasilitas yang antara lain terdiri atas fasilitas kendaruan, fasilitas kesehatan, dan fasilitas bantuan hukum;  
4. Tantiem/insertif kinerja. Rincian, besaran,jis dan tata cara pemberian penghasilan Dewan Komisaris dan anggota Direksi termasuk perubahnya, mengikuti ketentuan dalam peraturan perdang-undangan, Anggaran Dasar, dan peraturan Perusahaan; dan  
5. Biaya operasional yang dapat dianggarkan.

The amount, type, and procedure for providing remuneration for members of the Board of Commissioners and the Board of Directors, including any amendments thereto, shall comply with the provisions of laws and regulations, the Articles of Association, and the Company's regulations.

In determining the remuneration for the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors, the Nomination and Remuneration Committee considers several indicators, including:

1. Key Performance Indicators (KPI) or individual performance assessments of each member of the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors;  
2. The Company's performance;  
3. Business size; and  
4. Market remuneration benchmarking results.

# Remuneration Structure and Amount

The remuneration structure for the Board of Commissioners consists of:

1. Salary/honorarium;  
2. Allowances, including Religious Holiday Allowance (THR), transportation allowance, and post-employment insurance;  
3. Facilities, including healthcare and legal assistance facilities;  
4. Performance-based incentives/bonuses (tantiem). The details, amount, types, and procedures for granting remuneration to the Board of Commissioners and members of the Board of Directors, including any adjustments, comply with applicable laws and regulations, the Articles of Association, and company policies; and  
5. Budgeted operational expenses.

The remuneration structure for the Board of Directors consists of:

1. Salary/honorarium;  
2. Allowances, including THR, housing allowance, and post-employment insurance;  
3. Facilities, including vehicle facilities, healthcare, and legal assistance facilities;  
4. Performance-based incentives/bonuses (tantiem). The details, amount, types, and procedures for granting remuneration to the Board of Commissioners and members of the Board of Directors, including any adjustments, comply with applicable laws and regulations, the Articles of Association, and company policies; and  
5. Budgeted operational expenses.

# Kompensasi Jangka Panjang Berbasis Kinerjasa, serta Program Kepemilikan Saham oleh Karyawan dan/atau Manajemen

Berdasarkan Akta Pernyataan Keputusan Rapat dan Perubahan Anggaran Dasar PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi No. 31 tanggal 21 Agustus 2021 yang dibuat oleh Notaris Fathiah Helmi, SH, di Jakarta, ada Surat Keputusan Direksi No. SK.31/UM000/JDMT-10000000/2021 tanggal 21 September 2021, Perseroan menetapkan program Employee Stock Allocation (ESA) dan Management and Employee Stock Option Plan (MESOP). Program ESA dirancang sebesar  $0,11\%$  dari Saham yang Ditawarkan dalam penawaran umum perdana saham, yaitu sebanyak 25.000.000 saham.

# Long-Term Performance-Based Compensation and Employee and/or Management Stock Ownership Program

Based on the Deed of Meeting Resolutions and Amendments to the Articles of Association of PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi No. 31 dated August 21, 2021, drawn up by Notary Fathiah Helmi, SH, in Jakarta, as well as the Board of Directors Decision No. SK.31/UM000/JDMT-10000000/2021 dated September 21, 2021, the Company has established the Employee Stock Allocation (ESA) and the Management and Employee Stock Option Plan (MESOP). The ESA program was designed to allocate  $0.11\%$  of the Offered Shares in the initial public offering, equivalent to 25,000,000 shares.

Sementara itu, program MESOP disetujiu dengan alokasi maksimum sebesar  $0,13 \%$ dari modal ditempatkan dan disetur penuh setelah penawaran umum perdana,{sita implementasi program ESA dan MESOP, setara dengan maksimal 112.000.000 saham. Pelaksanaan program ini bertujuan memberikan penghargaan kepada karyawan dan manajemen, sekalisus mencgatkan keterlibatannya dalam mendorong pertumbuhan nilai Perseroan.

Beberapa ketentuan teknis pelaksanaan program MESOP di Perseroan-Sebagai berikut.

# 1. Jumlah Saham

Jumlah saham yang ditawarkan dalamperiode program MESOP adalah sebesar  $0,13\%$  dari total modal ditempatkan dan disetor dalam Perseroan setelah pelaksanaan penawaran umum perdana atausejumlah112.000.000 saham yang merupakan tersebut penerbitan sahambaru. Jumlah tersebut didistribusikanmenjadi 3 tahun dengan ketentuan sebagai berikut.

a. Tahap1 : 40% hak opsi.  
b. Tahap II : 30% hak opsi.  
c. Tahap III :  $30\%$  hakpsi.

# 2. Waktu Pelaksanaan

Program MESOP Tahap I, II, dan III dilaksanan pada 1 November 2024 sampai dengan tanggal 12 Desember2024.

# 3. Persyaratan Karyawan dan/atau Manajemen dalam ProgramMESOP

Peserta yang diikutsertakan dalam program MESOP(SEbagai berikut.

a. Dewan Komisaris (kecuali Komisaris Independen) Perseroan yang menjabat pada saat penerbitan hak opsi.  
b. Anggota Direksi Perseroan yang menjabat pada saat;penerbitan hak opsi.  
c. Senior Leader dan karyawan lainnya yang tercatat pada saat penerbitan hak opsi dan tidak sedang dalam status terkena sanksi administratif.

# 4. Harga Pelaksanaan atau Penentuan Harga

MESOP Tahap I, II, dan III telah dilaksanan dari tanggal 1 November 2024 sampai dengan tanggal 12 Desember 2024 dengan tidak pelaksanaan MESOP Tahap I sebesar Rp720,00 per saham, Tahap II Rp636,00 per saham, dan Tahap III Rp582,00 per saham.

Meanwhile, the MESOP program was approved with a maximum allocation of  $0.13\%$  of the issued and fully paid-up capital after the initial public offering, with the combined ESA and MESOP programs amounting to a maximum of 112,000,000 shares. The implementation of this program aims to reward employees and management while enhancing their engagement in driving the Company's value growth.

The technical provisions for the implementation of MESOP program in the Company are as follows.

# 1. Number of Shares

The number of shares offered under MESOP program is  $0.13\%$  of the total issued and paid-up capital of the Company after the initial public offering, or a total of 112,000,000 newly issued shares. These shares are distributed in 3 phases as follows.

a. Phase I : 40% of the option rights.  
b. Phase II : 30% of the option rights.  
c. Phase III : 30% of the option rights.

# 2. Time of Implementation

MESOP Phase I, II, and III were conducted from November 1, 2024 to December 12, 2024.

# 3. Employee and/or Management Requirements in the MESOP Program

Participants eligible for MESOP program include.

a. The Board of Commissioners (except Independent Commissioners) serving at the time of option rights issuance.  
b. Members of the Board of Directors serving at the time of option rights issuance.  
c. Senior Leaders and other employees recorded at the time of option rights issuance who are not under administrative sanctions.

# 4. Exercise Price or Pricing Determination

MESOP Phase I, II, and III were implemented from November 1, 2024, to December 12, 2024, with the exercise price for MESOP Phase I at Rp720.00 per share, Phase II at Rp636.00 per share, and Phase III at Rp582.00 per share.

# - Komite Audit

# Audit Committee

Komite Audit adalah komite independen yang dibentuk oleh Dewan Komisaris, yang berfungsi untuk membantu tugas Dewan Komisaris sehubungan dengan tugas pengawasan atas metodologi dan proses dari pelaporan keuangan, manajemen risiko, audit, dan kepadahan atas hukum dan peraturanyang berlaku.

# Pedoman Kerja Komite Audit

Piagam Komite Audit yang menjadi pedoman anggota komite dalam menjalankan fungsi, tugas, dan tanggung jawabnya untuk membantu Dewan Komisaris disahkan berdasarkan Surat Keputusan Dewan Komisaris No.004/DEKOM-DMT/08/2021.

# Komposisi Komite Audit

Keanggotaan Komite Audit terdiri atas tidak kurang dari 3 oranggota, dengan sekurang-kurangnya terdiri dari 1 orang Komisaris Independen yang bertindak sebagai ketua dan pihak dari luar Perseroan. Masa jabatan anggota Komite Audit tidak boleh menjadilama dariASA jabatan Dewan Komisaris sebagaimana telah diatur dalam Anggaran Dasar dan dapat dipilih kembali untuk 1periode berikutnya. Pada tahun 2024, susunan Komite Audit Perseroan ditunjukkan sebagai berikut.

The Audit Committee is an independent committee established by the Board of Commissioners, functioning to assist the Board of Commissioners in overseeing the methodology and process of financial reporting, risk management, audit, and compliance with applicable laws and regulations.

# Audit Committee Charter

The Audit Committee Charter, which serves as a guideline for committee members in carrying out their functions, duties, and responsibilities to assist the Board of Commissioners, was ratified based on the Board of Commissioners' Decision No. 004/DEKOM-DMT/08/2021.

# Composition of Audit Committee

The Audit Committee consists of no fewer than 3 members, including at least 1 Independent Commissioner who serves as the chairperson and external parties from outside the Company. The term of office of the Audit Committee members shall not exceed the term of office of the Board of Commissioners as stipulated in the Articles of Association and may be reappointed for 1 subsequent term. # Tugas dan Tanggung Jawab Komite Audit

Informasi tugas dan tanggung jawab Komite Audit Perseroan diuraikan sebagai berikut.

1. Melakukan penelaahan terhadap informasi keuangan yang akan dikeluarkan oleh Perseroan kepada publik dan/atau pihak otoritas, antara lain Laporan Keuangan, projeksi, dan laporan lainnya terkait informasi keuangan Perseroan.

# Duties and Responsibilities of Audit Committee

The information on the duties and responsibilities of the Company's Audit Committee is outlined as follows.

1. Reviewing and overseeing the financial information to be issued by the Company to the public and/or authorities, including financial statements, projections, and other reports related to the Company's financial information.

2. Melakukan penelaahan atas ketaatan Perseroan terhadap peraturan perundang-undangan, khususnya yang Berkaitan dengan kegiatan Perseroan.  
3. Memberikan pendapat independen dalam hal terjadi perbedaan pendapat antara Direksi dan auditor/ akuntan atas jasa yang diberikannya.  
4. Memberikan rekomendasi kepada Dewan Komisaris mengenai penunjukan akuntan yang didasarkan pada independensi, ruang lingkup penugasan, dan imbalan jasa.  
5. Melakukan penelaahan atas pelaksanaan pemeriksanaenleh auditor internal dan mengawasi pelaksanaan tindak lanjut oleh Direksi atas temuan auditor internal.  
6. Melakukan penelaahan terhadap aktivitas pelaksanaan manajemen risiko yang dilakukan oleh Direksi dan memonitor efektivitas kebjikan dan pelaksanaan manajemen risiko yang dibuat dan difalankan Direksi.  
7. Menelaah pengaduan yang Berkaitan dengan proses akuntansi dan pelaporan keuangan Perseroan.  
8. Menelaah dan memberikan saran kepada Dewan Komisaris perdait dengan adanya potensi benturan kepentingan Perseroan.  
9. Menjaga kerahasiaan dokumen, data, dan informasi Perseroan.  
10. Memonitor kecukupan usaha Direksi untuk membruang dan mengoperasikan pengendalian internal yang efektif, khususnya pengendalian internal atas pelaporan keuangan.  
11. Mengawasi auditor internal dan auditor eksternal.  
12. Apabila diperlukan, dapat melakukan tugas/ pemeriksaan/audit khusus seksu instruksi Dewan Komisaris.  
13. Membuat,CCCCCC dan memperbarui pedoman Komite Audit (jika diperlukan).  
14. Melaksanakan tugas lain yang diberikan oleh Dewan Komisaris.

# Persyaratan Komite Audit

Berdasarkan Pasal 7 Peraturan Otoritas Jasa Keuang No. 55/POJK.04/2015, persyaratan keanggotaan Komite Audit memiliki integritas tinggi, kemampuan, dan pengetahan yang relevant, serta memahami laporan keuang, proses audit, dan manajemen risiko. Komite Audit juga wajib mematuhi Kode Etik yang ditapkan oleh Perseroan dan terus mencatkan kompetensi melalui pelatihan. Setidaknya, l anggota Komite harus memiliki latar belakang di bidang akuntansi kepada keuangan.

Selain itu, anggota Komite Audit tidak boleh memiliki afliasi oleh hubungan bisnis dengan Dewan Komisaris, Direksi, oleh Pemegang Saham Utama. Komite Audit juga

2. Reviewing the Company's compliance with the laws and regulations, particularly those related to the Company's activities.  
3. Providing independent opinions when there are differences of opinion between the Board of Directors and the auditor/accountant.  
4. Providing recommendations to the Board of Commissioners regarding the appointment of accountants based on independence, assignment scope, and compensation.  
5. Reviewing the audit by the internal auditors and supervising the follow-up actions by the Board of Directors on the findings of the internal auditors.  
6. Reviewing the implementation of risk management activities carried out by the Board of Directors, and monitoring the effectiveness of the risk management policies and implementations made and carried out by the Board of Directors.  
7. Reviewing complaints related to the Company's accounting and financial reporting processes, particularly internal control over financial reporting.  
8. Reviewing and providing advice to the Board of Commissioners on the potential conflicts of interest in the Company.  
9. Ensuring the confidentiality of the Company's documents, data, and information.  
10. Monitoring the adequacy of the Board of Directors' efforts to establish and operate effective internal controls, particularly internal control over financial reporting.  
11. Overseeing the internal and external auditors.  
12. If necessary, performing special duties/examinations/ audits according to the instructions of the Board of Commissioners.  
13. Creating, reviewing, and updating the Audit Committee guidelines (if necessary).  
14. Performing other duties assigned by the Board of Commissioners.

# Requirements of Audit Committee

Based on Article 7 of the Financial Services Authority Regulation No. 55/POJK.04/2015, the membership requirements of the Audit Committee include high integrity, relevant expertise, and knowledge, as well as an understanding of financial statements, audit processes, and risk management. The Audit Committee is also required to adhere to the Code of Ethics established by the Company and continuously enhance its competence through training. At least 1 member of the Committee must have a background in accounting or finance.

Furthermore, members of the Audit Committee must not have any affiliation or business relationships with the Board of Commissioners, the Board of Directors, or the Major

tidak diperkenankan memiliki saham Perseroan. Seluruh anggota Komite Audit Perseroan telah memenuhi syarat tersebut.

# Wewenang Komite Audit

Komite Audit memiliki wewenang untuk mengaksi dokumen, data, dan informasi terkait karyawan, Dana, asset, serta sumber daya perusahaan yang diperlukan guna mendukung pelaksanaan tugas pengawasan. Selain itu, Komite Audit juga dapat Berkumunikasi secara langsung dengan karyawan, termasuk Direksi,{serta pihak yang menjalankan fungsi audit internal, manajemen risiko, dan akuntansi untuk memastikan seluruh fungsi berjalan seksuai standar yang ditetapkan. Komite Audit juga tidak mengalami kendala kepada pembatasan dalam menjalankan wewenangnya, Seeingga dapat menjalankan tugasnya secara optimal.

Namun, jika di mesa mendatang terdapat kendala ata hambatan yang menghalangi pelaksanaan wewenangnya, Komite Audit akan segera melaporkannya kepada Dewan Komisaris dan berkoordinasi untuk mencari solusi yang tepat. Dengan demikian, Komite memastikan Bahwa tugas dan tanggung jawabnya tetap dapat dijalankan secara efektif, sesuai dengan prinsip GCG.

# Pernyataan Independensi Komite Audit

Seluruh anggota Komite Audit telah memenuhi kualifikasi sesuai dengan ketentuan Peraturan Otoritas Jasa Keuangan No. 55/POJK.04/2015argoutang Pembentukan dan Pedoman Pelaksanaan Kerja Komite Audit. Selain itu, anggota Komite Audit Berkomitmen untuk mencunjung tinggi prinsip independensi, yang diwujudkan melalui pelaksanaan tugas dan tanggung jawab secara professionnel, objektif, dan berhari-hati. Perseroan juga memastikan tidak adanya benturan kepentingan maupun intervensi dari para Pemegang Saham, Seeingga Komite Audit dapat mencalangan perannya secara optimal dan efektif.

# Rapat Komite Audit

Tata cara penyelenggaraan rapat Komite Audit adalah-Sebagai berikut.

1. Komite Audit,Theladakan rapat secara bergala, paling sedikit 1 kali dalam 3 bulan.  
2. Rapat Komite Audit dapat diselenggaramakan apabila dihadiri oleh lebih dari  $1 / 2$  jumlah anggota Komite Audit.  
3. Keputusan rapat Komite Audit diambil berdasarkan musyawarah untuk mufakat.

Shareholders. The Audit Committee is also prohibited from holding shares in the Company. All members of the Company's Audit Committee have met these requirements.

# Authority of Audit Committee

The Audit Committee has the authority to access documents, data, and information related to employees, funds, assets, and company resources necessary to support the supervisory function. Additionally, the Audit Committee can communicate directly with employees, including the Board of Directors, as well as parties responsible for internal audit, risk management, and accounting functions to ensure all operations adhere to established standards. The Audit Committee faces no obstacles or restrictions in exercising its authority, enabling it to perform its duties optimally.

However, should any challenges or obstacles arise in the future that hinder the execution of its authority, the Audit Committee will promptly report them to the Board of Commissioners and coordinate to find appropriate solutions. This ensures that its duties and responsibilities continue to be carried out effectively in accordance with GCG principles.

# Audit Committee's Statement of Independence

All members of the Audit Committee have met the qualifications in accordance with the provisions of the Financial Services Authority Regulation No. 55/POJK.04/2015 on the Establishment and Implementation Guidelines of the Audit Committee. Additionally, the members of the Audit Committee are committed to upholding the principle of independence, which is reflected in the professional, objective, and prudent execution of their duties and responsibilities. The Company also ensures that there are no conflicts of interest or intervention from Shareholders, allowing the Audit Committee to carry out its role optimally and effectively.

# Audit Committee's Meeting

The procedure for holding Audit Committee's meetings is as follows.

1. The Audit Committee holds regular meetings at least once in every 3 months.  
2. Audit Committee's meetings can be held if attended by more than  $\frac{1}{2}$  of the members of Audit Committee.  
3. The decision of the Audit Committee's meeting is taken based on deliberation to reach a consensus.

4. Rapat Komite Audit dipimpin oleh Ketua Komite Audit. Apabila Ketua Komite Audit berhalangan hadir, rapat dipimpin oleh Komisaris yang menjadi anggota Komite Audit kepada anggota Komite Audit yang paling senior.  
5. Jika dipandang perlu, Komite Audit dapat mengundang pihak lain yang terkait dengan materi rapat untuk hadir dalam rapat Komite Audit.  
6. Rapat Komite Audit sekurang-kurangnyaCCCCCC kongsi praktik-praktik tata kelola korporasi secara keseluruhan termasuk pengendalian risiko perusahaan, pengaturan laporan keuangan, dan standar perilaku korporasi.  
7. SetiapRAPAT Komite Audit dituangkan dalam risalah rapat, termasuk apabila terdapat perbedaan pendapat (dissenting opinion), yang ditandatangani oleh seluruh anggota Komite Audit yang hadir dan disampaikan kepada Dewan Komisaris.

Pada tahun 2024, tingkat kehadiran Komite Audit dalam rapat ditunjukkan sebagai berikut.

4. The Audit Committee's meeting is chaired by the Chairman of Audit Committee. If the Chairman of Audit Committee is unable to attend, the meeting is chaired by the Commissioner who is a member of Audit Committee or the most senior member of Audit Committee.  
5. If deemed necessary, the Audit Committee may invite other parties related to the meeting material to attend the Audit Committee's meeting.  
6. Audit Committee's meetings at least review corporate governance practices as a whole, including corporate risk control, financial reporting arrangements, and corporate behavior standards.  
7. Every meeting of Audit Committee is stated in the minutes of meeting, including if there is a dissenting opinion, which is signed by all members of the Audit Committee present and submitted to the Board of Commissioners.

# Pelaksanaan Tugas Komite Audit

Kegiatan utama dalam pelaksanaan tugas yang dilakukan oleh Komite Audit selama tahun 2024 meliputi:

1. Melakukan penelaahan dan pengawasan terhadap informasi keuangan yang akan dipublikasikan oleh Perseroan kepada publik dan/atau pihak otoritas, termasuk Laporan Keuangan, projeksi, serta laporan lainnya yang Berkaitan dengan informasi keuangan Perseroan;  
2. Melakukan penelaahan atas kepadahan Perseroan terhadap peraturan perundang-undangan, khususnya yang Berkaitan dengan kegiatan usaha Perseroan;  
3. Memberikan pendapat independen dalam hal terjadi perbedaan pendapat antara Direksi dan Auditor/ Akuntan terkait jasa yang diberikannya;

# Implementation of the Audit Committee's Duties

The main activities carried out by the Audit Committee in performing its duties throughout 2024 include:

1. Conducting a review and oversight of financial information to be published by the Company to the public and/or regulatory authorities, including Financial Statements, projections, and other reports related to the Company's financial information;  
2. Reviewing the Company's compliance with laws and regulations, particularly those related to its business activities;  
3. Providing an independent opinion in the event of disagreements between the Board of Directors and the Auditor/Accountant regarding the services provided;

4. Memberikan rekomendasi kepada Dewan Komisaris mengenai penunjukan Akuntan berdasarkan independensi, ruang lingkup penugasan, dan imbalan jasa;  
5. Melakukan penelaahan atas pelaksanaan pemeriksuan oleh Auditor Internal serta mengawai tindak lanjut yang dilakukan oleh Direksi terhadap temuan Auditor Internal;  
6. Melakukan aktivitas manajemen risiko yang dijalankan Direksi seda memonitor efektivitas kebujakan dan pelaksanaan manajemen risiko yang telah ditapkan;  
7. Menelaah pengaduan yang berkaitan dengan proses akuntansi dan pelaporan keuangan Perseroan;  
8. Menelaah dan memberikan saran kepada Dewan Komisaris terkait potensi benturan kepentingan dalam Perseroan;  
9. Menjaga kerahasiaan dokumen, data, dan informasi Perseroan;  
10. Memonitor kecukupan langkah-langkah Direksi dalam membangun dan mengoperasikan sistem pengendalian internal yang efektif, khususnya pengendalian internal atas pelaporan keuangan;  
11. Mengawasi Auditor Internal dan Auditor Eksternal;  
12. Apabila diperlukan, dapat melakukan tugas, pemeriksaan, ataudit khusus seksuia instruksi Dewan Komisaris;  
13. Membuat, sekskaji, dan memperbarui pedoman Komite Audit jika diperlukan; dan  
14. Melaksanakan tugas lain yang diberikan oleh Dewan Komisaris.

4. Providing recommendations to the Board of Commissioners regarding the appointment of an Accountant based on independence, scope of engagement, and service fees;  
5. Reviewing the implementation of audits conducted by the Internal Auditor and overseeing the follow-up actions taken by the Board of Directors regarding the Internal Auditor's findings;  
6. Conducting risk management activities carried out by the Board of Directors and monitoring the effectiveness of established risk management policies and implementation;  
7. Reviewing complaints related to the Company's accounting and financial reporting processes;  
8. Examining and providing advice to the Board of Commissioners regarding potential conflicts of interest within the Company;  
9. Maintaining the confidentiality of the Company's documents, data, and information;  
10. Monitoring the adequacy of the Board of Directors' measures in developing and operating an effective internal control system, particularly internal control over financial reporting;  
11. Overseeing both the Internal Auditor and External Auditor;  
12. If necessary, performing specific tasks, examinations, or special audits as instructed by the Board of Commissioners;  
13. Preparing, reviewing, and updating the Audit Committee Charter if required; and  
14. Carrying out other tasks assigned by the Board of Commissioners.

# - Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi

Nomination and Remuneration Committee

Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi merupakan komite yang dibentuk dan bertanggung jawab kepada Dewan Komisaris dalam membantu melaksanan fungsi dan tugas Dewan Komisaris kerkait nominasi dan remunerasi terhadap anggota Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi, termasuk hal-hal yang diatur dalam Anggaran Dasar Perseroan.

# Pedoman Kerja Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi

Piagam Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi yang menjadi pedoman anggota komite dalam menjalankan fungsi, tugas, dan tanggung jawabnya untuk membantu Dewan Komisaris disahkan berdasarkan Surat Keputusan Dewan Komisaris No.007/DEKOM-DMT/07/2022.

The Nomination and Remuneration Committee is a committee established and accountable to the Board of Commissioners to assist in carrying out the Board of Commissioners's functions and duties related to the nomination and remuneration of members of the Board of Commissioners and the Board of Directors, including matters stipulated in the Company's Articles of Association.

# Nomination and Remuneration

# Committee Charter

The Nomination and Remuneration Committee Charter, which serves as a guideline for committee members in carrying out their functions, duties, and responsibilities to assist the Board of Commissioners, was ratified based on the Board of Commissioners' Decision No. 007/DEKOM-DMT/07/2022.

# Komposisi Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi

Komposisi Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi paling sedikit terdiri dari 3 orang anggota, dengan ketentuan 1 orang anggota merangkap ketua yangrogramakan Komisaris Independen. Anggota lain dapat berasal dari anggota Dewan Komisaris, pihak dari luar Perseroan, maupun pihak yang menduduki jabatan managerial di bawah Direksi yang membidangi sumber daya manusia. Anggota Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi diangkat oleh Dewan Komisaris. Komposisi keanggotaan Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi per 31 Desember 2024 sebagai berikut.

# Composition of Nomination and Remuneration Committee

Nomination and Remuneration Committee consists of at least 3 members, with 1 member concurrently serving as the chairman, who must be an Independent Commissioner. Other members may be from the Board of Commissioners, external parties, or individuals holding managerial positions under the Board of Directors, specifically in charge of human resources. # Tugas dan Tanggung Jawab Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi

Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi memiliki lingkupugas dan tanggungjawab yang meliputi:

1. Fungsinominasi:

a. Memberikan rekomendasi menjadi kompositisi jabatan anggota Dewan Komisaris dan/atau anggota Direksi, kebikan dan kriteria yang dibutuhkan dalam proses nominasi, dan kebikan evaluasi kinerja bagi anggota Dewan Komisaris dan/atau anggota Direksi;  
b. Melakukan penilaian kinerja anggota Dewan Komisaris dan/atau Direksi berdasarkan tolok ukur yang telah disusun sebagai bahan evaluasi;  
c. Memberikan rekomendasi mengenai program pengembangan kemampuan anggota Dewan Komisaris dan/atau Direksi; dan

# Duties and Responsibilities of Nomination and Remuneration Committee

The Nomination and Remuneration Committee has the following scope of duties and responsibilities:

1. Nomination function:

a. Providing recommendations regarding the composition of positions for members of the Board of Commissioners and/or members of the Board of Directors, policies and criteria required in the nomination process; and performance evaluation policies for members of the Board of Commissioners and/or members of the Board of Directors;  
b. Assessing the performance of members of the Board of Commissioners and/or the Board of Directors based on the benchmarks that have been prepared as evaluation material;  
c. Providing recommendations regarding the capacity building program for members of the Board of Commissioners and/or the Board of Directors; and

d. Memberikan usulan calon yang memenuhi syarat sebagai anggota Dewan Komisaris dan/atau anggota Direksi untuk disampaikan kepada RUPS.

2. Fungsiremunerasi:

a. Memberikan rekomendasi mengenai struktur remunerasi, kebikan atas remunerasi, dan希望大家把它们的  
b. Melakukan penilaian kinerja dengan kesesuaian remunerasi yang diterima masing-masing anggota Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi.

# Pernyataan Independensi Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi

Dalam menjalankan tugas dan tanggung jawabnya, Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi Berkomitmen untuk bertindak secara profesional dan independen, tanpa intervensi dari pihak manapun denganalan apapunserta tandakan lainnya yang memiliki potensi benturan kepentingan.

# Rapat Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi

Penyelenggaraan rapat Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi dilakukan secara berkala minimal sekali dalam 3 bulan, dengan kehadiran lebih dari setengah jumlah anggota sebagai syarat kuorum. Keputusan rapat diambil berdasarkan musyawarah untuk mufakat dan dipimpin oleh Ketua Komite. Jika diperlukan, pihak terkait dapat diundang untuk memebahas materi rapat. Setiap才有 rapat dicatat dalam risalah yang ditandatangani oleh seluruh anggota yang hadir, termasuk pencatatan pendapat berbeda, untuk kemudian disampaikan kepada Dewan Komisaris. Pada tahun 2024, frekuensi kehadiran rapat Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi ditunjukkan sebagai berikut.

d. Providing suggestions for candidates who meet the requirements as members of the Board of Commissioners and/or members of the Board of Directors to be submitted to the GMS.

2. Remuneration function:

a. Providing recommendations on the remuneration structure, remuneration policy, and remuneration amount; and  
b. Conducting performance assessment in accordance with the remuneration received by each member of the Board of Commissioners and the Board of Directors.

# Statement of Independence of the Nomination and Remuneration Committee

The Nomination and Remuneration Committee is committed to carrying out its duties and responsibilities professionally and independently, without any intervention from any party for any reason, as well as any actions that may lead to potential conflicts of interest.

# Nomination and Remuneration Committee Meetings

The Nomination and Remuneration Committee's meetings are held regularly at least once every 3 months, with the presence of more than half of the total members as a quorum requirement. Decisions are made based on deliberation and consensus and are led by the Committee Chair. If necessary, relevant parties may be invited to discuss meeting materials. All meeting results are recorded in minutes signed by all attending members, including dissenting opinions, and subsequently submitted to the Board of Commissioners. Agenda yang dibahas dalam rapat tersebut mencakup:

# Pengembangan Kompetensi Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi

Peningkatan kompetensi yang diikuti oleh anggota Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi pada tahun 2024 disajikan sebagai berikut.

The agenda discussed in the meeting included:

1. Establishing the structure of and proposed remuneration for the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners of Mitratel for 2024, including facilities and operational expenses;  
2. Reviewing the KPI and Management Contract of Mitratel's Board of Directors, as well as finalizing the KPI and Management Contract of Mitratel's Indonesia Investment Authority;  
3. Evaluating the Human Capital Maturity Assessment from the Ministry of State-Owned Enterprises, including improvement plans and training programs for the Board of Commissioners;  
4. Developing strategies for talent acquisition, employee performance management, and monitoring KPI achievements for Q2 and projections for Q3 of 2024; and  
5. Managing Human Capital Management, including talent management and employee remuneration systems.

# Pelaksanaan Tugas Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi

Sesuai dengan tugas dan tanggung jawab yang diatur dalam Piagam Kerja, Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi telah melaksanakan menjadi kegiatan di tahun 2024, diantaranya:

1. Fungsi Nominasi:

a. Memberikan rekomendasi menjadi kompositisi jabatan anggota Direksi dan/atau anggota Dewan Komisaris,serta kebujakan dan kriteria dalam proses nominasi, termasuk kebujakan evaluasi bagi anggota Direksi dan/atau anggota Dewan Komisaris;  
b. Melakukan penilaian kinerja anggota Direksi dan/atau Dewan Komisaris berdasarkan tolok ukur yang telah disusun sebagai bahan evaluasi;  
c. Memberikan rekomendasi mengai program pengembangan kompetensi bagi anggota Direksi dan/atau Dewan Komisaris; dan  
d. Mengusulkan calon yang memenuhi syarat sebagai anggota Direksi dan/atau anggota Dewan Komisaris untuk disampaikan kepada RUPS.

2. Fungsi Remunerasi:

a. Memberikan rekomendasi mengenai struktur, kebikan, dan/atau bescharan remunerasi bagi anggota Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris; dan  
b. Melakukan penilaian kinerja untuk memastikan kesesuaian antara kinerja anggota Direksi dan anggota Dewan Komisaris dengan remunerasi yang diterima.

# Implementation of Nomination and Remuneration Committee's Duties

In accordance with the duties and responsibilities outlined in the Charter, the Nomination and Remuneration Committee carried out several activities in 2024, among others:

1. Nomination function:

a. Providing recommendations regarding the composition of positions for members of the Board of Directors and/or members of the Board of Commissioners, policies and criteria required in the nomination process; and performance evaluation policies for members of the Board of Directors and/or members of the Board of Commissioners;  
b. Assessing the performance of members of the Board of Directors and/or Board of Commissioners based on the benchmarks that have been prepared as evaluation material;  
c. Providing recommendations regarding the capacity building program for members of the Board of Directors and/or Board of Commissioners; and  
d. Providing suggestions for candidates who meet the requirements as members of the Board of Directors and/or members of the Board of Commissioners to be submitted to the GMS.

2. Remuneration function:

a. Providing recommendations on the remuneration structure, remuneration policy, and/or remuneration amount for members of the Board of Directors and the Board of Commissioners;  
b. Conducting performance assessment in accordance with the remuneration received by each member of the Board of Directors and the Board of Commissioners.

# - Komite Evaluasi dan Monitoring Perencanaan dan Risiko

Committee for Planning and Risk Evaluation and Monitoring

Komite Evaluasi dan Monitoring Perencanaan dan Risikomerupakan komite yang dibentuk dan bertanggung jawabsepada Dewan Komisaris untuk membantu pelaksanaanfungsi dan tugas pengawasan Dewan Komisaris, khususnyadalam mengevaluasi dan memantau perencanaan strategis serta manajemen risiko perusahaan. Komite inibertugas memastikan telah strategi Perseroan berjalanSESuai dengan visi dan misi yang telah ditetapkan, sertamengidentifikasi, mengelola, dan memitigasi risiko yangdapat memengaruhi pencapaian tujuan Perseroan.

# Pedoman Kerja Komite Evaluasi dan Monitoring Perencanaan dan Risiko

Dalam melaksanan tugas dan tanggung jawabnya, Komite Evaluasi dan Monitoring Perencanaan dan Risiko mengaku pada pedoman kerja yang disahkan berdasarkan Keputusan Dewan Komisaris PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi TbkNo.014/DEKOM-DMT/01/2023tentang Pedoman Pelaksanaan Kerja (Charter) Komite Evaluasi dan Monitoring dan Perencanaan dan Risiko PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi Tbk.

# Komposisi Komite Evaluasi dan Monitoring Perencanaan dan Risiko

Keanggotaan Komite Evaluasi dan Monitoring Perencanaan dan Risiko terdiri atas tidak kurang dari dari 5 anggota, dengan sekurang-kurangnya terdiri dari 1 orang Komisaris yang bertindak sebagai ketua. Masa jabatan anggota Komite Evaluasi dan Monitoring Perencanaan dan Risiko selama 3 tahun dan dapat dipilih kembali untukperiode berikutnya. Pada tahun 2024, susunan Komite Evaluasi dan Monitoring Perencanaan dan Risiko Perseroan ditunjukkan sebagai berikut.

The Committee for Planning and Risk Evaluation and Monitoring is a committee established under and accountable to the Board of Commissioners to assist in executing its supervisory functions and duties, particularly in evaluating and monitoring the Company's strategic planning and risk management. The committee is responsible for ensuring that the Company's strategies align with its established vision and mission while identifying, managing, and mitigating risks that may affect the achievement of corporate objectives.

# Guidelines of the Committee for Planning and Risk Evaluation and Monitoring

In carrying out its duties and responsibilities, the Committee for Planning and Risk Evaluation and Monitoring refers to the working guidelines ratified through the Decision of the Board of Commissioners of PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi Tbk No. 014/DEKOM-DMT/01/2023 on the Charter for the Implementation of Work of the Committee for Planning and Risk Evaluation and Monitoring of PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi Tbk.

# Composition of the Committee for Planning and Risk Evaluation and Monitoring

The Committee for Planning and Risk Evaluation and Monitoring consists of no fewer than 5 members, with at least one Commissioner serving as Chair. The term of office for committee members is 3 years, with the possibility of reappointment for the subsequent period. # Tugas dan Tanggung Jawab Komite Evaluasi dan Monitoring Perencanaan dan Risiko

Ruang lingkup, tugas, dan tanggung jawab Komite Evaluasi dan Monitoring Perencanaan dan Risiko yaitu:

1. Melakukan evaluasi secara komprehensif atas usulan RJPP dan RKAP yang diajukan oleh Direksi;  
2. Melakukan evaluasi atas pelaksanaan RJPP dan RKAP agar sesuai dengan sasaran RJPP dan RKAP yang disetujui oleh Dewan Komisaris;

# Duties and Responsibilities of the Committee for Planning and Risk Evaluation and Monitoring

The scope, duties, and responsibilities of the Committee for Planning and Risk Evaluation and Monitoring, are as follows:

1. Conducting a thorough review of the Company's Long-Term Plan (RJPP) and the Company's Work Plan and Budget Plan (RKAP) proposals submitted by the Board of Directors;  
2. Evaluating the implementation of the RJPP and RKAP in accordance with the Board of Commissioners' approved targets;

3. Melakukan fungsi pengawasan terhadap program investasiPerseroanyangtelahdituangkanke dalamRKAP, khususnya pelaksanaan program value growth story Mitratel dari pengembangan bisnis organik dan inorganik termasuk kaitanya dengan penyerapan anggaran Mitratel yang bernilai material dan/atau strategis;  
4. Melakukan pemantauan terhadap pelaksanaan enterprise risk management dan project risk management khususnya untuk proyek yang pelaksanaanya melalui persekitujuan Dewan Komisaris;  
5. Menyampaikan haben evaluasi atas RJPP dan RKAP yang telah disampaikan oleh Direksi tersebut dengan jadwal waktu yang ditetapkan oleh Dewan Komisaris;  
6. Menyampaikan laporan secara Berkala kepada Dewan Komisaris mengenaihil evaluasi pelaksanaan RJPP dan RKAP seda pelaksanaan enterprise risk management dan project risk management khususnya untuk projek yang pelaksanaanya melalui persetujuan Dewan Komisaris;  
7. Memberikan saran dan rekomendasi atas usulan RJPP dan RKAP kepada Dewan Komisaris sebagai bahan pertimbangan untuk persetujuan Dewan Komisaris; dan  
8. Menjaga dan memegang seguh rahasia Perseroan sesuai dengan ketentuan yang berlaku.

# Pernyataan Independensi Komite Evaluasi dan Monitoring Perencanaan dan Risiko

Dalam menjalankan tugas dan tanggung jawabnya, Komite Evaluasi dan Monitoring Perencanaan dan Risiko senantiasa bertindak secara profesionai dan independen, tanpa adanya intervensi dari pihak manapun denganalan apa pun dan pentuk tingdakan lain yang berpotensi menghadirkan konflik kepentingan.

3. Performing the supervisory function of the Company's Investment Programme as outlined in the RKAP, particularly the implementation of Mitratel's value growth story program through organic and inorganic business development, including Mitratel's budget absorption with material and/or strategic value;  
4. Monitoring the implementation of enterprise and project risk management, particularly for projects approved by the Board of Commissioners;  
5. Delivering the results of the RJPP and RKAP evaluations submitted by the Board of Directors in accordance with the Board of Commissioners' time frame;  
6. Submitting periodic reports to the Board of Commissioners on the results of evaluations of the implementation of RJPP and RKAP, as well as the implementation of enterprise risk management and project risk management, particularly for projects approved by the Board of Commissioners;  
7. Providing advice and recommendations to the Board of Commissioners on the proposed RJPP and RKAP for their approval; and  
8. Maintaining and protecting the Company's secrets in accordance with the applicable regulations.

# Statement of Independence of the Committee for Planning and Risk Evaluation and Monitoring

In carrying out its duties and responsibilities, the Committee for Planning and Risk Evaluation always acts professionally and independently, without any intervention from any party for any reason, and without engaging in any actions that could potentially create conflicts of interest.

# Rapat Komite Evaluasi dan Monitoring Perencanaan dan Risiko

Komite Evaluasi dan Monitoring Perencanaan dan Risiko bergewajiban untuk menyelenggaramakan rapat setidaknya 1 kali setup bulan. Namun demikian, rapat dapat dilaksanan setup waktu apabila diperlukan, khususnya bilamana terdapat isu-isu strategis yang memerlukan arahan Dewan Komisaris dalam tindakan yang akan diambil oleh manajemen. Daftar dan tingkat kehadiran Komite Evaluasi dan Monitoring Perencanaan dan Risiko dalam rapat ditunjukkan sebagai berikut.

# Meetings of the Committee for Planning and Risk Evaluation and Monitoring

The Committee for Planning and Risk Evaluation and Monitoring is required to hold meetings at least once a month. Selain itu, rapat juga mencakuap monitoring atas pencapaian rencana kerja tahunan, pemantauan pengelolaan enterprise risk management terkait isu strategis, financial, dan operasional, serta pembahasan isu-isu strategis Perseroan. Isu strategis yang dibahas mencakuap, namun tidak terbatas pada, perencanaanaksi korporasi (project inorganic), penyusunan business judgement rule, penyusunan RJPP, penyusunan RKAP,serta;penerapan ESG di lingkungan Perseroan,serta

The agenda discussed in the regular monthly meeting included an evaluation of the Company's performance and year-to-date achievements. The meeting also covered supervision of the annual work plan achievement, oversight of enterprise risk management related to strategic, financial, and operational issues, as well as discussions on the Company's strategic issues. Strategic issues discussed include, but are not limited to, corporate action planning (inorganic projects), preparation of business judgment rules, preparation of RJPP, preparation of RKAP, and implementation of ESG within the Company, as well as other

hal-hal lain yang akan diputuskan oleh Dewan Komisaris melalui rapat Dewan Komisaris maupunRAPAT gabungan dengan Direksi.

# Pelaksanaan Tugas Komite Evaluasi dan Monitoring Perencanaan dan Risiko

Pelaksanaan tugas Komite Evaluasi dan Monitoring Perencanaan dan Risiko selama tahun 2024 diuraikan(SEbagai berikut.

1. Melakukan evaluasi komprehensif terhadap usulan RJPP dan RKAP yang diajukan oleh Direksi.  
2. Menilai pelaksanaan RJPP dan RKAP untuk memastikan kesesusuiannya dengan sasan yang telah disetujui oleh Dewan Komisaris.  
3. Mengawasi program investasi Perseroan yang telah dituangkan dalam RKAP, khususnya dalam pelaksanaan program value growth story Mitratel yang mencakup pengembangan bisnis organik dan inorganik, tersebut memastikan penyerapan anggaran yang bernilai material dan/atau strategis.  
4. Melakukan monitoring terhadap pelaksanaan enterprise risk management dan project risk management, khususnya untuk projek yang pelaksanaanya memerlukan persetujuan Dewan Komisaris.

# The Implementation of Duties of the Committee for Planning and Risk Evaluation and Monitoring

The implementation of duties of the Committee for Planning and Risk Evaluation and Monitoring in 2024 is outlined as follows.

1. Conducting a comprehensive evaluation of the RJPP and RKAP proposals submitted by the Board of Directors.  
2. Assessing the implementation of RJPP and RKAP to ensure alignment with the targets approved by the Board of Commissioners.  
3. Supervising the Company's investment programs outlined in the RKAP, particularly in the execution of Mitratel's value growth story program, which includes the development of both organic and inorganic businesses, as well as ensuring the absorption of budgets deemed material and/or strategic.  
4. Monitoring the implementation of enterprise risk management and project risk management, especially for projects requiring approval from the Board of Commissioners.

# - Sekretaris Perusahaan

# Corporate Secretary

Sekretaris Perusahaan berperan dalam menjalin hubungan antara Perseroan dan pemangku kepentingan, terutama pemerintah, Pemegang Saham, dan Otoritas Jasa Keuangan. Sekretaris Perusahaan memastikan bahwa semua informasi yang relevant diungkapkan dan disebarkan kepada semua pemangku kepentingan secara tersebut,waku, dan bahwa informasi tersebutseuai dengan peraturan dan regulasi yang berlaku.

# Pedoman Kerja Sekretaris Perusahaan

Dalam menjalankan tugas dan tanggung jawabnya, Sekretaris Perusahaan menjad Peraturan Otoritas Jasa Keuangan No. 35/POJK.04/2014tentang Sekretaris Perusahaan Emiten atop Perusahaan Publik.

# Pihak yang Mengangkat dan Memberhentikan Sekretaris Perusahaan

Sekretaris Perusahaan bertanggung jawab langsung kepada Direksi{serta diangkat dan diberhentikan melalui Keputusan Direksi. Setiap kali penggangkatan, penggantian, oleh pemberhentian Sekretaris Perusahaan wajib memberitahukan kepada Otoritas Jasa Keangan.

# Profil Sekretaris Perusahaan

Berdasarkan Risalah Rapat Direksi Terbatas tanggal 26 Agustus 2021, Perseroan telah memutusan untuk menuunjuk Hendra Purnama yang juga menjabat sebagai Direktur Investasi sebagai Sekretaris Perusahaan. Keputusan ini mulai berlaku efektif sejak penggangkatan Hendra Purnama sebagai Direktur Investasi pada 31 Agustus 2021. Informasi lebih lanjut menjadi profil Sekretaris Perusahaan telah disampaikan dalam Profil Direksi.

# Tugas dan Tanggung Jawab Sekretaris Perusahaan

Tugas dan tanggung jawab Sekretaris Perusahaan tersebut berikut.

1. Mempersiapkan penyelenggaraan RUPS.  
2. Menghadiri rapat Direksi dan rapat gabungan antara Dewan Komisaris dengan Direksi.  
3. Mengelola dan menyimpan dokumenteringk dengan kegiatan Perseroan meliputi dokumen RUPS, risalahRAPAT Direksi, risalah rapat gabungan antara Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris, dan dokumen-dokumen Perseroan penting lainnya.

The Corporate Secretary plays a role in maintaining relationships between the Company and its stakeholders, particularly the government, Shareholders, and the Financial Services Authority. The Corporate Secretary ensures that all relevant information is disclosed and distributed to all stakeholders in a timely manner and that such information complies with applicable laws and regulations.

# Corporate Secretary Charter

In carrying out its duties and responsibilities, the Corporate Secretary refers to the Financial Services Authority Regulation No. 35/POJK.04/2014 on Corporate Secretary of Issuers or Public Companies.

# Appointment and Dismissal of Corporate Secretary

The Corporate Secretary reports directly to the Board of Directors and is appointed and dismissed through a Board of Directors' Decision. Any appointment, replacement, or dismissal of the Corporate Secretary must be reported to the Financial Services Authority.

# Profile of Corporate Secretary

Based on the Minutes of the Limited Board of Directors' Meeting dated August 26, 2021, the Company decided to appoint Hendra Purnama, who also serves as the Director of Investment, as the Corporate Secretary. This decision became effective upon Hendra Purnama's appointment as Director of Investment on August 31, 2021. Further information regarding the Corporate Secretary's profile has been provided in the Board of Directors' Profile section.

# Duties and Responsibilities of Corporate Secretary

Duties and responsibilities of the Corporate Secretary are as follows.

1. Preparing for the GMS.  
2. Attending Board of Directors' meetings and joint meetings between the Board of Commissioners and the Board of Directors.  
3. Managing and storing documents related to the Company's activities, such as GMS documents, minutes of Board of Directors' meetings, minutes of joint meetings of the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners, and other important Company documents.

4. Menentukan kriteria mengenaijis dan materi informasi yang dapat disampaikan kepada pemangku kepentingan, termasuk informasi yang dapat disampaikan sebagai dokumen publik.  
5. Mengikuti perkembanganasar modal khususnya peraturan perundang-undangan yang berlaku di bidangasar modal.  
6. Memberikan masukan kepada Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris Perseroan untuk mematuhi ketentuan peraturan perdang-undangan dibidang pasar modal.  
7. Membantu Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris dalam pelaksanaan tata kelola perusahaan yang meliputi:

a. Keterbukaan informasi kepada masyarakat, termasuk ketersediaan informasi pada situs web Perseroan;  
b. Penyampaian laporan kepada Otoritas Jasa Keuangan的前提下;  
c. Penyelenggaraan dan dokumentasi RUPS;  
d. Penyelenggaraan dan dokumentasiRAPAT Direksi dan/atau Dewan Komisaris; dan  
e. Pelaksanaan program orientasi terhadap perusahaan bagi Direksi dan/atau Dewan Komisaris; dan

8. Sebagai penghubung antara Perseroan dengan Pemegang Saham, Otoritas Jasa Keuangan, dan pemangku kepada tingan lainnya.

# Pengembangan Kompetensi Sekretaris Perusahaan

Perseroan mengikutsertakan Sekretaris Perusahaan dalam berbagai kegiatan pengembangan kompetensi, baik yang dilakukan melalui pelatihan maupun pendidikan, untuk menc Gatkan wawasan dan kompetensi Sekretaris Perusahaan secara berkesinambungan. Informasi terkait program pengembangan kompetensi yang diikuti oleh Sekretaris Perusahaan sepanjang tahun 2024 telah disampaikan pada bagian Pengembangan Kompetensi Direksi.

# Pelaksanaan Tugas Sekretaris Perusahaan

Sepanjang tahun 2024, Sekretaris Perusahaan telah menjalankan tugas dan tanggung jawabnya, antara lain makukutan korespondensi dengan Otoritas Jasa Keuang dan Bursa Efek Indonesia sebagai regulator pasar modal bersama-sama dengan Hubungan Investor, memberikan pemabaruan tersebut perkembangan Perseroan kepada publik melalui siaran pers dan situs web Perseroan, pemenuhan permintaan data Perseroan, dan menyerahkan laporan berkala dan insidential ke Otoritas Jasa Keuang dan Bursa Efek Indonesia sebagai dipersyaratkan oleh peraturan pasar modal yang berlaku.

4. Determining criteria regarding the types and material of information that can be submitted to the stakeholders, including information that can be submitted as public documents.  
5. Following the Capital Market development, especially the prevailing laws and regulations in the Capital Market.  
6. Making recommendations to the Company's Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners in order to comply with laws and regulations in the capital market sector.  
7. Assisting the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners in applying corporate governance, which includes:

a. Public disclosure of information, including information available on the Issuer's or Public Company's website;  
b. Timely submission of reports to the Financial Services Authority;  
c. Preparation and documentation for the GMS;  
d. Preparation and documentation for the Board of Directors and/or Board of Commissioners meetings; and  
e. Implementation of an induction program for the Board of Directors and/or Board of Commissioners; and

8. As a liaison between the Company and the Shareholders, the Financial Services Authority, and other stakeholders

# Competency Development of Corporate Secretary

The Company involves the Corporate Secretary in various competency development activities, including training and education, to continuously enhance the Corporate Secretary's knowledge and expertise. Information regarding the competency development programs attended by the Corporate Secretary throughout 2024 has been provided in the Board of Directors' Competency Development section.

# Implementation of Corporate Secretary's Duties

Throughout 2024, the Corporate Secretary carried out its duties and responsibilities, including corresponding with the Financial Services Authority and Indonesia Stock Exchange as capital market regulators together with Investor Relations, providing updates on the Company's developments to the public through press releases and the Company's website, fulfilling requests for Company data, and submitting periodic and incidental reports to the Financial Services Authority and Indonesia Stock Exchange as required by applicable capital market regulations.

# - Unit Audit Internal

# Internal Audit Unit

Unit Audit Internal merupakan organ Perseroan yang bertugas dan bertanggung jawab untuk mendukung pelaksanaan fungsi Direksi terkait dengan pemantauan dan penilaian atasSYSTEM pengendalian internal serta memberikan pandangan, keyakinan, dan konsultasi yang bersifat independen dan objektif guna mencatkan tidak serta kinerja operasional Perseroan.

# Pedoman Kerja Unit Audit Internal

Unit Audit Internal bekerja secara independen情况进行 berpedoman pada Piagam Audit Internal Perseroan No. 1466/IAO/DMT-b11000000/VIII/2021 tanggal 25 Agustus 2021. Pedoman Audit Internal disusun dengan menjad Peraturan Otoritas Jasa Keuangan No. 56/POJK.04/2015 tersebut Pembentukan dan Pedoman Penyusunan Piagam Unit Audit Internal dan International Professional Practice Framework yang dikeluarkan oleh Institute of International Auditor (IIA).

Piagam Audit Internal bersifat mencikat bagi seluruh jajaran dalam lingkungan Perseroan dan telah ditandatangani oleh Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris.

# Pihak yang Mengangkat dan Memberhentikan Unit Audit Internal

Kepala Unit Audit Internal/Vice President Internal Audit diangkat dan diberhentikan oleh Direktur Utama atas persetujuan Dewan Komisaris. Setiap kali penggangkatan, penggantian, ataupemberhentian Vice President Internal Audit wajib dilaporkan kepada Otoritas Jasa Keuangan.

# Struktur dan Kedudukan Unit Audit Internal

Struktur dan kedudukann Unit Audit Internal diuraikan sebagai berikut.

1. Unit Audit Internal dipimpinaley seorang Kepala Unit Audit Internal yang disebut Vice President Internal Audit.  
2. Vice President Internal Audit diangkat dan diberhentikan oleh Direktur Utama Perseroan atas persetujuan Dewan Komisaris.  
3. Direktur Utama dapat memberhentikan Vice President Internal Audit, setelah mendapat persetujuan Dewan Komisaris, jika dianggap tidak memenuhi persyaratan sebagai Auditor Internal dalam Unit Audit Internal seabagaimana diatur dalam Peraturan Otoritas Jasa

The Internal Audit Unit is a corporate body responsible for supporting the implementation of the Board of Directors' functions related to monitoring and assessing the internal control system, as well as providing independent and objective insights, assurance, and consultation to enhance the Company's value and operational performance.

# Internal Audit Unit Charter

The Internal Audit Unit operates independently, guided by the Company's Internal Audit Charter No. 1466/IAO/ DMT-b11000000/VIII/2021 dated August 25, 2021. The Internal Audit Guidelines are prepared in accordance with the Financial Services Authority Regulation No. 56/POJK.04/2015 on the Establishment and Guidelines for Preparing the Internal Audit Unit Charter and the International Professional Practice Framework issued by the Institute of Internal Auditors (IIA).

The Internal Audit Charter is binding on all levels within the Company and has been signed by the Board of Directors and the Board of Commissioners.

# Appointment and Dismissal of Internal Audit Unit

The Head of Internal Audit Unit/Vice President of Internal Audit is appointed and dismissed by the President Director with the approval of the Board of Commissioners. Any appointment, replacement, or dismissal of the Vice President of Internal Audit must be reported to the Financial Services Authority.

# Structure and Position of Internal Audit Unit

The structure and position of Internal Audit Unit are outlined as follows.

1. The Internal Audit Unit is chaired by an Internal Audit Unit Head called the Vice President of Internal Audit.  
2. The Vice President of Internal Audit is appointed and dismissed by the President Director of the Company with the approval of the Board of Commissioners.  
3. The President Director may dismiss the Vice President of Internal Audit, after obtaining approval from the Board of Commissioners, if deemed not meeting the requirements as an internal auditor in the Internal Audit Unit as regulated in Financial Services Authority

Keuang No. 56/POJK.04/2015 dan/atau gagal atautidak cakap dalam menjalankan tugas.

4. Setiappengangkatan,penggantian,danpemberhentian Vice President Internal Audit harus segera diberitahukan kepada Otoritas Jasa Keuangan.  
5. Vice President Internal Audit bertanggung jawab kepada Direktur Utama dan dapat Berkumunikasi langsung dengan Direksi, Dewan Komisaris, dan Komite Audit untuk:Mengoordinasikan berbagai hal yang berhubungan dengan aktivitas audit internal dan aktivitas investigasi.  
6. Auditor Internal dalam Unit Audit Internal bertanggungjawab secara langsung kepada Vice President Internal Audit.

Pada tahun 2024, komposisi Unit Audit Internal terdiri dari 8 orang, dengan perincian1 Ketua Unit Audit Internal, 2 orang Manager Audit Internal, dan 5 orang Staf Auditor.

# Persyaratan Auditor Internal

Persyaratan yang harus oleh seorang Auditor Internal di Perseroan sebagai berikut.

1. Memiliki integritas dan perilaku yang profesional, independen, jujur, dan objektif dalam pelaksanaan tugasnya.  
2. Memiliki pengetahunan dan pengalaman mengenai teknik audit dan disiplin ilmu lain yang relevant dengan bidang tugasnya.  
3. Memiliki pengetahunan tersebut perundang- undangan di bidang atas modal dan peraturan perundang-undangan terkait lainnya.  
4. Memiliki kecakapan untuk berinteraksi dan Berkomunikasi baik lisan maupun tertulis secara efektif.  
5. Wajib mematuhi standar profesi yang dikeluarkan oleh asosiasi audit internal dalam Standar Profesi Audit Internal dan International Professional Practices Framework yang dirilis oleh Institute of Internal Auditors.  
6. Mematuhi Kode Etik Audit Internal.  
7. Memiliki pengetahunan memadai mengenai risiko dan pengendalian kunci/utama, serta teknik audit berbasis tekologi informasi yang dapat digunakan untuk melaksanan tugasnya. Namun tidak diharapkan memiliki keahlian sebagai manila layaknya Auditor Internal yang tanggung jawab utamanya adalah mencaudit tekologi informasi.  
8. Memiliki pengetahunan memadai untuk dapat mengevaluasi risiko kecurangan, dan cara organisasi mengelola risiko tersebut, namun tidak diharapkan memiliki keahlianseperti layaknya seseorang yang tanggung jawab utamanya adalah mendeteksi dan mencininvestigasi kecurangan.  
9. Wajib suchen kerahasiaan informasi dan/atau data Perseroanteringdengan pelaksanaan tugas dan tanggung jawab audit internal kecuali diwajibkan berdasarkan peraturan perundang-undangan ataupenetapan/putusan pengadilan.

Regulation No. 56/POJK.04/2015 and/or fail or incompetent in carrying out their duties.

4. Every appointment, replacement, and dismissal of the Vice President of Internal Audit must be immediately notified to Financial Services Authority.  
5. The Vice President of Internal Audit is responsible to the President Director and can communicate directly with the Board of Directors, the Board of Commissioners, and the Audit Committee to coordinate various matters relating to Internal Audit activities and investigative activities.  
6. The Internal Auditor in the Internal Audit Unit is directly responsible to the Vice President of Internal Audit.

In 2024, the composition of the Internal Audit Unit consisted of 8 members, comprising 1 Head of the Internal Audit Unit, 2 Internal Audit Managers, and 5 Audit Staff.

# Requirements for Internal Auditor

The requirements that an Internal Auditor in the Company must fulfill are as follows.

1. Having integrity and are professional, independent, honest, and objective in performing their duties.  
2. Having knowledge and experience regarding technical audits and other disciplines relevant to their field of work.  
3. Having knowledge of the laws and regulations in the capital market and other related laws and regulations.  
4. Having the ability to interact and communicate both verbally and in writing effectively.  
5. Must comply with professional standards issued by the Internal Audit association in the Internal Audit Professional Standards (SPAI) and IPPF released by the IIA.  
6. Complying with the Internal Audit code of ethics.  
7. Having adequate knowledge of key/main risks and controls, as well as information technology-based audit techniques that can be used to perform their duties. However, it is not expected to have the expertise of an Internal Auditor whose main responsibility is to audit information technology.  
8. Having sufficient knowledge to be able to evaluate fraud risks, and how the organization manages these risks, but is not expected to have the expertise of someone whose primary responsibility is to detect and investigate fraud.  
9. Obligated to maintain the confidentiality of the Company's information and/or data related to the implementation of the duties and responsibilities of the Internal Audit unless required by law or by court order/decision.

10. Memahami prinsip-prinsip GCG dan manajemen risiko.  
11. BersediaENTERKATKAN pengetahuan, keahlian, dan kemampuan profesisionalismenya secara terus-menerus.

10. Understanding the principles of good corporate governance and risk management.  
11. Willing to continuously improve their knowledge, skills, and professional abilities.

# Tugas dan Tanggung Jawab Unit Audit Internal

Unit Audit Internal memiliki tugas dan tanggung jawab sebagai berikut.

1. Membuat program kerja audit dan non-audit tanunan yang berdasarkan pada metode risk-based audit, termasuk sejumlah risiko kepada kontrol yang menjadi perhatian manajemen, dan mengusulkan/ mengomunikasikan program tersebut kepada Direktur Utama untuk melakukan peninjauan serta memberikan persetujuan dan sekalis gus penetapannya yang sebelumnya ditinja terlebih dahulu oleh Komite Audit.  
2. Melakukan kajian ulang Piagam Audit Internal minimal 3 tahun sekali kepada Dewan Komisaris untuk mendapatkan persetujuan sebelum ditetapkan oleh Direktur Utama.  
3. Memberikan saran perbaikan dan informasi yang objektiftentang kegiatan yang diferiksa pada semua tingkat manajemen, termasuk memelihara/menjaga dan mencatkan profesalisme staudit dengan pengetahuan, keterampilan, pengalamanyang@cukup, dan mendorong untuk memperoleh,sertifikasi profesional.  
4. Menguji dan mengevaluasi kecukupan pelaksanaan pengendalian Internal dan systemd manajemen risikosesuai dengan kebujakan Perseroan.  
5. Memberikan layanan assurance dan konsultasi yang dibutuhkan oleh manajemen Perseroan yang sifat cakupan penugasannya telah disepadakati.  
6. Melakukan pemeriksaan dan penilaian atas efsiensi dan efektivitas di bidang keuang, akuntansi, operasional, sumber daya manusia, pemasaran, tekologi informasi, dan kegiatan lainnya.  
7. Membuat laporan tersebut audit dan menuyampaikanlaporan tersebut kepada Direktur Utama dan Dewan Komisaris dan/atau Komite Audit.  
8. Bekerja sama dengan Komite Audit dengan berlandaskan kode etik, prinsip dan standar profesi Audit Internal.  
9. Memantau, menganalisis, dan melaporkan pelaksanaan tindak lanjut perbaikan yang telah direkomendasikan.  
10. Memberikan saran perbaikan dan informasi objektiftentang kegiatan yang diperiksa pada semua tingkatmanajemen Perseroan.  
11. Menyusun program untuk mengevaluasi mutu kegiatan Audit Internal yang dilakukannya.  
12. Melakukan pemeriksaan khusus apabila diperlukan (audit khusus).

# Duties and Responsibilities of Internal Audit Unit

The Internal Audit Unit has the following duties and responsibilities.

1. Creating an annual audit and non-audit work program based on the risk-based audit method, including a number of risks or controls that are of concern to the management, and proposing/communicating the program to the President Director for review, approval, and at the same time its implementation which was previously reviewed by the Audit Committee.  
2. Reviewing the Internal Audit Charter at least once every 3 years to the Board of Commissioners for approval before being appointed by the President Director.  
3. Providing suggestions for improvement and objective information on audited activities at all levels of management, including maintaining and improving the professionalism of audit staff with sufficient knowledge, skills, experience, and encourage them to obtain professional certification.  
4. Testing and evaluating the adequacy of the implementation of the internal control and risk management system in accordance with the Company's policies.  
5. Providing assurance and consulting services required by the management of the Company whose scope of assignment has been agreed upon.  
6. Conducting inspections and assessments of efficiency and effectiveness in finance, accounting, operations, human resources, marketing, information technology, and other activities.  
7. Preparing a report on the audit results and submit the report to the President Director and the Board of Commissioners and/or the Audit Committee.  
8. Cooperating with the Audit Committee based on the code of ethics, principles, and standards of the Internal Audit profession.  
9. Monitoring, analyzing, and reporting on the implementation of the recommended follow-up improvements.  
10. Providing suggestions for improvement and objective information on activities that are audited at all levels of the Company's management.  
11. Developing a program to evaluate the quality of the Internal Audit activities.  
12. Conducting special inspections if necessary (special audits).

# Public Accountant

Perseroan entwickikan jasa akuntan publik untuk makukanan pemeriksaan atau membuat Laporan Keuangan agar sesuai dengan Standar Akuntansi Keuangan yang berlaku di Indonesia. Hal ini dilakukan untuk menjamin kepada informasi dan data yang disampaikan dalam Laporan Keuangan Perseroan bersifat akuntabel, independen, dan wajar kepada Pemegang Saham, regulator,erta pemangku

# Implementation of Internal Audit Unit's Duties

The Internal Audit Unit has conducted several activities, including audits of the Company's core operational activities, specific business processes, and synergy audit programs in collaboration with the Parent Entity. In its implementation, the Internal Audit Unit also provides consulting services to relevant units while maintaining independence and objectivity.

The Company engages a public accountant to examine or audit the Financial Statements to ensure compliance with the applicable Financial Accounting Standards in Indonesia. This is carried out to guarantee that the information and data presented in the Company's Financial Statements are accountable, independent, and fair for Shareholders, regulators, and other stakeholders.
